column2: 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas / rgyal ba'i sras / legs so // legs so // 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa @56a *// ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mi nus / byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang snyoms par zhugs par mi nus so // de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams dang lhan cig tu yang dag par bgros te / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba don thams cad sgrub pa'i snying po gsungs pa ni yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba / sems can thams cad kyi las thams cad byed pa / sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par can bzang po yang dag par sgrub par byed pa'o; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud tsam zhig cang mi gsung bar gyur te / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs te / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang dag par dgongs nas byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so // na ma:sarba bud dh'a n'am aam mam/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gyi snying po mchog yin te las thams cad byed pa'o // de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge @56b 'dzin de las langs nas / dper na / skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa'am / se gol gtogs pa tsam mam / mig 'byed 'dzums tsam la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi shugs blo ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te / mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su chas te sngar 'khod nas / steng gi nam mkha'i dkyil na nor bu rin po che rab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas su 'dug ste / gnas gtsang ma'i gnas de thams cad 'od chen po'i snang bas gsal bar byas te / 'od kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan cing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa du ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dang zhugs so // / rin po che'i gdugs dang / dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang / dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa / de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /

column2: dang / dri ma med pa'i tog dang / mtha' dag gi tog dang / nam mkha'i tog dang / rin po che'i tog dang / 'brug sgra dang / rnga bo che'i skad kyi rgyal po dang / mtha' yas par snang ba'i ye shes kyi rgyal po dang / mun pa mun nag thams cad 'joms pa'i rgyal po dang / gnod pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa'i rgyal po dang / spyod pa thams cad kyi yul shes pa'i rgyal po dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mngon par rtogs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / rnam par 'joms par byed pa'i rgyal po dang; nges par g-yo bar byed pa'i rgyal po dang / nyi ma'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med pa yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid yang dag par 'phags pa'i rgyal po dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pa'i rgyal po dang / rang bzhin gyi 'od dang / bsod nams 'od dang / 'jig rten 'od dang / dpag med 'od dang / mtha' yas 'od dang / sbyan bzang 'od dang / 'byung med 'od dang / don gyi 'od dang / mi tshugs pa dang / bzod par dka' ba dang / las med dang / 'og min dang / dri med dang / me dang; 'od dang / blo dang / rtogs pa dang / bde ba dang / bde ba'i mu khyud dang / mu khyud tog dang / 'dod pa'i lha dang / lha dang / lha yul na yod pa dang / lte ba dang / rgyas @63b pa dang / 'jig rten zhi ba dang / nye bar 'dod pa dang / rnga bo che dang / grub pa dang / dkar bo dang / grags bzang dang / bzod par dka' ba dang / rnyed par dka' ba dang / gdul bar dka' ba dang / bsnyen par dka' ba dang / ring du song ba dang / ring ba'i don dang / ring ba la gnas pa dang / mtho ba dang / shin tu mtho ba dang / srin bu me khyer dang / kun tu snang ba dang / snang med dang; khyu mchog dang / kun nas 'od dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba dang / yid bzang dang / lha chen po dang / dri med bzang po dang / dri ma mthar byed dang / dul ba dang / zhi ldan dang / mtshan bzang dang / rgyal mtshan dkar po dang / tshad ldan dang / ci smra dang / tha chung dang / sel byed dang / 'tsho ba dang / legs skyes dang / du ba'i tog dang / rgyal mtshan tog dang / dkar ba'i tog dang / tog bzang dang / nor lha'i tog dang / nor lha'i bu dang / mes po dang / pha dang / mthar byed dang / 'jig rten grags pa dang / kun nas grags pa dang / grags pa chen po dang; dpal ldan dang / pham byed dang / 'od byed dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / zhi byed dang / 'jig rten byed dang / lha byed dang / mtho ris byed dang / mar me mdzad dang / 'byung po mthar byed dang / don thams cad mdzad dang / grub mdzad dang / gsal mdzad dang / snang bar mdzad pa dang / rnga bo che'i sgra dang / skad kyi sgra dang / sgra snyan dang / mtha' yas pa'i @64a *//

column2: phyag na rin chen dang / phyag na rdo rje dang / mnyam pa'i phyag dang / nam mkha'i phyag dang / mtha' yas phyag dang / sa'i phyag dang / snang ba'i phyag dang / dri med bzang po dang / bzang brtsegs dang / rab mang brtsegs dang / nor bu brtsegs dang / rin chen brtsegs dang / rin chen phyag dang / kun nas phyag dang / dri ldan phyag dang / legs 'gro dang / dri med 'gros dang / 'jig rten 'gros dang / mdzes pa'i 'gros dang / mtha' yas 'gros dang / grags pa mtha' yas dang / grags pa bzang po dang / grags pa'i dri ma bral dang / grags pa'i 'gro ba dang / grags pa dri ma med pa dang / grags pa dang / grags pa 'dren pa dang / mgon po dang / mgon por gyur pa dang / kun nas mgon bo dang / rgyun shes kyi bu dang / mtha' yas rgyun shes kyi bu dang / @64b kun nas rgyun shes kyi bu dang / byams ma'i bu dang / byams pa bzang po'i bu dang / byams pa'i bu ma yin pa dang / dus gsum rgyun shes gyi bu dang / rgyun shes kyi bu 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang / rgyun shes kyi bu dkon mchog gsum dang / rgyun shes kyi bu skyabs gsum dang / rgyun shes kyi bu theg pa gsum dang / rnam par 'phrul pa dang ldan pa dang / yid 'ong bzang po dang / gsung snyan ldan dang / chos kyi dbang phyug dang / dngos med dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / legs gzigs dbang phyug dang / rnam gzigs dbang phyug dang / 'jig rten mchod 'os dang / legs mchod dang / sgra sgrogs dbang phyug dang / rda chen dbang phyug dang / sna tshogs sgra'i dbang phyug dang / rnam 'jig dbang phyug dang / mthon ka bzang po dang / sku mdzes dang / grags ldan dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / khyab 'jug bdag po dang / bdag po'i ngang tshul dang / nam mkha' dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / don thams cad kyi snying po dang / thams cad 'byung ba dang / ngan song spong ba dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / chos ma yin pa gcod par byed pa dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang /

rdo rje mthar byed dang / rdo rje byed pa dang / rdo rje dpung pa dang / rdo rje lag pa dang / rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / rdo rje ba dan dang / rdo rje rtse mo dang / rdo rje mche ba dang / dag pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje ba spu dang / rdo rje mkhregs pa dang / rdo rje zhal dang / rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rje mgrin pa dang / rdo rje mthon ka dang / rdo rje lte ba dang / rdo rje rtse mo dang / rdo rje dra ba dang / rdo rje ra ba dang / rdo rje mtshon cha dang / rdo rje gzhu dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje lcags mda' dang / rdo rje sa mtshon pa dang / rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / rdo rje sa 'og dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed spyan dang / rdo rje khro bo dang / chu nang spyod dang / 'byung ba'i nang spyod dang / 'ching ba'i nang spyod dang / khro bo chen po'i nang spyod dang / dbang phyug chen po'i nang spyod dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang @68b po'i nang spyod dang / rig pa thams cad kyi nang spyod dang / mi bzad pa dang / shin tu mi bzad pa dang / 'phen pa dang / nye bar 'phen pa dang / rkang pa 'phen pa dang / log 'dren gyi nang du 'phen ba dang; legs par rnam par 'jog pa'i 'phen pa dang / tshol bar 'phen pa dang / stobs dang / stobs po che dang / ne tso dang / bung ba dang / bhring gi ri ti dang / khro bo dang / khro bo chen po dang / khro bo thams cad dang / rga ba med pa dang / klu chen po dang / rims dang / skem byed dang / klu mthar byed dang / dbyug pa dang / dbyug sngon dang / dpung rgyan dang / lus dmar dang / rdo rje dbyug pa dang; sprin dang / sprin chen po dang / dus dang / dug dang / sha za gu dang / nad dang / 'byung po thams cad yang dag par 'khrug par byed pa dang / gzer nad dang / gzer nad chen po nyam thag pa dang / nyam thag pa chen po dang / gshin rje dang / nyi ma'i bu dang / dus mthar byed dang / nag po'i phyogs dang / mi bzad pa'i gzugs can dang / pa ti sya dang / mda' bo che dang / sgra rnam par 'joms pa dang / za bar byed pa dang / tshogs dang / nyi ma dang / dus kyi mtha'i nyi ma dang / srog 'phrog byed dang / srog 'joms byed dang / zhe sdang dang / phrag dog dang / tha ba sbyor can dang / thab sbyor bzang po can dang / bdud rtsi thab sbyor can dang / mtha' yas thab sbyor can dang / thab sbyor dmar po can dang / lag pa dang / lag pa chen po dang / khro ba @69a *//

gzhon nu 'od srung gi bu dang / chos sbyin dang / bcu drug sde pa'i dga' byed dang / nye dga' dang / yon po dang / lce ldan dang / rgyal ba'i zhags pa dang / dbugs 'byin chen po dang / be'u'i bu dang / ku ru ku la dang / nye ba'i ku ru ku la dang / gro bzhin skyes rna ba bye ba ri dang / rgyun gyi pha rol mthar byed dang / gang g'a'i bu dang / ri'i @72b rna ba dang / bye ba'i ze ba dang / dbyar can dang / gzi brjid can dang / gzi brjid bzang po dang / dpa' sbas dang / 'jig rten sbas dang / bla ma sbas dang / lhur byed dang skar ma la dga' ba dang / zhi byed dang / byis pa dang / nye ba'i byis pa dang / so gol nyi shu pa dang / mgon med sbyin dang / nye bar gnas dang / ldog par gnas dang / smyo byed dang / 'od ldan dang / kun tu yod dang / me tog ka dam li dang / legs par rab sad dang / nye bar 'ongs dang / 'jig rten 'ongs dang / sdug bsngal mthar byed dang / skal bzang yod dang / skal bzang yod chen po dang / don spyod dang / mes po dang / 'gro yod dang / rgyal skyong dang / rgyal dang / yul ka shi can dang / nye ba'i ka shi can dang / nye ba'i ka shi can dang / sman chen po can dang / gzi brjid chen po can dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / lha mtshams dang / sgrub byed dang / tshogs can dang / tshangs pa bzang po dang / dge bzang dang / 'jig rten bzang po dang / mnyam pa dang / mnyam bcas dang / de dag dang / gzhan yang /

column2: dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang / yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang @111b dmangs rigs dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang / theg pa dman pa'i 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dad pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang / rgyal po chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang / longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang / ldan pa dang / bzang ba dag dang / dul ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yang dag par sdom pa la nges par gnas pa dang / gso sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po la zhe mi sdang ba dang / phyogs chen po dang / rigs mthon po dang / rang bzhin nyid kyis chos spyod pa dang / zhag gcig smyung ba byas pa dang / gos gtsang ma bgos pa dang / skra dri zhim pa dang / dus gsum du khrus byed pa dang / de'i nyin zhag la ga pur dang / gur gum dang / li shi'i dri zhim pos dri zhim par byas pa /

kuryAt SAntika karmaNi tatas dvi hastitaH jQeyam pramANe ca eva gaBastine kuryAt SAntika karmANi SAntikezu api yojite mantra mudrEH taTA aSrezWEH jina agra kula samBavEH maDyAhne savitari prApte kuryAt ABicArukam atas pareNa AkRzyet vaSya arTam ca yojitam yuga mAtra avanate BAnO aparAha upagate taTA kuryAt sarva karmANi kzudra arTe ca yojitAH tatas pareNa kAle te sUryam DAna mate tadA vaSya AkarzaNa sarvANi kuryAt karmANi DImataH astam yAte tadA BAnO rakta AkAra sama praBe kuryAt tAni karmANi rakta ABAsa samoditAm kAnta kAmAH sadA kuryAt karmEH ca api rAgiBiH kula traye pi SAnyam kaTitam kuryAt dravya karma samudBavam anurADA taTA jyezWA uBO nakzatra yojitO sidDi kAmaH sadA kuryAt rAjya kAmaH taTA sadA BOmya arTa sampadAn= ca api viviDAm yoni jAm parAm sADayet Dana nizpattim nakzatrezu eva yojitAH uBO hi azAXO taTA proktO jantu karmasu yojayet DAtu jezu api sarvatra dRSyate sidDi mAnave mUle mUla karmANi ozaDyAm viviDa udBavAm sADayet mantra tantra jQaH mUla nakzatra sADane rAjye Dana nizpatti BUzaNa ABaraNa Adizu nAnA DAtu gaNAn= ca eva     yaTA IpsitAm sADayet mantra tantra jQaH uBO nakzatra yojitO vEdya revatyAm sADayet dravyam nAnA DAtu samudBavAm sADayet mantra karmANi nAnA ratna samudBavam sarva udakAni sarvANi sADayet mantra vitam sadA aSvinyaH ca BaraNyaH ca kRttikAnAm taTA aMSakam etat aFgArake proktam kzetram ca eva naBastale tasyAH vAra taTA kIrttim sOmyAm sADaye ca tadA mahIm kRttikam tri aMSakam vidyAt rohiNI mRgaSiraH parO etat BArgave vidyAt kzetram ca evam naBastale mRgaSirAMSam taTA ca evam AdrAyAm ca suyojitAH punarvasuH ca tadA vidyAt SAnti arTam kzetram udBavam puzya aFgam taTA ASlezam maGam ca eva niboDitam etat BAnoH sadA kzetram kuryAt ABicArukam PalgunyA tu uBO sa aFgO graha cihnita cihnitO induvAram taTA vidyAt kzetram tasya niSAkare hasta citrO taTA sa aMSO kuryAt karma atimAnitam buDa sTAne tu uddizwaH sarva karma prasADakaH svAtyA viSAKa saMyuktA sa aMSA vA api kIrtitA dvitIyam kzetra nirdizwam divAkarasya na saMSayaH anurADA jyezWa sAMSO tO nirdizwO pRTivI sutO dvitIyam aFgAraka kzetram vRScikAta samudBavaH sarva Darma arTa saMyuktam karma yukta arTa sADayet varjayet DImataH hiMsAm prANa hiMsA aBicArukAm sADayet viviDa an arTAm karmAn= ca eva su puzkalAm mUla AzAXO taTA proktO uBO sa aMSa trika udBavO etat bRhaspateH kzetram naBaH sTam dRSyate Buvi sADayet karma yukta AtmA viDAnAt ca nivArakAm mahA Boga arTa sampattI saPalAn= ca eva Pala udBavAm Danvini rASi nirdizwaH kuryAt sarva sampadAm SravaNA DanizWa nirdizwA SataBizAm samamoditA etat SaniScara kzetram dvitIyam kaTitam purA rASya makara nirdizwA sarva anarTa nivArakaH vEdya tatrasTaH yadi karmANi AraBeta vicakzaNa siDyati ayatnAt mantra jQaH tasmim kAle prayojitA rASyaH kumBa nirdizwA proktA muniBiH purA uBO Badra padO praKyO revatI ca yaSasvinI aFga hInA taTA pUrvA SuBa indra graha cihnitAH praSastAH SoBanAH sarve tat kzetram gurave  dA mIna rASi samAsena kaTitam loka cihnitEH grahaH praDAna sarvatra tiryak muktA sarva karmasu saptA ete kaTitAH hi agra mAnuzANAm gaNa Agame anantAH graha muKyAH tu anantAH graha kutsitAH maDyasTA kaTitA hi ete mAnuzANAm hita ahitA iti tezAm sattva prayogezu nirdizwAH mantra jApinAm sattva asattvam taTA kAlam niyamam ca eva kIrtitam na agrahaH Darma saMyuktam na karmaH graha cihnitam saMyoga graha nakzatraH mantra sidDim udAhRtA na sidDiH kAlam iti jQeyA na asidDiH kAlam ucyate sidDi asidDO= uBO= etO saFga akAlataH kramA viparIta ratAH DarmAH na DarmAH Darma cAriNaH Darma karma samAyogA saMyuktaH sADayizyati na dEvAt karma muktaH tu sidDiH na sidDiH devam udBavA tat karmaH ca sidDiH ca dEvam eva niyojayet na dEvAt karma muktaH tu dEvam karma mitas param karmakam tu mataH proktam viDi nirdizwa hetunA grahAH karma muktAH tu nakzatrAH ca su pUjitAH tasmAt karma samam tezAm karma arTam sidDiH izyate kaTitAH gaNanA hi ete karma eva sa dEvatam na grahAH rASayaH yoniH akzatAH ca su pUjitAH karma eza sadA vidyAt viDi muktA samoditA

column1: Pala udBavam ca sadA karma yuktiH mantrezu BAzitA tasmAt yuktitaH karma na grahaH na api rASyajA nakzatrANAm tiTInAm ca gati yoni samAsatas kAla pramANa niyamaH ca na param karmayoH sadA vEdya tasmAt tantra vid seva DarmaH eva niyojayet ananta grahANAm loke rASayaH viviDA pare tiTayaH gaNitA saFKye kzetraH ca eva niyoktRBiH tasmAt saMkzepataH vakzye kaTyamAnam niboDatAm mezaH vRzaH miTunaH ca karkawaH ca suyojitaH siMha kanya tulam ca eva vRScika DanvinO parO makaraH kumBaH iti jQeyO mIna vAn arayaH pare mAnuzaH devarASiH ca aparaH garuxa aparO yakza rAkzasa ArASyaH tiryak preta SuBO pare narakA rASi nirdizwA anantA gati yoni jA nirdizwAH rASayaH sarve nAnA DAtu samudBavAH asaFKyeyAH muniBiH proktAH rASayaH bahuDA pare tezAm gati cihnAni sattva yoni samASrayam kaTitam kaTayizye ha anantAm nakzatrA grahAm kzetrA ca bahuDA proktA nAnA graha nizevitA

column1: aTa ekonaviMSaH pawala visaraH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH punar api SudDAvAsa Bavanam avalokya maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam Amantrayate sma  asti maQjuSrIH tRtIyam api jyotiza jQAna niyama parivartam BAzizye pUrvakEH samyak sambudDEH BAzitam ca aByanumoditam ca tvadIya mantra tantra arTa kalpitam SRNu sADu ca suzWu ca manasi kuru evam ukte BagavatA SAkya muninA maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH utTAya AsanAt eka aMSam uttarAsaFgam kRtvA dakziNam jAnu maNxalam pRTivyAm pratizWApya yena BagavAn tena aQjalim pragRhya Bagavantam etat avocat tat sADu BagavAm BAzatu jyotiza jQAna pawala visaram tat Bavizyati sattvAnAm arTAya hitAya suKAya deva manuzyANAm sarva mantra caryA anupravizwAnAm ca sattvAnAm anuttarAyAm samyak samboDaH aBiprasTitAnAm ca upAya kOSalya mantra caryA suKena sADayizyanti sarva sattva anukUlam yoga viDAna karma anukUlam kAla niyama nizyandita karma svaka tAm nakzatra vAra graha yoni kzetra rASi samodayAm tat Bavizyati suKa sADana upAyam mantra anuvartanam suKa vipAkam tat Bavizyati te boDisattvAnAm vizpandita vikurvaNaH RdDi aDizWAnam evam ukte maQju SriyA kumAra BUtena aTa BagavAm maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam etat avocat sADu sADu maQjuSrIH yaH taTAgatam etam arTam paripRcCase tena hi SRNu sADu ca suzWu ca manasi kuru BAzizye sarva sattvAnAm arTAya evam ukte maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH BagavataH caraNayoH nipatya nizaNNaH Darma SravaNAya aTa BagavAm sarvAvantam SudDAvAsa Bavanam ABayA sPuritvA sarvabudDAvalokanadyotanIm nAma samADim samApadyate sma samanantara samApannasya BagavataH kAyAn nIla pIta avadAta mAQjizWa sPawika varNa AdayaH raSmayaH niScaranti sma nirgatya ca sattvAnAm budDa kzetrAm avaBAsya sarvANi ca graha nakzatra yonim samASraya rASi tArAm BavanAni avaBAsya gagana tala gatAm naraka tiryak preta deva Bavana manuzya sarva sattva BavanAni ca avaBAsya

column1: sarva duHKAni ca pratiprasraBya sarva sattvAnAm punar eva BagavataH SAkya muneH kArye ntaRdDIyate sma aTa BagavAn SAkyamuniH tasmAt samADeH vyutTAya sarvAm tAm nakzatra graha rASi deva saFGAn Amantrayate sma SRNvantu BavantaH sarva nakzatra deva saFGAH yaH hi asmin Darma vinaye mantra caryAyAm samanupravizwaH iha kalpa visare tat sADayet sarv na BavadBiH tatra viGnam kartavyam sarvEH eva sannipatitEH rakzA viDAna sAnniDyam kaTayitavyam yaH hi enam samayam atikramet tasya yamAntakaH kroDarAjA sarva nakzatra grahANAm tad kzaNAt evam aparyanta loka DAtu sTitAnAm sa sutAnAm sa bAnDavAm sa pArzadAn Anayati sarvezAm ca mUrDani sTitvA pAdena Akramya viviDAni krUra karma RdDi prAtihAryANi darSayati sma budDa aDizWAnena prANEH viyojayati sma samaye ca sTApayati sma vikRta rUpam AtmAnam darSayati sma ante sarva BUta yakza rAkzasa nakzatra graha rASayaH nisattva garuxa maruta mahA uraga gaNAH vEdya sarvEH BItAH trastAH Ta raTa rAyamAnAH mahA vikroSam kurvANaH BagavataH pAdayoH nipatya prakampyamAnAH evam AhuH  paritrAyasva Bagavan paritrAyasva

column1: mahA kroDa rAja Baya BItAH jIvitam naH BagavAn samanuprayacCa asmAkam iti evam uktvA tUzNImBUtAH pravepamAna gAtrAH aTa BagavAn SAkya muniH tAm nakzatra graha saFGAtAn= ca yakza rAkzasa preta piSAca mAtara gaNAn Amantrayate sma mA BEzwaTa mArzAH Bo BEzwaTa mArzAH na asti aTa AgatAnAm antikaH upasaFkrAntAnAm Bayam vA maraNam vA sarva duHKAH nivAryaH hi mArzAH budDam SaraNam gacCet vipadAnAm agryam Darmam SaraNam gacCet virAgANAm agryam saFGam SaraNam gacCet gaNAnAm agryam na tasya Bavati loma harzam vAQCanti tattvaH vAkaH punar vAdaH mRtyu Bayam sarva Baya duHKeByaH muktaH eva drazwavyaH sarva sAMsArikam Bayam na kadAcid vidyate duHKa upaSamam SAntim nijvaram sanniyatam boDi parAyaNam padam avApnuyAt iti aTa tad kzaNAt eva BagavatA tezAm sarva duHKAni RdDyA pratipramugDAni iti yamAntakaH ca kroDa rAjA BagavataH caraNayoH nipatya maQjuSriyasya kumAra BUtasya samIpe sannizaNNaH Darma SravaNAya

column1: sarve ca te graha nakzatra gaNAH sarva duHKAni ca pratiprasraByante sma sarvaH ca ketavaH praSAntAH nizaNNAH ca Darma SravaNAya svasTIBUtAH ekAgra manasaH Bagavantam vyavalokamAnA vismaya utPulla nayanA  dvilpasaMvRttAH aBUvam aTa BagavatA loka anukampA arTam taTA taTA Darma deSanA kRtA catur Arya satya samprayuktAH yaTA yaTA tEH sattvEH kEScid satyAni dRzwAni kEScid pratyeka boDaH kEScid anuttarAyAm samyak samboDO cittAni utpAditAni sarvam ca niyata avyAkRta anuttarAyAm samyak samboDO sarvEH ca piTitAni apApa durgati vinipAtAni deva manuzya upapattO dvArANi utpAditAni svarga argalam apAvRtam sarve ca samayam aDitizWanti aTa BagavAn SAkya muniH tezAm anuSayam jQAtvA vinaya kAla samayam anantaram eva tezAm vinItAm sattvAm jQAtvA Darmam BAzate sma ari duHKa samAkrAntam doza jam viniDa ASrayam aBAvaH deva gaNAH sarve pRjyante SAsane iha AraBaDvam param vIryam boDi sopAna hetukam prApnuyAt eva saFGAtAH SAntani jvaram Alayam aSokam virajam kzemam nirvANam vA api nEzWikam nirmalam gagana tulya AKyam aBAvam tu sva BAvikam param prApsyaTa aninditam divyam su juzwam anAvRtam anitya duHKa SUnya arTam anAtmam tu sama uditam BAvayantaH divA sarvam prApsyante ca eva nEzWikam iti vEdya mantra tantra aBiDAnena caryA ca eva suKa udayA kaTitA jina varEH SrezWA mantra sidDiH udAhRtA upAyam sattvAnAm agre niyogena eva DImatEH kaTitA mantra sidDiH tu Pala kAle sama udaye vicitram karmaNAm jAti vicitrA iva yojitA vicitrA karmataH sidDiH vicitram karma yoni jam vicitrA citra rUpeNa mantrEH eBiH niyojitA vicitra arTAH karma vistarA vicitram karma ucyate karma cintyA taTA citram acintyam ca api cintitam tasmAt prAramBat mantrI mantra citrezu puzkalAm rASayaH kaTitAH citrA tezu jAtA narA sadA sa deva asura muKyAH tu viviDA prANi vihaFgamA tezAm ca yAni cihnAni tAni sidDizu yojayet meza rASO taTA jAtaH manujAH vA divOkasA bahu apatyaH bahu BAzyo surUpaH ca api jAyate vaNij SIlI taTA SUraH manujaH strIzu varNitaH vakraH lubDa cittaH ca BUpatiH gRha sevinaH tatrasTaH candramA proktaH sarva karme prayojayet AdityaH yadi dRSyeta mepa rASi samASritaH tatra karma sadA sidDi krUra karma suyojitAm yAnam gamanam ca eva Asanam Sayanam sadA na Bajet tantra mantra jQaH virudDA sarva yogiBiH tatra jAtaH sadA martyaH mantram deya aBicArukam vRza rASO tadA jAtaH manujaH BogavAn sadA strIzu kAntaH sadA lubDaH Darma aDarma vicArakaH grAmya sevI sadA aDyakzaH devara aFgAni boDatAm tatrasTaH candramAH jAtaH DArmikaH sO sureSvaraH Bavet tasya cittam vE rAjyam ASrayatA sadA tasya mantrA sadA deyA cEtyAH jina BAzitaH tena candra arTa yuktenara ASrayaH rTa niboDitAH gamana Agamanam karma smaSru karma ca yuktimAm vEdya Acaret graha karmANi na kuryAt yABicArukam sarva karma samudyogam mantra sidDi suKa udayam AliKet maNxala AdInAm budDa bimbAn= ca kArayet sidDa dravya surA SrezwA sADyamAnA divOkasA siDyante mantriBiH yuktA nakzatrezu eva risizu miTunAyAm yadA jAtaH mAnuzaH Ta divOkasaH tezAm ca gati cihnAni sidDi kAlam niboDatAm AXyaH udyukta cittaH ca SaWaH mUrKaH Ta jAyate tatrasTaH yadi viKyAtaH nakzatrA niSi BUzaNam tatas kAntaH kavet martyaH banDUnAm vallaBaH sadA Dana AXyaH yuktimantaH ca maheSa AKyaH Ta jAyate SezEH grahEH krUrEH tu viviDEH ca api kutsitEH jAyate DUrtta rAga ArttaH vyADiBiH ca samAkulaH na idadyus tasya mantrAH vE SAntikam pOzwikam param kzudrAm kaSmalAn= ca eva kravyAdAm piSita ASinAm krUrEH graha muKyEH tu darSanAH ca Bavet sadA

column1: gamana AgamanayoH tatra na sidDiH sarva karmasu kzudra karma taTA tezAm dadyaH sarvatas jAnA sita AKyO graha muKyO tO pAtakO dve pare parO caturTAH graha muKyAnAm darSanam SreyasodBavam uBO raktO uBO kRzNO darSanam krUra karmiNAm sitO Sukla indu muKyO tO pItakO buDa bRhaspatO arka aFgArakaH ca eva raktO tO diSi BUmi jO zaNxaH rAho taTA kRzNO vicitrA SezakAH grahA nAnA graha gRhA proktAH vicitrAH DAtu su BUzitAH vicitra AkRtayaH kecid vicitra praharaNa udyatA nAnA DAtu gaNa aDyakzAH nAnA Rzi purAtanE Sizyante grahANAm sarvam apsarABiH ca kinnarEH gagana sTA varNataH yAtA gati yoni viditA antarIkza carAH sarve nakzatrEH sahacAriNaH vEdya vyomni DAna samAyAtA vicitrA gati cezwitA mahardDikA praBAvataH gatyA rUpa veza samASrayAt kaTitAH muni varEH sarvEH karma tattva arTa yojitAH caturTe hani saMyuktAH catur sattva niyojitAH catvAraH graha varA proktA sitaH pItaH rTa sADakAH SezAH krUra karmasu raktO kRzNO ca yojitO na Acaret sarva karmANi SAntikAni viSezataH kRzNa raktO grahO hi etO tiTO ca api caturdaSI na Acaret sarva kAryANi kzudra karmANi sADayet mAnuze sADayet arTI gaNa nAme SuBa udayAm tEH eva kArayet kzipram Asanam Sayanam sadA mandiram ca viSet Di imAm sarva durgANi kArayet karkawa rASi jAta sTaH dRSyate manujAH SuBaH SAstA ca Bavet kzipram rAjAnaH cakravartinaH Bavante janminaH boDaH pUrva karma samudBavEH Sukra indra graha muKyAnAm darSanam ca eva jAyatAm SuBe hani SuBe deSe boDisattvaH ajAyata puzya nakzatra yogena jAyante maru pUjitA budDAH trElokya guravaH nye pi mahardDikAH rAjya karttA nikRntA ca bahu prANi narADipAH jAyante viviDAH loke Sani arka aFgAra cihnitAH kecid jana BUyizWA martyA karma parAyaNA jAyante viviDa AcArA puzye jAtA api te sadA tasmAt karma Palam vidDi gatim AtmAna cezwitA kevalam tu sat AcArA graha karma niyojitA loka DarmAn apekza iha nirdiSanti taTA jinAH karma loka vEcitryam loka DAtu samADi jam BAjanam sarva lokanAma ASraya udBava samBavam vicitram kaTitam loke surAH SrezWAm niboDatAm karma jam hi purA pyAsI kaTayAmAsa vatsalaH sattva sADAraNA DImAm boDisattvaH mahardDikaH

column1: maQjuGozaH tadA vavre sattvAnAm hita kAmyayA vEdya karma jam kaTitam sarvam mantra tantra sa vistaram ezaH vaH surAH sarve DarmaH hi ekena yaH sadA karkawaH rASi jAtasya dadyAt mantram tu pOzwikam tatas pareNa siMhasya rASiH dRSyati mAnavAm siMha jAtaH Bavet martya aSUn lubDaH eva tu strI SaWaH mAMsa BojI syAt giri kandara vAsinaH senApatya taTA nityam kArayet ca vasunDarAm mahIpAlaH mahA aDyakzaH krUra karmA sadA SuciH kRtaGnaH kRta mantraH ca pApa karma sadArataH mitra drohI sadA lubDaH SaWaH ca evam ajAyata grahEH ca api sadA dRzwA sitEH pItEH ca DImatEH jAyate DArmikaH tatra kRzNEH ca api SaWaH smRtaH tatra karma samuddizwam pOzwikam sidDi lipsitAm uttizWam Kecaram ca api atimAna sama udgatam na anyam karma samudvetam samAnam ca api varjayet tatas pareNa siMhasya kanyarASiH iti smRtaH tatra jAtaH Bavet DUrtaH taskaraH kRpaNaH SaWaH strIzu kAntaH sadA lubDaH krUraH sAhasikaH sadA mUrKaH paradArI ca stabDaH mAna unnataH sadA SuBa nakzatra vAreNa SuBa dRzwi graha uditEH pIta SuklEH grahEH dRzwAH jAyante ca mahADanAH SudDa mantraH sadA DImAn Suci vRtti samASraye samBUtAH mantra tantrAH ca sADayet mahI tale kzipram arTa karAH ye tu puzwi arTAH ye tu kIrtitA sADayet mantra vid sarvAm jina aFgI kulayoH api jinendra muKyAH ye mantrA bahuDA ca api kIrtitA sADayet mantra vid sarvAm rASi arTezu eva jAtizu tatas pareNa Bavet rASiH tulA nAm ani kIrtitA prasidDAm karma BUyizWAm tat na Asevet tad ASritAm tulAyAm jAyate DImAn mantra sidDizu yojitaH na kArayet sADanAm sarvAm uttizWam BU nibanDanAm sarva mantra prasidDi arTam gati yonizu Acaret vEdya DUrtaH kRpaNaH lubDaH matsarI ca eva jAyate tulAyAm rASi jAta sTaH dRSyate ca sadA rataH tam kuryAt sadA mantrI tasmim rASO samAsRtaH yam na ca Acakzate loke BUmiH arTa arTa sampadAm graha muKye tadA jAtaH pItEH SuklEH ca sarvatas na Bajet mantra sidDim ca yatna rakza arTa sampade kzaNa mAtre taTA sarvam sADyantam niyojitEH SuBEH grahEH yadA dRzwaH pItEH SuklEH ca sarvatas mahAtmA jAyate SUraH DArmikaH Ta narADipaH krUratarEH grahEH dRzwaH Sani arka aFgAra siMha jEH tulAyAH jAta rASi arTaH matsaraH Bavate pumAn bahu rogaH daridraH ca vyADi roga Arta samudBavam pracaNxaH sarva karmezu krUraH sAhasikaH sadA na Bajet SAnti karmANi jina tattva aFga BAzitam rOdram kurute karmAm vajriNe samudaya uditAm ABicAruka karmANi nAnA yudDa kRtAni tu tasmim rASO sadA tatra kule tatra samudBave kutsitA jina varEH karma sidDim AyAti tatra tu praDAna guNa vistAram praBAvam ca api varjayet pravAsa gamanam ca eva na Acaret diSi mA ASujam mandaram vAhanam ca api sattva DAtu kRta akRtam na Acaret sarva karmANi tasmim rASO divAkare vRScikAt tu samutpAde sattva yoni samASrayet Bavate liFga vEcitryam kaTyamAnam niboDatAm tIvraH sAhasikaH krUraH durDarzaH mAna darpitaH vakraH lubDaH taTA martyaH jAyate vasuDA tale prAjQaH DArmikaH vidvAn vakraH ca eva durAsadaH strIzu kAntaH Bavet martyaH kRtajQaH dRXa parAkramaH tantra mantra sadA udyuktaH sevAyAm guru pUjakaH darSanam graha muKyAnAm Sukra candra buDaH guruH praSastam Sreyasam lakzyam AyuH Arogya vardDanam tezAm darSana sidDi arTam mantriNAm UrDva sADane vEdya SanI arka aFgArakO rAhuH paSyati tam naram yadA krUraH sAhasikaH vakraH jAyate rOdra karma kRt tezAm ca vajriNe mantrAH sidDi ante krUra karmiNAm na agacCet sarvatas martyaH dinezu eva su kutsitEH tatas pareNa Danva AKyam rASi m uktam taTAgatEH jAyante bahuDA martyAH gati deSa samASrayAt ante ca SoBanAH sarve bAlyAH duHKa BAginaH yaTA viBAga nirdeSAH AyuzaH parikIrtitAH taTA Dana arTa nizpattim vAcizye arTa sampadAm sva yonim nASayet nityam para yonim vivardDayet vahapatyaH bahu BAzya bahu rAga rati priyaH asaMyataH Bavet martyaH DanU rASi samASrayAt praBuH SrImAm sadA dakzaH DArmikaH vA api jAyate darSanam yadi muKyAnAm grahANAm sita pItakAm tezAm Acaret mantrAH nAnA praharaNa udBavAm nAnA Sastra PalA vA api vastra BUzaNa vAhanA nAnA DAtu kRtAn= ca eva nAnA DAtu Pala udBavAm sidDi ante tasya mantram vE muni juzwa aFga samBavA tatas pareNa karmANi sarva dravyEH tu kArayet prasavet sarvatas mantrI gati deSa niratyayAm su a Alayam vAhanam ca api sva sutAm ca niveSanam Buzajam sarvam izwam tu mahA arTam ca UrDva gAminam sidDaye tasya mukta AtmA kzipram eva kare sTitA tatas pareNa rASyAyAm makara sTaH dRSyate sama tezu jAtaH sadA martyaH liFgEH etEH hi lakzayet mAtR BaktaH pitR BaktaH ca KyAtaH bahu mataH praBuH duHsahaH sarva duHKAnAm AXyaH pi Dana saQcakaH kRpaNaH lubDa cittaH ca SaWaH ca evam ajAyata Sukra indra graha dRzwAnAm sarva sampatti jAyate kRzNa rakta grahAH ye tu krUra karmA tu pUrvavat na AgacCet tatra mantra jQaH vidiSAm ca eva sarvatas duzwAm sADayet karmAm anizwam ca eva varjayet vEdya vamana gamanam ca eva uttarAm diSim ASrayet mahA samudra arTa gatAm dravyAm nOyAnam AviSet prApnuyAt sampadAm tatra nimnam ADyakza deSa jam tatas pareNa kumBa iti makarAt samuditAt paraH kumBa rASi samAKyeyA sattva jAta ASrayA sadA bahuDA bahu liFgAH tu kaTitA te nara uttamEH vicitrA citra rUpAH tu varNa jAti samASrayAt SyAma varNaH viSAla akzaH jAyante bahu matAH narAH mETuna aSaktavaH te tu grAmya Darma arTa cintakAH kRtajQAH DArmikA proktAH mantra jAH kumBara ASayaH Sukla pItAH grahAH dRzwAH loke smin samprapUjitAH kRzNa raktAH grahAH ye tu dRzwa jAti samodayA vyaFgA kRpaNayaH mUrKAH capalAH taskara AvahA bahu rogAH daridrAH ca jAyante mAnavA sadA tezAm na kArayet karma uttamam muni pUjitam aFga arTa samBavAH yena dadyuH sarva karmasu na gacCet prApya tIra antam atas na eva api varNitam kuryAt vajra kule karma mantra sidDi lilipsayA krUram krUra karmAntam sPaw huFkAra BUzitam mantram sADayet ca atra kroDa rAja suyojitam sidDi ante pApa karmA aH tu rOdra karmAsu yojitA tatas pareNa mIna iti rASiH uktA taTAgatEH tatrasTAH mAnavAH sarve dRSyante bahu liFginaH mIna rASi samAjAtAH rUpANi etAni samudBavEH praBuH mAnaDIH SrImAm Boga sampacCata anvitaH praBavaH sarva lokAnAm jAyate sO mahI tale kzipram arTa karaH DImAm narADipaH TaH ajAyata Sukra indu darSanAt jAtaH Bavet loke nara uttamaH darSanAt buDa jIvAnAm Dana AXyaH Tam ajAyata prAMSu mUrttiH viSAla akzaH strIzu kAntaH Bavet sadA bahu amitraH narADyakzaH kuwilaH ca evam ajAyata bahu mitraH Ta SukraH ca jAyate mitra vatsalaH vEdya tatas pareNa krUraH vE graha muKyaH divAkaraH paSyate yadi asO martyAn SanirAhusu BUmijA tadA kazwam iti DvajaH krUraH ca eva jAyate pUrvavat kaTitAH hi ete grahAH kRzNa anta SuklayoH kuryAt sarva karmANi mIna rASi samASrayAH tatrasTaH candramAm paSyet sarvAn= ca eva sADayet atas pareNa rASInAm gaja mAnuza mAnuzAm ganDarvAH rAkzasAH garuxAH ca api pannagAH tezAm svarUpataH jAti gati deSam acihnitaH manAH udBavaH tezAm liFgEH evEH tu lakzayet yaTA sattva prakRtiH ca taTA liFgam viBAzyate sva mantrAH BAzitAH hi etEH tezAm ca eva niyojayet rASayaH kaTitAH loke dvAdaSa eva gaNa udBavAH gaNitAH graha muKyEH tu nakzatrEH tu niyojitAH saMkzepAt kaTitA hi ete kaTyamAna ativistarA mAnuzANAm tadA cakre nakzatre graha maNxalEH atas UrDvam tu devAnAm RzINAm ca mahardDikam jQAnam pravarttate tatra etat mAnuza cezwitam acintyAH budDa DarmANAm jQAna dRzwi nara uttamAm sADayet sarva mantra jQaH rASi jAtO samudBavA ranakzatrAm tiTayaH nityam Sukla pakze samAcaret sidDiH tezu sadA proktA kRzNe kRzNa karmiNAm grahEH sitEH pItEH dinEH ca eva samAcaret Sukla pUrNa gatA candre pOrNamAsyezu yojayet pratipad Sukla pakze tu tRtIye ca eva rocayet paQcamI saptamI ca eva daSamI ekAdaSa udBavAm trayodaSyAm taTA Sukle sarva karmANi Acaret puzwi arTam SAnti yogam ca gamana Agamanam SuBa aSuBam AloKyA mantra tantra sTam nRtya gIta ratiH sadA BUzaNam yAnam AvAsam kzura karmam ca DImatA prayoktAH sarvatas vidvAm martyEH ca api SrImatEH Boga sampad sadA sidDiH izwa sattva samAgamam vEdya nirdizwam muni muKyEH tu anyaH anya karmANi anyatas Dana arTiBiH SrImatEH kzipram kuryAt mantra arTa sADanam candra Sukra guruH buDEH vArEH graha varEH divyEH su pUjitEH Suci maFgalEH tiTi yuktEH samAsena nirdizwEH ca api BAvayet GorEH Gora rUpEH tu grahEH mantrEH tiTiBiH sadA Acaret rOdra karmANi kRzNe kRzNa karmiNAm gati deSa samAsam ca yukti mantra arTa sADane grahAH rASi arTa nakzatrA tiTayaH ca samoditA karma sidDi praBAvam ca niyamam sarva karmasu iti boDisattva piwakAvata saMkAn mahAyAna vEpulya sUtrAt Arya maQju Sriya mUla kalpAt saptadaSamaH pawala visarAt tRtIyaH jyotiza jQAna pawala viiti vEdya aTa viMSaH pawala visaraH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH punar api SudDAvAsa Bavanam avalokya maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam Amantrayate sma asti maQjuSrIH tvadIya kalpa visare sarva Baya utpAda nimitta nirGAta gatAni AScarya nimitta liFgAni kaTayanti SuBa aSuBam suBikza durBikza para rAzwra gamanam anAvRzwim ati vRzwim sattvAnAm sUcayanti mahA sADana Adizu yaH viGnam kArayanti tatas sADakena ca mantavyam sADya asADyAni ca tasmim deSe kartavyam akartavyA iti jQAtavyam tatas yadi na SoBanAni nimittAni Bavanti tasmAt deSAt apakramya anyatra gatvA sADayitavyAni aTa ced SoBanAni nimittAni Bavanti tasmin= eva deSe sADayitavyAni tatra eva ca sTAtavyam

column1: evam jQAtvA sADakena mantra caryA aBiyuktena kartavyam akartavyam iti mantra caryAyAm nimittAni jQAtvA SuBa aSuBam bodDavyam iti aTa Kalu maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH BagavataH pAdayoH nipatya punar api evam Aha  tat sADu BagavAm deSayatu nimitta jQAna parivarta visaram
column2: de nas gzhan cho ga'i rgyal po grub pa la yang khyed cag yid dad par gyis shig ces so // de nas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pas gza' rnams kyi spyod pa sems can thams cad kyi don // du gsungs te /

column1: tat Bavizyati sarva sattvAnAm hitAya suKAya sarva mantra caryA aBiyuktAnAm boDisattvAnAm mahAsattvAnAm SuBa aSuBa Pala udaya nimitta liFgAn yaH te sarva sattvAH mantra caryA anupravizwA sADya asADyam kAla nimittam jQAtvA sTAtavyam prakramitavyam iti paSyante evam ukte BagavAm SAkya muniH maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam Amantrayate sma tena hi maQjuSrIH SRNu sADu ca suzWu ca manasi kuru BAzizye ham te AdO tAvat Bavet liFgam utpAtAnAm sama udayam mahat Bayam anAdi sTam a mAnuzANAm tu cezwitam sarve ca graha nakzatrAH kUzmANxAH graha rAkzasAH mAtarAH devatAH ca eva sarve pretAH mahardDikAH darSayanti tadA liFgam mahA utpAtAnAm ca samBave Adimantam tatas maDyam aSuBam ca eva te tadA BUmi sTitiH na aSakam ca kaTayanti viviDa ASrayAt sarva mAnuza sattvezu BU tale smin niboDatAm kabanDAH viviDAH ca api pakziNaH ca samAkulAH dRSyante sarvatas loke tasmAt deSAt apakramet rAtrO SakrAyuDam dRzwvA DanuH ca api viSezataH Sara nArAca pASAH ca viviDA praharaNa udBavAH dRSyante gaganAt rAtrO tasmAt deSAt apakramet candra bimbe yat AkASe dRSyante vikRta rUpiNaH kabanDA puttalAH ca eva nRtyantAH gagana Alaye suziram Cidram iti AhuH dRSyate SaSi maNxale vEdya puruzAH ucca nIcAH ca yuDyantAm SaSi maNxale dRSyeyuH mAnuze loke tasmAt deSAt apakramet viviDAH prANa harAH ca api nAnA BUta gaNAH taTA nRtyamAnAH ca yuDyeyuH tasmAt deSAt apakramet maNxalAkA raMsaFkASam dRSya sTaH SaSi maNxalam tAdRSam tu tatas dRzwvA tasmAt deSAt apakramet yudDi antAm sarva saFKyAn= ca dRSyante SaSi maNxale ekaH tatra patet kzipram yasya yaH diSim ASritaH tam devadiSim iti AhuH BUpatiH mRyate DrUvam tAdRSam dRzwvA sattva AKyam viviDa AkAra samBavam acirAt tatra BayAt kzipram tasmAt deSAt apakramet Sara nArAca SaktiH ca dRzwvA tatra niSAkare taskara upadravam kzipram Sastra sampAta jam Bayam dRzwvA vikRta rUpAH tu nAnA sattva samASrayAm rAtrO BU tale candre tasmAt deSAt apakramet kRzNa varNAH vihaFgAH tu SuklA ca eva sa pItalAH raktAH ca eva taTA DUmrAH svaBAva vikRta ASrayA te vE vivarNa varNAH tu dRSyante BU tale yadA tAdRSam lakzaNam dRzwvA tasmAt deSAt apakramet SuklA pakzA Bavet kRzNA kRzNA pakzA taTA sitA dRSyante vikRta rUpAH tu vihaFgAH ca eva mahI tale tAdRSam lakzaNam dRzwvA tasmAt deSAt apakramet mRga krozwuka gaNAH sarve praviSeyuH grAmam Alayam SvApadAH vyAlinaH DUrtAH mlecCa upadrava taskarAH BaveyuH Baya kRtam tezAm durBikzam vA api varNitam viviDAH BUta gaNAH ca api dRSyante tu mahI tale vikRta avikRta rUpiNyaH yakza rAkzasa kinnarAH divA rAtrO taTA nityam nRtyante ca mahI tale tAdRSam lakzaNam dRzwvA tasmAt deSAt apakramet nara nArI kumArAn= ca krandeyuH BRSam BU tale rAtrO divA taTA nityam vyADiH tatra miha AgamaH vEdya uragAH vikRta bIBatsA dRSyante vasuDA tale gRhe raTye taTA BinDyA mandire vRkza sanniDO sarvatas vyApya tizWante Bavet tatra mahA Bayem mahAm Arya upasargam ca viza visPowa mUrcCanam durBikzam rAzwra BaFgam ca Bavet tatra janAgame vikRta avikRta bIBatsA pakziNa SvAna krozwukA UrDva tuNxAH yat AkASe ravante vikRta AnanA arDarAtrO tu maDyAhne uBe martye ca kutsitA Bavet mahA Bayam kzipram para cakra samAgamam durBikzam ati vRzwiH ca Bavet tatra samAsatas mAsam ekena sapta ahAt mahA duHKa upapIxitAH anyonyam BU tale vAsA mAnuzA taskara agninA mahA Sastra Bayam tatra tasmAt deSAt apakramet gagana sTA sarvatas meGAH dRSyante ca vakrasamBavA sPuwa AkAra aTa rOdrAH ca tIvra garjana nAdinaH sapta sPuwAH dvis catur vA ca dRSyante uraga ASrayAH su GorAH Gora vakrAH ca dRSyante gagana ASrayA tAdRSam lakzaNam dRzwvA aciarAt tatra mahA Bayam mahAm Arya upadravam ca jvaraH vyADiH rogAH ca eva mahA BayAH sadyas prANa harAH kzipram vizAH sTAvara jaFgamAH utsRjanti tadA meGAm tadA vRzwim ca dAruNam naSyate BUtayaH tatra anyonyAH nirapekziNaH tAdRSam lakzaNam dRzwvA tasmAt deSAt apakramet mahA prapAta durBikzam ulkA pAtAm samantataH DUmaketoH ca nirGAtAm diSAdAhAm kaTayizyAmi te SRNu prapAtam dRSya sTam ulkinAm ca eva jAyate rAtrO divA samantA vE ulkA pAtaH Bavet yadi mahA Bayam anArogyam jQAtvA mantrI vrajet tatas mahA ulkA jvalamAnAyAH diSam gacCet vE sadA tAdRSam nRpatInAm BaFgaH yatas vaktram tatas Bayam vidiSAm patate ulkAm samantAt vE niSi sarvadA tatra deSe mahA vyADiH durBikza nRpa GAtanam vEdya divArAtrO yadA ulkA patate vE samantataH tAdRSam ca Bavet mRtyuH nRpatInAm ca mantriNAm tam budDvA mantra jApI syAt jQAtvA tasmAt deSAt apakramet ulkinaH prapate yudDAt yatas pucCaH tatas Bayam anyA vA dRSyate BaFgaH nRpatInAm raNa saFkawe mahA kzoBam tadA cakre mahA ulkA graha cihnite samantAt patate kzipram tasmAt deSAt apakramet yAdRSam ulkam AveSyaH ASrayAt patate sadA tAm diSam vyADi durBikzam rAzwra BaFgam ca jAyate gamana AgamanayoH mRtyuH tArakANAm tad ASrayAt yaH yam nakzatra jAta sTaH tasya mRtyu Bayam Bavet dvi rAtrAt naSyate jantuH nakzatrA patate Buvi narADipAnAm ca sarvezAm ezaH eva viDiH Bavet yaH yam paSyate devaH izwam  zvedam Akulam rAtrO darSane vaSyam pratimAyAm divA tadA tasya mRtyu Bayam vidyAt mAsEH zawBiH tadA smRtaH pratimA calitA yasya devatA izwasya jantunaH hasate rudate ca eva tam deSam varjayet sadA pratimA patate ca eva viSIryate vA svaka AtmanA tasya BaFgam Bavet kzipram gRhAH ca eva narADipe kurvanti viviDa AkArAm liFgAm viviDa rUpiNAm pratimA yadi dRSya sTAH devAyatana mandire tAdRSam tu tatas dRzwvA tasmAt deSAt apakramet samantAt sarvatas mantrI paSyeyuH pratimAm sadA vikRta rUpa bIBatsAm nAnA vikRtam ASritAm svayam vA paSyate mantrI anyEH vA Buvi tAdRSam lakzaNam dRzwvA tasmAt deSAt apakramet arGarAtre taTA yAme tRtIye rDe yadi dRSyate tArakANAm mahA vRzwim tasmAt deSAt apakramet caturTa BAge taTA rAtrO tArakA kzipra gAminaH KadyotaH iva gacCanti tam deSam sarvatas na Bajet vEdya basuDA talena gacCanti tasmim deSe tatas vrajet yatra saMSayate vRzwi yatra gacCanti tArakAH tam deSam mA viSet kzipram yatra vRzwi mahat Bayam tam deSam naSyate kzipram para cakra samAgamam durBikzam Sastra sampAtam tam vidyAt deSam Akulam cora uraga vyAlAnAm mlecCa DUrta samAgamam tam deSam narADipAm nityam pravaset sarvatas diSam vilupta rAjyaH viBrazwa para cakra samASritaH varzAH azwaH ekam ca tam deSam tatra leBire punar prApnuyAt tadA rAjyam deSAt Agamanam punar jQAtvA dupakramAt sarvAm vikriyAm kriya yojitAm kriyA kAlam samAsena tam jApI AraBet sadA ulkApAta mahAntaH vE dRSyate yadi miSritam samantAt nityakAlam ca tasmAt deSAt apakramet ulkinaH bahuDA AkArAH dRSyante viviDa ASrayA vicitrA citra rUpiNyaH yakziNyaH ca mahardDikAH jvalantAm vaktra deSAByAm kravyAdAn= ca piSAcikAH tasmAt parIkzayet ulkAm liFgEH eBiH sama uditAm ati dIrGa taTA hrasvaH maDyAH ca eva prakIrtitA catur hastAH dvi hastAH vA hasta mAtra pramANataH dRSyante BU tale martyEH ASrayante mahA udayA mahA prANAH svarUpAH ca devatA ezA mahardDikA vicitra AkAra rUpAH tu hUtAH te ca divOkasAm devAsure ye saFgrAme vartamAne mahat Baye Sakram AjQAm iha kzipram gacCante Ta BU tale jambUdvIpa gatAm martyAm nara aSyakzAm narADipAm paSyante sarva lokAn= ca Darma aDarma vicArakAm mAtR jQA pitR BaktAH ca kule jyezWA apacAyakA mahA mantra DarA sarve jApinaH yadi ajAmbUdvIpa gatAH narAH tadA devAH mahA utsavA api jAyante tadA dEtyAm kurvante ca parABavam DarmizWAH BUlate martyAH jAmbUdvIpa nivAsinaH mahA utsAham tadA kAle tRdaSa aDyakzaH Ta vAsavaH vEdya tadA Bagnavata utsAhAH asurAH Binna mAnasA aBimAnam laBetAm yena pAtAle tena tAH praviSante sva puram tatra Binna mAnA kRta vyaTAH mahA pramodam tadA devAH leBire tRdaSa ISvarAH tadA jambUdvIpe Ta sarvatra suBikzam Arogyate janAH svasTA ca sarvatas jagmuH nara nArI gata vyaTA tasmAt sarva prakAreNa budDeH BaktiH kRTe janAH Darma saFGe ca BUyizWe gata dvandve nirAmaye pUjAm kuruTa martyAtaH lAli lipsaH sarva sampadAm mantra caryAm tadA cakre vavre vAcAm SuBa udayA daSa karma yaTAlokAm sampratizWA niropagAm kuruDvam jana sampAtAm triDA SudDena mAnasAH viratiH prANi vaDe nityam adattam vA api na Acaret na Bajet aFganAt anyAm agamyA parivarjitAm  japet santuzwiH svena DarmeNa saFkuruDva jana sattamAH mRzAvAdam na BAzeta vipAkam yadi aduHKa dam na aBAzet karkaSAm vANIm sarva sattva arTa duHKa dAm yat kiQcit kleSa saMyuktAm vAcAdarTa vivarjitAm SUnyAH Darma arTa saMyuktAm aBinnAm na Acaret sadA pESunyam varjayet nityam vacanam para Bedane klizwa cittasya sarvatra nizidDam muni puFgavEH aBiDyam na Acaret karma para sattva upakAriNaH yaH yasya sadA sRtam na kuryAt dveza samutTitam vyApAdam varjayet karma sattva dvezam anAspadam upaGAtam para sattvasya na kuryAt sarvatas janAH miTyA dRzwim na kurya antAm sarva Darma vinASinIm na asti dattam hutam ca eva na ca izwa mantra sADane na siDyante taTA mantrAH sarva tantra arTa kalpitAH na budDAnAm suKa utpattiH na SAntam nirvANam izyate na ca api caryA taTA boDaH pratyeka arTa samBavAm na ca arha tvam Buvi loke smim na api Darmezu jAyate svaBAvA ezA viviDAH loke arTAt arTa taTA taTA vEdya evamAdyAm anekAn= ca viviDa AkAra cihnitA na tAm Bajet sadA mantrI pApa dRzwi samudBavAm daSa karma yaTA proktA viratyA svarga upagA smRtAH BAvanA ca eva Palam tezAm nirvANAm arTa samBavAm anizwA tu Bave loke tadA surANAm parAjayam dEtyAnAm varDate mAnaH ati darpa arTa samBavAm janAlaye tadA sarvam jambUdvIpa nivAsinaH bADyante vyADiBiH kzipram anyonyAm te pi mUrCitA janADyakzAH tadA sarve anyonya aparADinaH kzipram naSyanti te sarve muni Darma arTa varjitAH samare krudDa cittAnAm Sastra sampAta mRtyavaH na te Beje deva muKyAnAm tarjanI Apadyana Alaye budDam Darma taTA saFGam na pUjet aSuBA nRpA na mantrAm japtu te kzipram te nRpA tasTure sadA vinaSyante tadA lokAH viviDa AyAsa mUrCitAH tatas te dEtya varAH kzipram su saMrabDAH ruroha tam sumeru parvata mUrDAnam AviSante jana sattamAH parizaNxaH tadA meraH viBajet mandirA SuBO samantAt vana viDvastam divOkasAm kArayanti te viviDAH raTa varEH rUXA nAnA ABaraNa BUzitA nAnA praharaNAH dadyuH puras SrezWAm parAjayAm tatas te Karam Beje apsarANAm Baja jagrahe ISvarAH praBavaH sarve asurAH te vala darpitAH jagrAha sura kanyAm vE suDA ca eva ca Bojanam tatas te sura varAH SrezWAH pravizwAH nagara uttamam meru mUrDni tatas gatvA nagaram darSana ASrayam Sakra anuyAtA sarve vE piSitAH dvArapura uttame na tu mAyA purI BItiH upajagmu mud A ASrayam nivartya tatra vE sarve su a Alayam jagmu te surA yat ekA mantra sidDiH tu nivaSeH janyum ASrayam japta mantraH pi vA martyaH nivasam tatra Alaye tatra deSe na ca ArtIni na durBikzam na SatravaH vEdya na rogAH na api Bayam vidyAt japta mantre sTite Buvi na ca asyAH dasyavaH sarve Saknuvanti iha hiMsitum na ca Arti mRtyavaH tatra amaryAdA pravartate na rujA vyADi sammUrCA jvara roga apahAriNaH biByante BU tale tasmim japta mantraH yad ASrayaH ye tra mantra varAH hi uktA jinendra kula  dBavA abjAke tu taTA mantrAH mantriNam mantra pUjitAH tatra mantra varAm mantrI jahnuja upamahardDikAm tadA te sura varA SrezWAH asurANAm tu parAjayaH evam uktA guNAH hi atra dRSyate BU tale kadA tArkikAH viviDa AkArA kaTayanti iha mahI tale graham ezaH iti SrtyA avatAra arTa vistarA gItam Rzi varEH jQAna mulkinAm graha cihnitAm nirdizwam tatra nirdeSaH niGAtasya pravakzyate ulkA pAte yadAm lokAH nirGAtaH Buvi maNxale pradyunnAgarjanA kasmAt SrUyate ca mahI tale BRSam cucukzutra tad deSam tiTireBi samAyutEH atulya Sabda nirGoza rOdrAm vA api tam AhvayAm SrUyate garja ca kzipram mahA meGa vacaH SrUyate zazWyacam aTam azwamyAm trayodaSyAm aTa SrUyate kRzNa pakze taTA nityam dvAdaSyAm tu caturdaSI nakzatrEH eBi saMyuktAH vArEH ca api graha uttamEH aSvinyAm kRttikAnAm ca BaraNyAm yAtam niboDatAm pUrva Badra pade ca eva ArdrA maGa ASleza saMyukte grahEH ca api su pUjite SanI arka aFgArakEH krUrEH BUmyA nipatate yadA avarzoda karmA krUram SabdaH niGAtaH ucyate mahat Bayam tatra deSe vE durBikzam rAzwra mardanam para cakra Bayam vidyAt nAnA vyADi mahat Bayam nirGAtam patate ca urvyAm nakzatrEH eBi kIrtitEH vArEH aSuBEH ca api grahEH kRzNa raktakEH tatra deSe nRpaH BRSam hanyate SaH triBiH sadA vEdya tasmim kAle rOdre ca karmANi tatra deSe tadA japet viviDAH vyADayaH tatra arTa nASaH ca dRSyate mRtyuH tatra Bavet vyADiH durBikzEH ca api ninditEH anAvRzwi sadA kAle dvAdaSa abdAni nirdiSet paScimAm diSam ASritya prapate BU tale naBAt nirGAtam mRtyu saFkIrNam dRSyate mRtyu taskarEH maDyAhne tu tadA kAle yuvA api astamite pi vA udayantam BAskaram rakte su SabdEH SrAvakEH evam tris sanDyAt kutsitaH SabdaH Seza kAle tu tuzwaye arDarAtre yadA SabdaH nirGAtasya mahat Bayam guptAm pura varAm tatra kArayantu nRpa uttamA nAnA mlecCa gaNAH DUrtA taskara aDizWitA api te para dravya upakAra arTam kurvanti iha mahI tale Seza kAle Bavet SabdaH nirGAtasya su puzkalam mantri muKyaH Bavet tatra bahu vyADi samAkulam bahu vyADita tvam ca nRpAH tasya viDIyate patnI vA hanyate tasya mantri muKyasya hanyataH sarve sOlkikAH tatra nAnA jAti samASritAH hanyante mRtyunA te pi taTA jIvaka sevakA prakRzwAH vaNijAH muKyAH niyuktA sarvatas nRpAH maDyAhna parimiti a AhuH Rzi BUtaH rave tadA nirGAtam atule Sabdam yadA SuSrAvate janAH vyADiBiH vyasta sarvatra Bavati iha mahI tale anyaTA tumulam SabdaH yadi SuSrAva mAnavA akasmAt sarvatas nityam nRpaH tatra na jIvate dakziNAm diSam ASRtya nirGAtaH patatet SuBaH vidyut ca UrDvam taTA vRzwiH acirAt tam vinirdiSet pUrvAyAm diSim ASritya SuSruvaH yadi nAdite nirGAtasya Bavet tatra prAcya aDyakzaH vinaSyati himAdri kukzi sannivizwAH janAH tatra nivAsinaH SuSrAva Sabdam mahA BErave grahe cihnite tasmim deSe janADyakzaH vinaSyante mlecCa taskarAH vEdya vatse vatsAH ca ye muKyA nepAla aDipatiH tadA hanyante SatruBiH kzipram nAnA dvIpa nivAsinaH vidikzu BEravaMm nAde UrDvam uttaratas Bavet kAmarUpa ISvaraH hanyAH gOxa aDyakzeNa sarvadA lOhityAt paratas ye vE jarA aDyakza aTa jIvinA kalaSAhvA carmaraFgAH ca sa motadyAH ca vaFgakAH nRpAn= ca viviDAm hanyA sa Sabde BEravAH grahe pUrva dakziNatas BAge yadi SabdaH mahat Bayam kaliFgA kosalAH ca eva sAmudrAH mlecCa vAsinaH hanyante SastriBiH krUrEH tadA aDyakzAH ca nRpAH carAH pUrva paScimatas BAge yadA SabdaH mahAn Bavet meGa garjana vat krUraH divArAtrO mahA ambude tam nirGAtam iti vedmi deva saFGAH niboDatAm SuBa aSuBam tadA cakre mAnuzANAm jana uttamAH yadA SuBe ca nakzatre lagne ca api SuBa uttame tiTi SrezWe site ca api SabdaH SuSrAva medinIm SuBaH suBikzam Arogyam sampad krIxAya sADanam sidDa mantraH tu jAyet vara dA jApinAm sadA tadA kAle Bavet sidDiH sarva karmasu yojitA krUrEH grahEH ca api vidyAt SuBEH ca api Pala udayA karma sidDiH Bavet tatra sarva karmasu yojitA nirGAtA bahuDA proktA kzmA tale smina niboDatA kecid prANa harAH sadyas kecid satya Pala udayA sarva arTa sADanA kecid SabdAH gamBIra nAdinaH tam ca Sabdam SruyAt kzipram deva saFGAH niboDatAm DIraH gamBIra yuktaH ca stanitam ca api garjite dIrGa dunduBayaH yadvat tad Sabda sammuKa Avaham sa SabdaH BEravaH krUraH yaTA nirdizwa kArakaH ulkA pAta same kAle BUmikampAn na jAyate Sabdam krUra nirGozam nirdiSam ca api yojayet mahat Bayam tadA vidyAt sarva nirdeSa BAm imAm sattva AGAtam tatas vidyAt durBikzam vyADi samBavam vEdya amAnuzam ca tadA cakre mAyA upadrava Adikam BUpAlAm tadA mRtyuH divasEH triMSaviMSatiH yaTA uddizwa karAH sarve SabdAH rOdra ninAdite BUmikampam tu nirdikzye kaTyamAnam niboData nakzatrezu eva kampAH ye tiTiBiH sarvatra yojyam syAt nakzatram ca api yuktavAm nirGAte yaTA sarvam karmezu eva yojayet aSvinyAm calitA BUmiH durBikzam ca api nirdiSet BaraNyAm kRttikAm ca eva uBO kampO suKa OdayO rohiNyAm mRgaSiraH kampaH jAyate arTa sampadaH ArdraH punarvasuH ca eva nakzatrA paricihnitO ezu kampet yaTA pRTvI tatra deSe mahat Bayam maDyadeSAH vinaSyante tad deSAH ca narADipAH puzye yadi kampyeta mUrvI BU tala vAsinIm tatra deSe Sivam SAntim suBikzam Arogyam vinirdiSet ASlezAyAm calate kzipram kRtsnA ca eva vasunDarA tatra deSe samAkIrNam mlecCa taskara rOdriBiH maGAsu calitA BUmiH sarvezu eva na sarvatas aFga deSe vinaSyante mAgaGaH nRpatiH taTA mAgaDAH janapadAH sarve pIxyante vyADi taskarEH uBO Palguna nakzatre kzmA kampaH yadi jAyate himAdri kukzi sannivizwAH gaFgAm uttaratas tadA hanyante vyADiBiH kzipram vRji mETila vAsinA vESAlyAm aDipAH sarve hanyante artiBiH tadA viviDAH mlecCa muKyAH tu himAdreH sa anusamBavAH nivastAH kukzi maDye vE nitambezu eva droNayaH mlecCa aDyakza varAH muKyAH hanyante striBiH sadA hasta citrO yadA BUmiH calate sanDyayoH yadA mlecCa taskara nara aDyakzAH hanyante SastriBiH sadA svAtyA viSAKa yuktyA vE nakzatrezu eva yojitA calate medinI kRtsnAH dRSyante vaNijA pare vEdya vaNija aDyakza varAH SrezWAH muKyAH ca eva SuklinaH vyADiBiH Sastra sampAtEH vinaSyante jala cAriNaH anurADe jyezWa viKyAte nakzatrezu eva sarvadA Bramate vasumatI kRtsnA namate ca api dAruNam yadA unnata nimna sTA parvatA nimnagA varA kzmA talam kampate krUram uBe saFGye tadA pare Bavet tatra Bayam kzipram durBikzam ca api ninditam maraNam divasEH zaxBiH mahA nRpasya Bavet tadA naSyante pura varA kzipram maDyadeSezu te janAH Izat ca calitA BUmiH anurADAyAm SuBa udayA sasya nizpatti sarvatra maDyA yadi jAyate mUla AzAXAm iti jQeyam nakzatrezu eva kampate pUrvaH uttara AzAXe tRDA duHKa sama udaye vyADi durBikza sarvatra taskara AdiBi pIxyate medinI sarvatas jQeyA yadi kampaH Bavet divA SravaNAsu calitA BUmiH DanizWezu eva sarvatas suBikzam AyuH Arogyam durBikzEH ca api varjitA medinI sasya sampannA yadi kampaH Bavet niSam SataBize Badrapade ca api yadi kampeta medinI durBikzam rAzwra BaFgam vE dRSyate tatra Aspade hanyate taskare martyAH durBikzam ca api kutsitam Bavanti BU tale martyAH arDarAtre niSi kampate uttarAsu ca sarvAsu revatyAsu ca kIrttitA uBO nakzatrO sarvatra revatI BadrapadaH taTA etezu eva hi sarvatra yadA kampa ajAyata nakzatrezu eva pUrva ukta kampaH dRzwaH suKa AvahaH ete kampA samAKyAtA nirGAtA vara cihnitA ulkA pAta same kAle tridozAH jantu pIxanA niryAte ca yadA pUrvim nirdizwam vistara anvitam guhAH tatra eva kartavyA sarvam ca eva diSAhvaye saravaH kampa nirdizwaH sAlokaH ca api suKa anvitam vEdya sidDi kAle tadA sarve dRSyante mantra jApinAm yoginAm ca taTA sidDi aBikzAm tu samBave boDisattvAnAm taTA jAte budDa boDim ca prAptaye praBAvAH Rzi muKyAnAm RdDyA varjita cetasAm suraSrezWaH tadA kAle Agamam ca api kIrtayet sa AlokA saravA mUrI Goza niHsvana garjanam kampam utpadyate kzipram etezu eva ca kAraNEH niHSabdA ca nirAlokA yadA kampeta medinI nArakANAm tu sattvAnAm calitAnAm tu nirdiSet duHKam bahuviDEH KinnA mayA kAyAti BIzaNA tezAm ca karma jam duHKam paSyam AvRtti dRSyate kaTitAm karma nirGozAm tam janAn Rzi sattamA niboDyam aKilam sarvam DArayaDva suKa icCayA ketunA dRSyate sarvam gagana sTam tu kIrtayet rAtrO divA ca kaTyete dRSyante ca uttarA naBe maDyAhni sarvatra dRSyate dIrGataH DruvA DUmra varNA mahAraSmA DUmAyantam mahat Bayam yat eva deSam ASRtya DUmayeta naBastalam tat eva deSe nRpaH hi agraH hanyate vyADiBiH Druvam yat eva graham ASRtya vAram nakzatram ujjvalA dRSyate DUmra reKAyAH gagane ca api ujjvalam tat eva rASi nakzatram graham ca eva su lakzayet tat eva hanyate jantuH SastriBiH vyADiBiH tadA yasmAt tu dRSyate reKA DUmra varNA mahat BayA tam deSam nASayet kzipram grahaH krUraH na saMSayaH snigDA ca nIla saFkASA DUmra reKAm ajAyata tat Sivam SAntikam vidyAt AyuH Arogya varDanam rUkza varNA vivarNA vA DUmra varNA tu ninditA praSastA Sukla saFkASA caturaSmi samudBavA sOmyA kIrtitA nityam SuBa varNa Pala pradA kIrtitA puzpa lakzmIkam tam vidyAt yatra mA tiTAH hima puQja niBA SuBrA snigDa sPawika sanniBA vEdya soma sOmya vijQeyA rUkza varNa sama praBA kalyANam ca arTa nizpattim duHKa nirvANate dRSam yasmin deSe samoditA nakzatre vA api yukte gre tale tAraka maNxale nirgate naBasi viKyAte dRSyate yam mahI tale sarvA samantAt AyuH Arogyam jAtAH ye tAraka ASrayAH praBavizNu Bavet tatra suKI Darma caraH praBuH SrezWaH jAyate martyaH tasmEH nakzatram ASrayet grahe vA Sucite proktA sarva duHKa nivAraNI reKA ca dRSyate yatra tam vidyAt suKa samarpitam prahRzwa rUpa sampanna snigDa AkAra BUzitam reKA naBastale yAtA DUmAyantI mahat BayA tatas nyaSreyasi yuktA praSastAH vA api naBastale Sivam suBikzam Arogyam tam deSam viduH buDAH DArmikam tatra BUyizWam DUmaketoH ajAyate sitA sPawika saFkASAH praBAH saQceyu sarvatas ekaSas SrImataH KyAtAH tArake smim naBastale tatas sPawika saFkASA raSmyA ca api mUrti jaH praBavaH SrImataH KyAtaH tasmin nakzatram ASrayet ketavaH bahuDA huktA sahasrO dvO trayaH Ta vA triMSam ekam ca bahuDA nAnA karma Pala udayA kecid SrezWA taTA maDyA kecid Darma parAn muKAH udayantam tadA kecid mahat Baya su dAruNA snigDa AkAra samA jQeyA sPawika AkAra sama praBA snigDA SoBanA jQeyA sPawika AkAra sama praBA snigDA SoBanA jQeyA cAru varNa alpa Boga tA kecid tiryagaH krUrA uttarA dakziNA parA SreyasA ca eva BUtAnAm udayante SaSi sama praBA mahA prANAH vikRtAH tu ati dIrGA nRpa nASanA maDye uditAH hi ete prAcya avasTita raSmi jAH pUrva paScimatas yAtA pUrva deSa aDipatim hanet pUrva paScimatas yAtA paScAt deSAH nRpatim hanet vEdya samantAt raSmi jAtAyAH samantAt durBikzam AdiSet vidikzA hi uditA hi ete mlecCa pratyanta gaNaDikA nihanet sarvatas yAtA tasmim sTAne samAdiSet DUmra varNAH vivarNAH tu rUkza varNAH mahA BayAH praBavaH sarvatas yAtA sarva prANizu AdiSet divA sarvatas nityam maDyAhne yadi dRSyate yadA mahat duHKam mahA utpAtam nRpatInAm tadA viSet yatra tiryak gatA reKA yatra sTite samoditA tatrasTAH nRpatim hanti yasmim deSe samAgatA divA vidikzu nirdizwA mahA vyADi samAgamam taskara upadravAm mRtyum tasmim sTAne samAdiSet nIla varNam yat AkASe divA paSyeta ketavam viviDa AyAsa duHKEH tu viviDa upadrava BUmipA samantAt kaTitAH hi ete mahA duHKa BayAnakAH yA ati rOdrA vidAhi uktA rAtrO kecid SuBa udayA rakta varNam yadA paSyet ketuH candra samASritam ruDira aktAm mahIm kzipram Sastra sampAtitam tadA pRTivyAm kzipram asRkra   rAtri avasunDarAm bahu sattva upaGAtAya bahu duHKa nirASrayam jAyante janapadAH tatra yasmim sTAne samAdiSet pItA ca pIta nirBAsA dRSyate vyomni mUrtinA haridrA AkAra saFkASA haritAla sama praBA hema varNAH yat AkASe ketavaH udayanti vE tatra vidyAt mahat duHKam sarva sattvezu lakzaNam mahAmAri gata aDyakzaH janAsu eva niboDitA dvAdaSa abdam taTA hanti anAvRzwya upadrava Adizu ati kRzNA rOdram iti AhuH ati DUmrAH tu varjitA atasI puzpa saFkASA pAvaka ucCizwa varjitA mahA meGa sama AkArA nIlakajjala varNitA varAhAkAra taTA kecid parapuzwa sama praBA dRSyante gaganA GorA tasmAt deSAt apakramet vEdya mahA krUrA taTA rOdrAH dRSyante krUra karmiNaH mahA duHKam mahA Goram mArya upasRzwiH eva vA mahA durBikzam iti AhuH tasmim deSe BayAnakam oxra puzpa sama AkAram rakta BAskara vidvizam asRj varNam yadA paSyet uditam ketu naBastalam sarvatra vyADi tadvegam bahu sattva uparoDinam nRpatInAm tadA mRtyuH tad kzaNAt evam AdiSet akasmAt paSyate yaH hi naraH vA yadi vA striyaH tasya mRtyu samAdizwam sapta Aha aByantareNa tu dvi rAtrEH triBiH vA api divasEH SastriBiH hanyate tadA divA vA yadi vA paSyet akasmAt niSiH eva vA tasya mRtyu samAdizwA tad kzaNAt eva BU tale vizeNa hanyate jantuH SastriBiH vA na saMSayaH SuklA snigDa varNAH ca niSiH eva suKa udayA anyaTA darSanam na izwam viviDa AkAra rUpiNAm sva kAya para kAye vA yadi ketu samASritA rAtrO ca api divA ca api sadyas prANa harAH smRtA Sukla varNAm yadA paSye SaSi go kzIra sama praBAm hima kunda sama AkArAm nAnA ratna sama praBAm tasya rAjyam samAKyAtam sidDiH vA mantra jApine ete ketavaH izwA SarIre mandire pi vA sva sEnya para sEnye vA yatrasTam tatra Pala pradam tam AhuH kIrtitAm SrezWAm nAnA citra sama praBAm dRSyante sarvatas martyEH bahvAnarTa AvahAH smRtAH sarvatas kaTitA martyEH vigrahe mandire pi vA ketavaH sidDa kAyAnAm sarva izwAH saPalAH smRtAH anyaTA kutsitAH sarve bahu duHKa Baya pradAH sarve vE kaTitAH hi ete ketavaH graha cihnitAH pUrvavat kaTitam sarvam tiTi nakzatra rASi jAH viviDEH vAra yogEH tu grahEH ca api mahardDikAH pUrvavat sarvam iti ezAm kaTitAH sarvatas loke vEdya tadA sarve te saMjQinaH kecid cAru sama praBA citrA kvacid tatas SuBraH snigDaH varNataH SuBaH sunetraH netra nAmaH SuSikunda sama praBaH suBrU sunayanaH ca eva rugma varNaH sa hema jaH sarve sitAH vicitrAH ca nAnA nAma samoditAH zaz varNAnAm api tezAm ketUnAm niboDitA nAnA varNa rUpANAm tad saMjQAH ca prayojayet nAnA vikRtinaH ye pi GorAH su dAruNAH ye mayA kaTitA pUrvam tat saMjQAH ca sarvatas evamAdya aDikA proktA ketavaH bahu rUpiNaH mAnuzANAm tadA cakre SuBa aSuBa Pala udayAH vigrahAH graha muKyAnAm dRSyate ca samantataH devAsure ca yudDe vE darSayanti tad AtmanAm mahA praBAvA maheSa AKyAH divyAH divya yonayaH sitAH SuBa udayAH sarve deva parzad samASritAH vikRta avikRta rUpAH tu kutsitAH vikRta varNinaH sarve vE asura pakze tu krUra karmAnta cAriNA yadA devAsure yudDe vartamAne mahat Baye asurAH parAjitAH devEH ketavaH sUcayanti te darSane BUta le martyam pradadyuH sarvatas naBaH sitAH SuBa PalAH nityam izwAH ca eva surapriyA darSayanti tadA AtmAnam deva pakza samASritAH martyAnAm tadA kzipram suBikzam Arogya vinirdiSet asurEH nirjitAH devAH yadA kAle Bavanti vE tadA vikRvarNAH tu krUra karma niyojitA asurANAm tadA pakze ketavaH udayanti vE tadA sarvatas krUrAH vAtAH vAyanti jantunAm mahA vRzwim anA vRzwi nAgAH ca eva krUriNaH mumoca viza jAm toyam bahu vyADi samAkulam mAnuzANAm tadA cakre viza visPowa mUrcCanam viviDA rAkzasA ca eva dEtya yakza samASritA kurvanti mAnuzAm hiMsAm ati dAruNa viGnakAm vEdya prANa uparoDinam duHKam kurvanti iha mahI tale aSma vRzwim tad AkASe prapatet BU tale tadA mahA vAtAH pravAyanti tasmim kAle tu BIzaNAH pracaNxAH vAyavaH vAnti bahu sattva apakAriNaH nAnA tiryagatA prANA sasya nASam pracakrire bahu BUta gaNAH krUrAH kurvanti iha ca BU tale mAnuzANAm tadA viGnam cakrire prANa uparoDinAm evaMprakArAH hi anekAH ca bahu viGna samASrayA nAnA tiryak gatAH ca eva caNxAH SvApadam OragAH viviDA nAga yoni sTA sattvAnAm apakArakA prANa uparoDinam kurvanti viviDA mlecCa taskarA

column1: kapilAH BAsataH varNAH vAtA krUrAH ca agnijAH vAyanti viviDAH loke yadA deva parAjayet aDarmizWA tadA martyA jAmbUdvIpa gatA sadA tadA te deva pakzAH tu hIyante dEtya yoniBiH yadA DarmavataH sattvAH BU tale smim samAgatA budDa Darma ratAH SrezWA saFGe ca eva sadA varA mAtR pitR BaktAH ca satya sattvAH jape ratA tadA te sarvatas devAH nirjije dEtya yoni jam tadA sasya Pala sampannA bahu pUrNA vasunDarA dIrGa kAla AyuzaH martyA bahu saFKya parAyaNA DArmikAH nRpatayaH sarve suKa dAH sOKya parAyaNAH tadA tAsu suKAH dEtyAH hlAdinaH vyADi nASakAH BaveyuH sarve te loke suKa kAraNa SItalAH na ati SItA na ca uzNA vE RtavaH suKa dA sadA nAnA pakzi gaNAH ca eva kUjayet maDuram sadA bahu puzpa Pala AXyA tu taravaH sarvatas SuBA sarve vyADi vinirmuktAH jantavaH BU nivAsinaH na ca udvegam tadA cakre nRpatiH DArmikaH Bavet bahu DAnya suKAH ca eva nAnA ratnaTa mandiram paSyate sarva yonyAn= tu jambUdvIpa gatAH narAH Pala AXyA taravaH nityam bahu kzIrAH ca DenavaH vEdya Darma Ayatana SatrAH ca kUpa vAkya samantataH kurvante ca janAH sarve jambUdvIpa gatAH narAH bahuDA bahuviDAH ca eva prANi Darma rataH sTitAH samantAt sarvatas tezAm yasya pUrNA vasunDarA viparItA tat anyaTA tezAm Brazwa maryAda cezwitAm karme yuga aDame kAle anyaTA Palam AdiSet niHPalam saPalam ca eva vikRtam hetu jam karma aSuBA ca eva kAmayet iti boDisattva piwakAvata saMkAn mahAyAna vEpulya sUtrAt Arya maQju Sriya mUla kalpAt caturTaH nimitta jQAna mahA utpAda pawala parivartaH parisamAp vEdya aTa ekaviMSaH pawala visaraH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH punar api SudDAvAsa Bavanam avalokya maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam Amantrayate sma asti maQjuSrIH tvadIye kalpa visare sarva sADana upayike mantra caryA aBiyuktasya sADana kAle sarva mantrANAm sarva kalpa vistarezu rAhuH Agamana surANAm aDipateH sarva graha AnAyakasya graha saMjQA candra divAkara Adizu nakzatra yogena dRSyante te SRNu sADu ca suzWu ca manasi kuru te BAzizye evam ukte BagavatA SAkya muninA samyak sambudDena maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH uttarAsaFgam kRtvA BagavataH tris pradakziNIkRtya dakziNam jAnu maNxalam pRTivyAm pratizWApya yena BagavAm tena aQjali pragRhya BagavataH caraNayoH nipatya punar eva utTAya Bagavantam animizam vyavalokayamAnaH utPulla nayanaH BUtvA hRzwa tuzwaH Bagavantam evam Aha  tat sADu BagavAm nirdiSatu rAhoH Agamanam yatra sattvAnAm mantra caryA aBiyuktAnAm sidDi kAlam BaveyuH iti sarva sattvAnAm ca suKa udayam SuBa aSuBa nimittam vA tam nirdiSatu BagavAn yasya idAnIm kAlam manyase aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH maQju Sriyasya kumAra BUtasya sADukAram adAt sADu maQjuSrIH yaH tvam taTAgatam etam aTa paripraSnase sarva sattvAnAm ca hita aya udyuktaH tena hi maQjuSrIH SRNu BAzizye sarva sattvAnAm nirdiSaH ca iti AdO tAva grahEH krUrEH rAhoH candra maNxale Agama udite kAle yaTAvantam niboDitA yadA devAsuram yudDam vartate ca mahat Bayam tadA asO dEtya rAjA vE dAnava indraH mahardDikaH mahA BayaH pramANAH vE samantAt ucCritaH mahAm sumeroH aDikaH Bavet mahA pramANaH krUraH sO ati darpa atidarpitaH praBavizNuH grahaH muKyaH yadA Beje surAlayam tatas pANinA parAmRSya sumerum deva sammitim apsarAm prekzate dEtyaH yadA kAle naBastalam tadA candramasa pUrNaH kare vAme sa dEtya rAj nAnA maNayaH tasya kare kaFkanatAm gatA tadA Buvi loke smim graha BUtA iti kaTyate yadA padmarAge smim arciH Bavati raktakA tadA tArkikAH mAnavAH AhuH Agreyam maNxalam viBoH yadA tu nIla rakte smim praBA nIla tAm vrajet tadA nIlam iti jQeyam SaSine BAskare pi vA vEdya mAhendram iti kaTyate tArkikA Buvi mAnavA vAyavya maNxalam iti AhuH tArkikAH eva te tadA viviDAH ratna mAleByaH viviDA ratna samBavA viviDam tArkike SAstre viviDAH gati yoni jAH viviDA eva kriyA tezAm viviDA Pala sampadA samyak jQAna vihInAnAm bAliSAnAm iyam kriyA tasmAt taTAgatam jQAnam samyak tena niyojayet asurasya tadA dRzwiH durBikzam ca api nirdiSet viSAKa sva atinO yuktO nakzatra vara pUjitO rAhoH Agamanam vidyAt paSUnAm pIxasamBavAm viviDA kula muKyAH tu hanyante SastriBiH tadA jyezWa anurADa saMyuktO nakzatrO vara akAle rAhuH dRSyati medinIm tatra duHKam mahA vyADi tatra dRSyati BU tale nRpa muKyAH tadA sarve duzwa cittA parasparam DanizWe SravaNe ca eva nirdizwam loka ninditam nAnA gaNa muKyA vE viSlizwa gaNA SrezWam rutam ca api niyojayet tezAm paryawantAnAm samantAnAm ca purojavAm yakza rAkzasa pretAnAm nAgAn= ca api sa pUtanAm sarvezAm asura pakzANAH vaFga sAma tawa ASrayAt harikele kalaSa muKye ca carmaraFge hi aSezatas sarvezAm janapadAam vA taTA tezAm tu kalpayet vEdya tri prakArAH yaTA uddizwA tezAm na eva viyojayet devAnAm ca taTA nityam purogAnAm parikIrtayet preta yakza gaNADyakzA skanda mAtara kinnarA nAgAn= ca eva sadA kAle yaTA vAcA niboDatAm lAxa udrezu taTA sinDO yaTA muttarataH taTA janezu eva hi sarvatra tAm tu tezAm niyojayet nAgAnAm ca yaTA lAxI vAcA hi uktA manIziNI yakzANAm tu taTA vAcA uttarAm diSi ye narAH garuxAnAm yaTA hi edre kinnarANAm tu kIrtyate nepAle sarvatas vAcA yaTA sA tAm niboDatAm pUtanAnAm taTA nAryAH vinDya kukzi nivAsinAm vinDya jAtA manuzyANAm mlecCAnAm ca yA vAcA pUtanAnAm tu sA jQeyA vAcA ezAm parikIrtitA rAkzasAnAm yaTA vAcA tAm vavre sura uttamA sa sRjya dakziNA deSA anDra lAwezu kIrtitA dravixAnAm tu sarvezAm xakAra bahulA sadA tAm tu vAcA samAlakzye rAkzasezu eva niyojayet tris prakArA taTA jQeyAH rAkzasAnAm kula yonayaH tris prakAra eva vAcA ezA triDA ca eva niyojayet sarvatas triviDAH jQeyAH deSa BAzAH ca te triDA tris prakAram taTA karma tri deSam ca eva yojayet triviDaH sarvatas jQeyaH triviDam karma rutam smRtam samam sarva ezu tatra eva viDAtA anyam niyojayet nAnA BUta gaNA proktAH nAnA BU talava asinaH nAnA ca bahu BAza jQA nAnA SAstra viBUzitA mAnuzAH mAnuzAm vidyA nAnA vAca viBAzitAm nAnA SAstra matAH jQeyAH nAnA mantra arTa SAlinaH nAnA karma sama uddeSA nAnA sidDiH tu mucyate AvizwAnAm yadA martyA pAtra sTAna samAgatA tezAm ca viDi yuktena mantrEH ca api suyojitA AgatA BU tale devAm vAcanA eva viBAvayet liFgam arTam taTA pAtram devam ca eva niyojayet vEdya SreyasA Sreyase ca eva AveSAnAm tu lakzayet nAnA deSa samAcArAH nAnA BAza samodayA nAnA karma arTa saMyogAH nAnA liFgEH tu lakzayet maDyadeSa Abahis yezAm vAcA Bavati caQcalA te tu vyaktam narAH jQeyAH mlecCa BAzA ratA hi te ye krUrAH rAkzasAH GorAH rOdra karmAnta cAriNaH xakAra bahulA vAcA lakAra avyakta mArzaH dakziNAtyA yaTA vAcA caQcalA Bavati ninditA taTA ca rAkzasaH tu ezu vAcA ezA parikIrttitA bahuDA rutayA jyezWAH AvizwAnAm tu trijAparAm AkRzwAH mantriBiH kzipram svayam vE iha mA AgatA bahuDA gRhNanti sattvAnAm mAtarA sagrahA surA garuxA yakza ganDarvA kinnarA piSAcA ca uraga rAkzasAnAm yakza pUtanAm AbizwAnAm taTA liFgA kaTyamAnA niboDatAm mlecCa BAziNa kravyAdA piSAca avyakta lApinAm lakAra bahulAH vAcA xakAra antAH tu pUtanA tezAm na IrDva gatA dRzwi karmezu etezu yojitA mAtsaryA krUra sattvAnAm mRzAvAdAt asuce ratA tezA na UrDvam gatAH dRzwi arDaH dRS na UrDva gatAH hi te mAtarANAm taTA vAcA SuBa arTa upasaMhitA grahANAm kumAra muKyAnAm vAcA Bavati kevalA SuBa aFga sampadA vAcA bAla BAvi arTa yojitA praBAva sarvatas SreyAm sarvatas ca divOkasAm garuxAnAm taTA vAcA AvizwAnAm tu lakzayet gakAra sama tA jQeyA mlecCa BAzA iva lakzyate avyaktam sPuwa ABAsam kIrti yuktam SuBa udayam suparNine pAya vat iti ezA viza darpa vinAraNI nAnA AgatayaH hi ezAm nAnA BUta samAgamAm nAnA varNataH jQeyAm nAnA liFgEH tu lakzayet SuBa akaramaBAkara maBAsantam BakzayaH nAga rAj pade vAsukI praBRtayaH nAgAH DArmikA vasuDA tale kzipra vAcA samAyuktAH ca vasantaH uraga aDipA vEdya svena svena tu kAyena yaH liFgena tu lakzayet tena tena tu liFgena tam tam sattvam vinirdiSet kaSmalA kaTitA sarve aDas dRzwi gatAH hi te nAnA liFginAm jQeyAH nAnA sattva nikAya tAm nAnA kAya gatEH karmEH nAnA kAyam niboDatAm evaMprakArAhi anekA bahu liFga aBiBAziNA nAnA budDi kRtEH karmEH nAnA yoni samASritEH AvizwAnAm Buvi martyAnAm kaTitAH liFgAni vE sadA surANAm asurANAm ca yaTA vAcA arTa liFginI taTA eva tat yojayet kzipram BUmiH mAnuza tAm gatAH devAnAm tadA vidyAt su prasannena cetasA nirIkzante taTA ca UrDvam diSAm ca eva samantataH aviklavA manasA OdvilyA hRzwA rUpa samanvitA SudDa akzAH animiza akzAH ca snigDA ca snigDavakrayaH prasanna glatyA taTA sarve sura SrezWAH nu lakzayet paryaFka upahitA jQeyA nizaNNA BU tale SucO kecid ambaram niHsRtya nizaNNA KecarA pare brahma AdyAH kaTitAH devAH DyAna prIti samAhitAH tad UrDvam SreyasAm sTAne rUpiNA bahu rUpiNA AkRzwA mantriBiH mantrEH mantra jAnAm sa niSritA tezAm niboDayet paryaFka uparivizwAH vE DyAyantA Rzi vat sadA tat AveSam viduH budDyE izwam arTa prasADakam SreyasA sarva mantrANAm hitAya eva upayojayet kaTitam sarvam evam tu niboData sura ISvarAH RziNA kaTitA hi ete saMyatA te RzavasTitA AvizwAnAm tadA liFgAH RzINAm kaTitA mayA vEdya UrDva dRzwi gatA devAH UrDvapAda aTa kaSmalA vikRtAH rOdra rUpAH ca UrDva keSAH tu rAkzasAH mAtarANAm tat evam tu kezAm ca iva tu dRSyate kravyAdA nagnakA tizWe sa celA niScelatAm gatA UrDvapAdAH vikRta AKyAH UrDva keSAH grahA pare vicerUH medinIm kRtsnAm samantAt saritA tawAm eka vRkzA SmaSAnAm ca eka liFgA pulina udBavAm deva AvasaTa raTyAsu vinDya kukzi SilA uccayAm himAdre sAnumAn= ca eva mlecCa taskara mandirAm tatrasTAH vikRta rUpAH tu mantra AkRzwAH ca mA AgatA gRhNanti prANinAm kzipram SOca AcAra parAFmuKAm sarva medinIm gacCet BayAt AhAra mohitAm gRhNanti bahuDA loke bahu vyADi samASritAm nAnA vikRta rUpAH te nAnA veza DarA parA gRhNanti prANinAm kzipram mRtakam mUtra suptakAm tezAm ca kaTitam liFgam caritam tu viBAvitam vAcam Alakzitam pUrvam kaTitam tu mahI tale AvizwAnAm taTA cihnam mAnuzezu eva lakzitam sTira prakArAH sarvatra sura SrezWA niboDatA AvizwAnAm taTA liFgA kaTitAH BU tale nRNAm snigDam prekzate nityam animizaH ca api dRzwitaH mAnuze sattva saFklizwe sura SrezWe tu mahI tale vavre vasuDarAm vAcAm Sabda saFGa arTa BUzitAm yukte Sreyase Darme mAnuzye vASraTaH gataH suraSrezWaH gataH muKyaH jQeyaH sarva arTa sADakaH cintitam jApine tena gata budDi divAlaye tat sarvam boDayet kzipram mantriNe cintitam tu yat etat samyak AKyAtam AveSam Buvi dEvatam asaMjQinaH pi sadA mantrEH AkRzyante tu BU tale naBAza maDuram vAcam na yajQaH sa tvarA surAH niHSrezWA vivaSA ca eva sTitA te mOnam ASritAH na vAcA kiQcanaH tezAm na cittA na api mAnitA vEdya tasmAt tam na ca AkRzye tam jApI parivartayet asADyam na api tat tezAm mantrANAm jinasOdBavAm na akRzyam vidyate kiQcid duzkaram tezAm japta mantra arTa tApinAm AkRzyante taTA AryAH AryEH mantrEH tu yuktitAH AryANAm yAni cihnAni Kaxgi SrAvaka samBavAm boDisattvAH mahAtmAni daSa BUmi samASritA AkRzyante taTA mantrEH samayEH ca api su BUzitAH mahA dUtyEH taTA uzNIzEH muniH varNa suyojitEH budDa putrEH tu DImadBiH abja ketu kula uditEH kuliSa AhvEH mantra muKyEH tu kroDa rAja mahardDikEH na anye mantra rAj SaktA lOkikA ye mahardDikA na api samaya vid tezAm na ca utkRzwaH mantram ISvaraH varNitum gaNayitum sampatyaH maDura akzara kUjitA sarvatas liFgam artTAnAm tat pUrvam kaTitam hitam kUjanam krUram samam sarvezu yojayet SivAya sarvatas jQeyA dakziNena Pala pradA tat sarvam siMhataH jQeyam SivAt nu sarvadA krUrA aSoBana ArAvA dInA mRtyu parAyaNA sarvatas suKa nizpattim Palam sasya samudBavam sarve Siva gaNA proktA SAyamprAte ca SoBanA ekArava iti yadi etAH dakziNAm diSam ASritA SivA SivatamA proktA dvitIyA rAve tu kIrtyate tRtIye rAve taTA jQeyA rAjQe artTa AvahA Bavet caturtTe tu mahA lABam paQcame putra dA smRtA zazWe ca Dana nizpattiH saptame na Bave SuBA azwamam niHPalam vidyA tad UrDvam Baya pIxitA evam karoti SivA tatra asaFKyeyA te pyanizwa dA paScimena SivA jQeyA para cakra Bayam tadA dvitIye durBikza kAntAre krUrarAvA yadA Bavet tRtIye arTa nASam tu caturTe prANa roDinam paQcame kaTite rAve amAtyAnAm vyADi pIxakAH zazWe ca ura Agamam vidyA sarvatas tu SivA tu sA saptam eva mahA vyADim azwame ca api ninditA tat urDvam Baya BIra ArttA kzuDitA vA praBAzate utareNa tu yaH rAvaH SivAyAH SrUyate sadA mahA Goratamam vyADim tatra sTAne vinirdiSet dvitIye krUrarAve tu duHKa dA sA Bavet tadA tRtIye arTa nASam tu caturtTe agni samBavam paQcamena mahA vRzwim zazWe rAjA aparudDyate saptamena mahA yudDam Sastra sampAtam AdiSet azwame niHPalam vidyA tad UrDvam yaH kiQci roditi pUrveNa ca yadA rOti SivA yAme tu mantime tadA rAja Agamam vidyA dvitIya ArAve tu preziNAm vEdya tRtIyam rAjataH mRtyuH badDaH vA yadi SrUyate caturTe ca urataH duHKam paQcame prANa roDikam zazWe ca Bavate vyADiH saptame agnitaH Bayam azwame niHPalam vidyA Sezam pUrvavat sadA yadA dakziNa pUrveNa vidiSe vyAhare SivA praTamena Bavet sOKyam dvitIye sarvatas janAm tRtIye Dana niHpattiH caturTe sasya sampadA paQcame suBikza nirdizwam zazWe kzemam samAdiSe saptame sarvatas jQeyam azwame niHPalam sadA yadA dakziNa BAgena paScimA maDyatas sadA nirdiSe ca DruvA jQeyA SivA krUratamA smRtA praTamena Bavet mRtyuH hanyate brAhmaNAH dvike tRtIye kzatriyam hanyA caturTe vESyam iti AhuH paQcame SUdra yonayaH zazWe mlecCinAm hanti saptame taskarA tadA azwame niHPalam vidyA ati duHKam krUra rAviNAm asaFKyeyAnAm tu dRSyate uttara apaScimA BAge yadA tIvram virOti sA ati kzipram mahA vyADiH rAjQe vA vyADim AdiSet dvitIyena hanyate hastiH rAjQaH muKyaH gaja uttamam tRtIyena Bavet mRtyuH mA AdizwaH tatra vE caturTena Bavet mRtyuH muKyAnAm ca DaneSvarAm paQcame Dana nASam tu zazWe vyADi samBavet saptamena Bave duHKam sarvatas ca Baya Avaham azwame niHPalam vidyA pUrvam vE sarvatas tadA uttare pUrvayoH maDye vidikzu ca eva lakzayet ati krUrA yadA kzipram SivA vyAharate tadA uttare pUrvatas maDye vidikzuH ca eva lakzayet ati krUrA yadA kzipram SivA vyAharate tadA mRtyunA hanyate jantuH pOra muKyaH DaneSvaraH dvitIyena hanet mantrI tRtIye gajam AdiSe caturTe viviDa yonyAH tu mlecCa taskara jIvinaH vEdya caturTena Bavet vyADiH sarvezAm ca tadA jane paQcame hanyate putraH amAtyaH vA nRpateH Druvam zazWe mRtyum AdizwA mahAdevyA tu narADipe saptamena hanet rAzwram muktam ca api vinirdiSet azwame niHPalam vidyA pUrvavat kaTitA sadA atas UrDvam taTA rAvaH SivAnAm ca Bave yadA amAnuzam tam viduH martyaH mahA upadrava kArakam apakramya tatas gacCe mantrEH vA rakzam AdiSet mahA praBAvEH viKyAtEH jina abja kulayA udBavEH homa karmANi kurvIta SAntim tatra samAdiSet evaMprakArAH hi anekAni bahu BAzyA paSu yonayaH nAnA pakzi gaNAn= ca api rutam ca eva niboDaye bahuDA tiryagatA kecid cApasu mUrtti jA kecid vikRta rUpAH tu rOdrA sattva viheWakA kecid prANa aparoDikAm sattvAm hiNxyante Ta mahI tale asRk pAna ratAH kecid anvAhiNxanti medinI kecid ruDira ganDena Bramante medinI talam viviDAH mAtarA hi ete graha muKyAH tu bAliSA kumAra kumArikA rUpAH grahAH proktAH viviDA parA Bramante medinIm kRtsnAm kzaNa mAtreNa sarvatas sahasram yojanam kecid vAyu vat BramatA aparAH paSu veza kRtA kecid dRzwyA nazwA ca jantuzu viviDam karoti sarve te sarvatra vasuDA tale mRta pUtaka sattvezu suptaH upahate taTA gRhNate mAnuzAm kecid bali mAlya arTa kAraNAt sarvezAm mAnuzAm loke kramante kecid naBastalAt sarva AkAra vidaH jQeyAH bahu rUpAH vikAriNaH SuBAH aSuBa rAvAH ca jQeyA liFgEH tu sarvatas SuBa aSuBa Palam sarvam vikRtam sukRtam taTA AgamEH bahuviDEH jQeyAH loka tattva arTa cihnitEH RziBiH jinasutEH ca eva KaxgiBiH jina varEH sadA SrAvakEH mahardDikEH sarvam nAnA yoni samASritam vEdya grahEH graha varEH KyAtEH prakRzwEH loka cihnitEH jQeyam SAstrataH tattvam Agama aDigamA api vA nAnA liFga viDAnena gati yoni viBAvataH jQeyam SuBa aSuBam sarvam krUrEH sOmyEH ca liFgiBiH Catram Sitam patAkam ca matsam mAMsam ca sArdrayoH utkziptA ca medInI padmayantra gomayam tadA daDi puzpam Palam ca eva striyam vA ambara BUzitAm Sukla vastram taTA jQeyam dvijam SreyA arTa BAziNam vRzam gajam taTA jQeyam aSvam ca amara BUzitam pradIpam BAjane nyastam pUrNaDAnya Pala udayam deva dvija pratimAm vA pUjyamAnA sadA nRpEH aBizeka ArtTa yuktam vA nRpa bimba aTa mantriNAm SaFKa svanam BerIn= ca pawaham ca api su dunduBim GaNwA Sabdam prahRzwam ca jaya Sabdam praGozitam mAnuzya udIritAm vAcAm jaya sidDi Pala pradam etAH nimittAH mA AvedyaH izwAm ca eva niveditAm sarva sampad karam kzemam izwam ca eva su pUjitam sarvAm prApnuyAt artTAm saPalAm manasA udBavAm mantra jApam tatas gacCet sidDi artTI sidDim AdiSet sarvezAm sarva sattvAnAm prasTitAnAm tu nirdiSet yaH yam devatA aDyakzaH izwaH gotra jaH paraH ADyezwyaH Bavet nityam tam liFgI paSyataH Palam viviDa AkAra cihnAH tu devAH proktAH tu sarvadA tad liFginA taTA proktAH viviDAH veza cihnayaH yaH yam izwataram paSyet saH tasya eva Pala udayam vAcAm bahuviDAm vavre yadA te mAnuzAH Buvi kaTayanti SuBAm vAcAm anyonya AlApam AsRtAH parezAm ca yadA vavre viSvastAH ca samantataH evam ca vAcire mUcuH SuBam Sreyam japam sadA kzemam Arogya sarvam vE svasti SAnti suKa udayaH DaninaH devataH muKya suraH DarmarAjAH taTA sarvatas BAskaraH ca eva Catra Dvaja patAkayoH vEdya budDa Darma tadA saFGam mantram tAra mitiH sadA kumAram kAQcanam SuBram agni skanDam mahA utsavam jinam padma taTA vajram lokeSam boDim uttamam boDisattvA taTA lokAm brahmaH ca eva sura uttamAm bahu prakArAH hi anekAni praSastAm SADu varNitAm SuSrAva SabdAm yaTA gantA sarvAsAm prApnuyAH hi sO tatas nye loka vidvizwam sa Sabdam ca api ninditam praSastA SakunayaH hi etA prasTitAnAm jape ratAm sarvezAm ca mayam yogaH udyogArtTa sa sampadAm
