column1: tatas nya ninditam sarva na leBe kAyitam Palam praSastA eva sarvatas gacCe apraSastEH ca na vrajet praNamya sarvatas budDAn= trayam kRtvA pradakziNam sva mantram mantra nATam ca mAtA pitrO Ta duHkarAm praNamya sarvatas gacCe Sivam tatra vinirdiSet Acarya guru muKyAnAm upADyAyam ca eva yatnatas praSasta DArma kaTika praSastam ca eva vrate ratam yaTArham tadA aByarcyaH izwadevamanehitam snAta BuktaH Ta viSvastaH pratyUze vA jita indriyaH SOca AcAra rataH mantrI gacCet sarvatas diSAm yaTA ASA Pala saMyogam prApnuyAt sarvatas SuBAm SAnti svastyayanam ca eva AyuH Arogya vardDanam SrI sampad kaTitAm agryAH yaTezwam manasA Ipsitam iti mahAyAna vEpulya sUtrAt boDisattva piwaka avataMsakAt Arya maQju SrI mUla kalpAt viMSatimaH sarva BUta ruta jQAna nimitta Sakuna nirdeSa parparisamAptam iti vEdya aTa trayoviMSatitamaH pawala visaraH aTa Kalu BagavAn SAkya muniH punar api SudDAvAsa Bavanam avalokya maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam Amantrayate sma asti maQjuSrIH tvadIya kalpa visare SabdagaNanA nirdeSam nAma vivarttanam SRNu sADu ca suzWu ca manasi kuru BAzizye ham evam ukte BagavAn maQjuSrIH kumAra BUtaH utTAya AsanAt eka aMSam uttarAsaFgam kRtvA dakziNam jAnu maNxalam pRTivyAm pratizWApya yena BagavAn= tena aQjalim praNamya tris pradakziNIkRtya BagavataH caraNayoH nipatya utTAya evam Aha  tat sADu BagavAm nirdiSatu SabdajQAnagaNanAnirdeSam nAma Darma paryAyam SrutvA sarva mantra caryA anupravizwAnAm sattvAnAm ca sarva Sabda gaNanA jQAnam tat Bavizyati sarva sattvAnAm sarva mantra caryA anupravizwAnAm ca hita udayam suKa Avaham sarva Sabda gaNanA samati krama jQAnam tat BagavAm arTa kAmaH hita ezI sarva sattvAnAm arTe BAzayatu aTa BagavAm SAkya muniH maQju Sriyasya kumAra BUtasya sADukAram adAt sADu sADu maQjuSrIH yaH tvam taTAgatam etam etam arTam sattva sattva arTa sampadam prati prastitavyam manyase tena hi tvA maQjuSrIH SRNu nirdekzyAmi aTa Kalu maQjuSrIH BagavatA kRta aByanujQAtaH tata utTAya sve Asane nizaNNaH BUt Darma SravaNAya Bagavantam vyalokayamAnaH aTa BagavAm SAkya muniH sarvAvantam SudDAvAsa Bavanam budDa cakzuzA mavalokya sarva Sabda gaNanA samatikrama AspandanAH nAma samADim samApadyate sma samanantara samApannasya BagavataH nIla pIta avadAta mAQjizWa sPawika varNa AdayaH mahA raSmi jAla praBA maNxalA niScaceruH niScarya ca samantAt sarva sattvAnAm sarva loka DAtum mahatA avaBAsena avaBAsya sarva sattva BavanAni ca sarva naraka tiryak preta AyAmalOkikAm asurA BavanAm avaBAsayitvA mahA duHKa vedanAm pratipraSrutya punar eva BagavataH SAkya muneH kAya anta rdDIyante sma sarva sattvAnAm sampraboDya BagavAn evam Aha aTa Sabda vidam jQAnam bADyam Darma arTa pUjitam gaNanAm ca eva loka jQaH BAzire maDurAm girAm bADyAt padataH jQeyam padam bADyasu BUzitam DAtuH tena ati vistAram pratyaya antam kriyA udBavam liFgam Sabdata jQeyam na liFgam Sabda varjitam Sabda liFga samudBedAH nIta Darma arTayoH nAnA na iyam Sabda ca jQAnam na Sabdam jQAna yojitaH jQAna SabdAt ca yaH BAvaH sa SabdaH tattva arTa yojanaH pratyayAH hetu tA jQeyA pratyayaH hetum udBavaH pratyaye tu tadA hetO kriyA yoga viBAvinI vEdya DAraNA vA tadaH hi uktAH ASrayaH pratyayaH vidA DAtu pratyaya yogena SabdaH Darma arTa yojakaH na SabdaH arTataH jQeyam na SabdAt arTam izyate arTa pratyaya yogena sa SabdaH SabdaviDEH vidAH bahuDA DAtavaH proktA pratyayAH ca tad ASrayA yam pratItya tadA SabdAH viBejuH te vara ASrayA yena Sabda vidaH vidyA mantrA tattva arTa BAzitA na tAm Sabda vat avagacCet mantrANAm pratyayEH vinA na utpadyante taTA mantrAH vinA pratyayam ASrayA na tAm didRkzu sarvatra mantrAm pratyayataH SivAm arTa pratyaya tAm SUnyAm DAtavEH ca vivarjitAm na tAm vidDi saMyogam liFga vAkya arTa sammatam na liFge gati nirdizwA hetu pratyaya DAtu jA taTA aSvayojitA sidDiH liFgaH Darma arTa yojitA gati deSa kriyA nizWam padam vAkyam atas param citra tvam ativA Sabde yaH vAcam avasRjet sadA na SabdAt arTa nizpattiH liFgezu eva tu yojitA mUrdDajam kaTitam Sabdam huFkAra arTa BUzitam sarvam pratyaya dASritya ASrayam ca vinA ASraye

column1: tAlu ozWa puwaH vAkyaH ASraya udBAvanaH pare SaminAt ASrayate jQeyam yuktiH avyaBicAriNI matiH tattva taTA DAto vistArAm arTa BUzitA DAtuH karoti saMyogam pratyaya arTAt tu liFgitaH dAntyam tAlavaH ca eva ozWam SAbdam atas param Rjikzu sarvatas lokAm visargAm DAtu cezwitAm gati mantra praBAvena ASraya antAm niboDatAm gatim eva sadA mantrAH DAtu pratyaya jA matA uBO tAm Sabda niHpattim pratyamAt ASrayaH smRtaH viBajya bahuDA mantrAm sadBAva Agama niSriyAm viBakti yoni jAH hi ezA SabdAH mantrAH ca sarvatas vEdya jQeyAH viBajati arTe    pUjitAH taTA eka dvika samAyogAt trika saFKyA arTa saptamam asaFKyAt azwa aDikA jQeyA mAnuzANAm niboDitA ADAram jQeyam iti AhuH mantra tantra arTa pUjane saptame viDi nirdizwAH mantra sidDizu jApinAm saptam arTa arTataH jQeyA saptamasya kramaH yaTA viviDam krama nirdeSam saptamI arTezu yojayet mantrANAm zazWayaH KyAtA samUha avayavAH taTA sambanDAt hi mantrANAm liFge dve niyojitA vikAram bahuDAH tasya zaz prakAram nigadyate strIzu sa liFginI zazWyA azwa mantrezu yojayet paQca prakArAH ye mantrA paQcam arTa arTa yatna tA napuMsaka liFga mantra arTaH uktaH Darma arTa varjitA ye tatra nisRtA mantrAH apAdAna arTa yojitA sarveprANa harAH smRtAH mUrDna Sabda samAyogAt niHsRtAH ozWa dantayoH jihvA nizpIxitA ye tra Sabda prANa aparoDikA sama pratyaya SAntA te Sami DAtu sa yojitA prapannAsa kara antAnAm asti ayanetra yojayet puzwyA arTAH DAtavaH ye tu SabdAH pratyaya arTa su SoBitA tAm viduH puzwi karmezu apAdAnezu yojitAH viBajya yam sTAnam ye nye parikIrttitAH Sabda akzara vipuzwA te DAtu vikasate sPuwA puMskaliFgA taTA mantrAH mahA praBOvarTa yojitA caturTa saMviBaktiByAm akzaram mAtra BUzitam pavarge kaTitam hi agre pravaram sarva kArmakam rePa pratyaya sama udBUtam ukArO= aTa SoBanam maDya cihnam visargam ca BakAram gati BUzitam viduH pravaram Sabdam sarva karma arTa sADanam niyatam nEzWike vartma boDisattve niyojite anuttaram Sabdam iti AhuH mahA boDi paTam paTam yam japam mAnuzaH kzipram sarva mantrA prasADayet

column1: budDaH lokaguruH SrezWaH Catra uzNIzA iti lakzyate ante takAra varge tu kaTitAH lokaguro trikam mantrA sarvatas hi agrye sa SabdaH loka pUjitaH akAra antam viBakta arTam visargantam viboDitam maDyalim  sa Sabda antam antam Sabda viBUzitam tam viduH Sabdam utkRzwam mantram deva pUjitam paQcama arTe niyuktAH ye saFKye gaNanA udBave viBakta paQcame hi ete viBaktyA arTa supaQcamA anantA kaTitA mantrAH anantA jina BAzitA mantrAH uzNIzA     jina mUrdDajA anantA Sabda vidaH jQeyA SabdAH sarva arTa sampadAH catuHzazwi para upetAm mantram Sabda yojitam sa SabdA sarvatas SrezWaH pavarge yaH caturam padam catur makAra saMyogAH ante niH prayojitA sa SabdA mantra muKyAH tu Catra saMjQA arTa sADakA caturTa gaNanA proktA viBaktiH Sabda yoni jAH sampradAna arTa mantrANAm dvi liFgAt ASraya tAm gatAH kaTitA abjine mantrA puzwyam arTa arTa sampadA caturTa kaTitA mantrA catur prakArA niyojitA catur akzara SabdAnAm mUrDam UzmA aTa tAlavam kaTitam Sabda nirdeSe tRtIye samprayojayet vikAsa arTam sPuwa DAtUnAm pratyaye liFge Ta yojayet praTame ante ca yaH SabdaH sa SabdaH loka pUjitaH varaH mantraH praDAna AKyaH    sat niyojitaH sa SabdaH puzwinaH hi uktaH abdaketu samudBavaH trAntaH trika samAyogaH maDya antaH tivarNitaH vEdya sa SabdaH loka muKyaH sO pravaraH arTataH sadA DAtva upetam sat AkAram sama arTe tam prayojayet uza same ca tadA vavre DAtum tAm niboDatAm maDura akzara sampannaH utvam tAm puMsi yojitAm sa SabdaH lokam agraH sO pravaraH mantram ucyate catuzwyAm tam akzaram varjye dvitIyAyAm parikIrtitA sa jQeyaH SAnti kAmya arTam pravaraH budDa BAzitaH tRtIyaH ozWa puwa UzmANam pratyaya arTa anta varjitam puzwi liFge sadA yuktaH BUDAtonta yojitaH UrDva cihnam taTaH BrAntam sa mantraH budDa BAzitaH tRtIye viBaktim AsRtya yaH rTaH BUti sa SabdayoH AdyA varNataH grAhyA agrA SAntikA pOzwika udayA dvitIyam karmaNi proktam tRtIyA karaNe staTA uBayaH viBaktayaH jQeyam sa SabdaH mantra rAj smRtaH praTamam karmam iti AhuH kartA yaH svatantrayoH jina abja kuliSe mantre mantra nATAH hitAH taTA hite viBakti antA sarvatas jQeyA pratyaya antAH ca DAtu jA sa liFgam arTataH jQeyam vAkyAt padayA udBavet mantrAH kaTita muKyAH tu viBoH jina jA surAH jina abja kulayoH mantrAH vajriNe lOkikAH taTA marTavataH DAtum parigRhNAti saFkramAm udAttAn udAttAH ca eva sUcitA jQeya arTa sADanA mantrAH liFga gata antA ca maDye hutvA taTA udyatAH anAdiniDanam Sabdam tad mantrAn= ca yojayet nivAntA kalamantAH ca rePa yuktAH ca vistarA bADya arTa padayoH maDye yaH liFga= Cavit Srutam tam liFgam svarita upetam kzipram mantrezu yojayet pUrva anupadayaH kAla kriyA Saktizu yujyate padayoH maDya niHzpattiH yaH rTaH sa Sabda viSrutaH tasmAt tam parijQeya arTam surUpam rUpa varNitam Pala arTe nizpada Sreyam sa mantraH budDa BAzitaH vEdya aBAva svaBAvataH kAlam svaBAvataH ca parikIrtyate tayoH nija rayam SAntam pada Darma arTa BUzitam vAkyam paratas Sreyam SAntam arTa akzaram SuBam yam jQeyaH mantriBiH mantrA praSastA budDa BAzitA itim eka akzaram brahmam om Sabda arTa BUzitam jQeyAH rUpiNaH SuBraH praSastaH maFgala Avaho kalyANa arTa karaH hi uktaH praSastaH maFgala anvitaH uktaH lokanATEH tu sa mantraH muKyatas smRtaH viviDa arTAH ca Sabda muKyAH ca muKya SabdA pareH taTA sa SabdaH DarmiNaH SreyaH kriyA kAla krama uditA Aditya vaMSAt te mantrAH dIpti Sabda arTa BUzitAH jvalante pAvake mantrAH sOmya asOmya AKya yojitAH surUpA sOmya cittAH ca nakzatra aBiDArmiNaH sadA candre smim uditAH mantrAH SabdEH candra akzara uditEH sucayaH nirmalA proktA akzarA ekajA parA amAtra saha viKyAtA cAru varNA mahardDikA mantrAH agra varA proktAH uzNIzA jinasUnuBiH viviDa AkAra yogAH tu yoga tuzwiH iva sTitA prasannA SucayaH nityam pratyeka arhaTa BAzitA pratyekabudDayoH mantra praSastaH SAnti karmaNe svAhA avasAnayoH mantrAH oFkAra arTa pUjitaH eka dvika saMjQA saH sa mantraH sarva karmasu SreyasA eva sadA yojyA pratyeka jinam udBavaH nantaH sahitaH jQeyaH pUrva dAH ca anta maDyamam bahu liFginaH mantrAH bahu mantra arTam akzarA bahuDA DAtavaH hi ete   zAntA niboDitA mantrAm tAm tu vE sidDiH tavarge mA Adim akzaram rePa antam Aditas tAxayet mantra abja samBavAH tAraya duHKitAm sattvAm karuNA ezAm avalokite sA vE tAra muKyA tu anantAH mantrAH hi vE ture tvaryAt SabdayoH maDye pavarga mAmakI smRtA vEdya pavarge devam viKyAtA kula mAtA arTa sADanI sita cihnA prasidDa arTe devI paNxaravAsinI tArA tu kaTitam pUrvam rakzaH rTe tAm prayojaye lakAra bahulaH yaH Dargat Sabda antam te traya udBavam jina aFgam asRjam Sabdam devI locanam ucyate Sabdam arTa akzaram sidDiH sarva mantra izuH yojayet kula mAtrA prasidDA iyam jina vajra abja sarvatas sarva mantrezu prayoktavyA pUrvam Adita SAntaye locanA Buvi viKyAtA mantra agrA tatra sADanI yatas sarvam iti jQeyam Adi mantrezu yojayet prasidDi arTam ca mantrANAm Atma rakzA arTa kAraNam sa prasidDA sarvatas jQeyA devIm tam jina locanAm aneka AkAra rUpA aH tu mantrA sa Sabdate sadA Adi maDyezu varNezu catuzazwyA akzarezu ca sarvatra sarva varNezu mantrAm tantrAn= ca yojayet Adimezu ca sarvatra tavargA tat ca varNayoH sarve SAntinaH proktAnAm triDA prayojayet takArAt prakRti varNezu lakAra antA sarva yoni jA te maya pOzwikAH varNA tad anye ca aBicArukAH te punar triviDA jQeyA krUra SAntika pOzwikAH taTA te tris prakArAH tu taTA hi uktA triDA triDA yoga samAyAmAH anantA te punar triDA sOmyAm akzarAm vidDi SAntaye tam viyojayet varadA hi akzarA kecid maDyamA puzwi hetukA rOdrAm pApa karAm jQeyA hakAra antAm akzarAm parAm evam etat prayogeNa SabdEH ca api su BUzitAm anantAm hi akzarAm bidDi anantAH mantra devatAH evam etena yogena anantAm mantrAn= ca yojayet tam viduH mantra rAjAnam puMskam sarva arTa sADakam ekAra sahitaH yaH varNaH sa SabdaH mantra BUzitaH napuMsakam tam viduH mantram maDya karmezu yojayet vEdya ikAra sahitaH yaH varNaH sa mantraH vidyate kIrtyate sA strI itare mantrezu prasidDA kzudra karmasu te triDA punar sarve tra nAnA Sabda viBUzitAH triDAm tAm triviDAm sarvAm sarva karmezu yojayet put liFga saMjQaH yaH vAkyaH puruzaH rTaH sarvatas mataH tam viduH puruza mantram vE sarva karmezu yojayet napu saMkaliFge yaH mantraH tAm vidDi napuMsakam kuryAt sarva karmezu sarva sOKya suKa udayam strI liFga saMjQaH yaH mantraH tAm vidDi sadA striyam sarva karma karA te pi nityam rakzezu yojayet ananta karma karAH mantrAH ananta arTA SabdayonayaH viviDA Sabda muKyAH tu nAnA tantra mantra yutAm taTA eva Acare kzipram mantrA sidDi antya yatnataH kaTitam Sabda vijQAnam sarva mantra arTa sADanam gaNanam kIrtyate buDEH jApinAm hita kAmya arTam tAm tu vidDi divOkasAH etat vikasamAyogA  yAvat Satam ucyate daSaguNam paQcakAm viMSat sahasram tam niboDatAm daSa sAhasrikaH saFKya ayutA iti parikIrtyate daSa ayutAH taTA nityam prayutam lakzam ucyate lakza sAhasrikaH kowiH sTAna arbudam smRtam daSArbudaH nirbudaH jQeyaH samudram ca tatas pare daSaH nyat sAgaraH jQeyaH tAH daSa arTe samudyataH akzoByam pare vindyAt niHkzoByam ca tatas pare devarAj sarve vivAham kIrtyate buDEH aDikAH daSa tare tasya Kaxgam iti Ahu vANijAH niKaxgam tat viduH mantrI niKaxgam ca api Kaxginam tatas pareNa SaFKam vE saFKyA tasya pareNa tu sA mayA gaNite jQeyA mahAmAya nipaScimA asaFKyA yA viduH martyA tatas nye deva yoni jAm daSArDa guNitA sarve sArDA ca daSa yojitAH vEdya tatas pareNa Sakyam vE aSakyam ca api durjayam arcita upacitaH sTAne dRzwi sTAnam viduH buDAH tatas kRzwi nikRzwiH ca ananta ananta yoni jA tatas pareNa budDAnAm jQAnam SrAvaka KaxginAm budDa putra mahAtmAnaH ye pi tattva vidaH surAH anantAH gatayaH hi ezAm gaNanam sTAnam uttamam ananta jQAninAm sTAnam na atra BU tala vAsinAm kaTitam gaNite sTAnam gaNita jQEH tu mantriBiH mantra sidDi arTa yuktAnAm japa kAle niyojanAm pramANam gaNite jQeyam mantra jApa arTa kAraNA saFKyA grahaNa pramANam vA viDi yuktaH rTa jApinAm asidDA praviSe vinDyam sidDa mantraH vraje hitam taTA hEmavatam SElam column1: satatam budDa aDizWitaH Bavati mahA praBAvaH yam mahA anuSaMsaH sarva karmasu mudrA Adi ka maNxalu viDAna pawa sADana upayikezu sattva AnupUrvam prayoktavyaH sarvam sADayati yad manasA aBirucitam sADakena iti tatas mudrANi Bavanti Satam ca azwa sa aDikam uzNIza mudrA praTamam kuryAt cakriNe jine tatas parama loke sa padmamudrA iti kaTyate tRtIyam vajra mudram tu vajrapANi samAviSe caturTam devatA mudram svastikam tu vinirdiSet vEdya paQcamam KaxgamudrA tu rAkzasAnAm iha ucyate zazWam gadamudrA tu yakzANA me prakIrtitA saptamam asurANAm tu mantrANAm vajra muzwi samoditA azwamam SUlamudrA tu sarva kroDezu paWyate navamam puzpamudrA tu yakza yakzIzu kIrttitA daSamam mudgaram vindyAt Param ekAdaSam param dvAdaSam Sakti nirdizwA kArttikeyasya bAliSaH maQjuGozasya viKyAtam utpalam tu prayojayet trayodaSAnAm saFKyA nirdizwAH muniBiH sattva deSiBiH caturdaSam tu Bavet SaFKaH BerI paQcAdaSA smRtA pawahaH zoxaSA jQeyaH dunduBiH saptadaSaH paraH azwAdaSa taTA badDamUnaviMSat karaNam ucyate viMSat paraSu nirdizwA saFKyAyAH tu pramANataH sita patrA taTA acCatram uzNIzANAm prakIrttitam cIvaram pAtra nirdizwam Ka Karam tu mataH param kRpA mEtrI taTA prajQA DyAna SIla taTA api ca kzAnti dAna Adikam zawkam nirdizwam loka nAyakEH budDAnAm kaTitAH hi ete zaw pAramitA ASravAt triMSat cakriNe mudrA kaTitAH loka puFgavEH eka akzarasya vIrasya mantrANAm aDipateH viBo lokeSvarasya vidyAnAm kaTitA azwaviMSati sADikA sitA AKyA mahASvetA taTA paNxaravAsinI BRkuwI ca taTA devI budDAnAm hRdaya udBavA tArAyAH kaTyate mudrA utpalam tu niyojayet hayagrIvasya tu BImasya mudrA vaktraH iti smRtA vajrapANe taTA mudrA triMSaH eka Bavanti te sarve praharaNA tasya nAnA AkArA yuDizWitA catvAraH pi mahAmudrA proktAH mAra maNxale rudrasya SUla nirdizwaH brahmasya akzamAlam tu vizNoH cakramitiH taTA

column1: sarva mantra prayogezu    utkRzwa sadA tena mudrA tadA deyA Sizyasya avicikitsataH taTA mantra prayoga jQaH SuciH dakzaH kula anvitaH AcAryaH DArmikaH DImAm aBiziktaH dRzwa maNxalaH tena upadarSitAH mantrAH SizyaH gRhyeta tantra vid SizyeNa kAryaH taTA premaH budDasya iva guroH taTA anyaTA na sidDi mantrANAm sarva mudrezu vA sadAt iti AdO tAvat SuciH BUtvA prAFmuKaH Sukla candanena hastam udvartya pUrvam tAvat samaya mudrA banDitavyA BagavataH uzNIzasya mudrA uBO karO kRta aQjali puwO aSuzirO Izin kuQcitO kuxmala AkArO akoSa padma AnanO ayam BagavataH budDasya samaya mudrA tat eva hastO prasAritO sampuwa avasTO padma vikasita AkArAH avalokitasya mudrA uBO hastO pUrvavat karam AvezwayitvA aByantara sTitABiH aFgulIBiH kanyasaH tarjanyA uparizWAH nizpIxayet iyam maQju SriyaH kumAra BUtasya utpala mudrA vEdya  tat eva kanyasO saFkocya pUrvavat tarjanI ABiH aFguzWa sametO sTitikAH eva utpala kuxmala AkAra darSayet sarvaFgamAnAm iyam tArAyAH mudrA tat eva saFkocya netra AkAram kRtvA iyam mudrAH Arya BRkuwyAH tat eva lalAwe yojayet iyam devyadevyA netra mudrA punar api tam saFkocya uBO maDyama aFguliBiH sandaMSa AkAram kRtvA mastaka upari sTApayet iyam BagavataH cakravartinaH ekAkzarasya mahAmudrA sarva karmikA tat eva lalAwe sTApayet budDasya BagavataH hRdaya mudrA akzNO sTApayet tat eva cakravartinaH netra mudrA tat eva muKe sTApayet tat eva vidyA aDipateH cakravartinaH eka akzarasya vaktra mudrA

column1: evam yAva mantrI ca BujO jAnu jaFGA caraNa Adizu viMSat prakArAH Bavanti mudrAH azwO mahAmudrAH Bavanti sarva karmasu prayoktavyA tat eva kara sampuwam maDyama aFgulI Avezwitam kRtvA kanyasA aFguli sUcIkRtAm uBO aFguzWa agra yava AkAra sTitO tarjanyA prasAritO kRta sUcyA koSIkRtO= uBO nirmAmikO vakrIkRta paryantO su vinyastO iyam BagavatAm Darma cakra mahAmudrA tat eva aFguzWO vinAmya maDye prasArya iyam budDAnAm catur mAra parAjaya mudrA tat eva mudrAm SirasyA upariDAya darSayet sarva budDAnAm sarvakleSanizUdanam nAma mahAmudrA tat eva lalAwe sTApayet mahAkaruNA nAma sarva budDAnAm mudrA tat eva hRdaye sTApya sarvadRzwiSalyAByudDaraNam nAma mahAmudrA tat eva mudram uBO nyaset sarvavidyAprasADanam nAma mahAmudrA tat eva mudrA grIvA saMnyaset sarvAnarTapraSamana karI nAma mahAmudrA tat eva mudrA sarvatas BrAmayet mahArakzA arTasampAtanam nAma mahAmudrA evam anena prakAreNa azwO mahAmudrAH Bavanti sarva arTa sADakAH

column1: jaya uzNIzasya mudrAH Bavanti tat eva karapallavaH vAma hasta prasAritO dakziNatas tiryakam iyam sita Atapatrasya= Catra mudrA tat eva hastO taTA vinyastO Sirasi BagavataH jaya uzNIzasya mudrA uBO kara talO sampuwIkRtya mUrDnim sTApitaH uzNIza AkAraH iyam BagavataH aByudgata uzNIzasya mudrA tat eva mudrAm vikAzayet iyam jvAlA mAlina uzNIza mahAmudrA sarva karmikA sarva Bayezu ca prayoktavyA sarva karmasu tat eva mudrA urasi sTApayet sarva uzNIzANAm iyam mahAmudrA tat eva hastO Avezwya avasTitO su dRXO sarva taTAgatAnAm mahA kavaca mudrA sarva viGnezu prayoktavyA tat eva hastO uBaya agra avasTitO pustaka AkArO uraH maDye nyaset iyam sA sarva budDAnAm janetrI prajQApAramitA mahAmudrA sarva sattvAnAm darSayet sarva viGnezu sarvAn arTAm praSamayati sarva arTAm sampAdayati smRti saQjananam kurute tat eva hastO lalAwe nyaset sarva budDAnAm aBizekaH Darma mahAmudrA sarva aBizekezu prayoktavyaH sarva sattvAnAm tat eva hastO citra AkAreNa lalAwe nyaset sarvamAravidrApanam nAma mahAmudrA tat eva hastO saFkucita AkArO anyonya saFkucita saktO sUcyA AkAreNa vyavasTitO maDyama aFguli prasAritO sUcIkRta cihnO aFguzWa udvandva parAm iyam BagavataH tejaH rASeH mahAmudrA tat eva mudram SirasA upari niDAya iyam aparA taTAgata uzNIzasya tejaH rASeH mahAmudrA tat eva hastO lalAwe sTApayet tena eva AkAreNa iyam BagavataH tRtIyA netra mudrA tat eva hastO uBaya citrIkRtO anyonya upari sTitO dakziNA arTam aTa vAma sampuwa AkAra sTitO anyonya aFguzWa kanyasA vezwitO

column1: iyam vEdya  sarva budDAnAm mahA vajrAsana mUla mudrA tat eva hastO mUrDni darSitO mahA boDi vRkza mUla mudrA tat eva hastO sampuwitO pRzWIkRtO sarva budDAnAm sarvamAraviDvaMsana karI nAma mudrA tat eva hastO anyonya avasaktO grIvAyAm nyaset sarvaBUtavaSIkarI nAma mudrA tat eva kaNWe DArayet sarvaBUta vilokanI nAma mahAmudrA tat eva jAnuByAm nyaset sarvadurgativiSoDanI nAma mahAmudrA tat eva UrDvam cikzipet sarvadevotpattisannicayam nAma mahAmudrA tat eva hastO aBayA AkAram uBO sarvaBogavizayam nAma SaniH nAma mahAmudrA tat eva aQjalya kAreNa murDni sTApayet sarvabudDakzetrAkramaNI nAma mahAmudrA tat eva hastO uBO karNe sTApayet sPuwa AkAreNa sarvanAgadamanI nAma mahAmudrA tat eva hastO uBO sampuwam kRtvA nAsA agre DAritavyaH sarvabudDAnAm Alambanam nAma mahAmudrA tat eva mudram SirasyA upari nyaset sarvabudDAByudgata uzNIzaH nAma mahAmudrA evam anena AkAreNa asaFKyAni Bavanti sarva taTAgata uzNIzANAm mudrANi asaFKyeyEH budDEH BagavadBiH asaFKyeya cakravarti kulam asaFKyeyAH cakravartinaH tezAm aDipatiH eka akzaraH cakravarttI mantra aDipa asaFKyeyAH ca taTAgata uzNIza rAjAnaH asaFKyeyAH ca sarva mantrezu kalpa visarA tezAm saMkzepataH vakzyate mudrA ca atra Bavati ekaH eva sarvezAm hRdayaH eka akzaraH cakravarttI tasya eva mUlamudrA sA iha eva ucyate mantrezu nirdizwAH mahA praBAva amita ojasaH yasyAH banDanAt eva sarva mantra aBimuKAH Bavanti sarva budDAH ca BagavantaH sidDim anuprayacCante aDizWinti ca vidyA sADakam cakravarti smaraNAt eva mantra nATam eka akzaram advitIyam daSa budDa kowI kuSala mUla arjitaH Bavati catasraH pi mUlA pattayoH Apannasya BikzA tat mahAntam naraka upapatti vedanIyam karma kzayam gacCati smaraNAt eva kaH punar vAdaH japam paQca AnantaryANi ca kzayam gacCanti kaH punar vAdaH nye akuSalAH sa tasmAt sarva prayatnena ayam vidyA rAja aDipaH eka akzaraH smartavyaH japtavyaH BAvayitavyaH manasi kartavyasatatam eva ArADayitavyaH namaH samantabudDAnAm BrUm eza sa mArzA sarva uzNIzANAm taTAgata BAzitAnAm ayam mUlamantraH anena eva mantra aDipatinA uzNIza cakravartinA taTAgata mUrDajena sarva karmANi kArayet mudrA upetena sarva mantrezu lOkika lokottarezu kalpa visarezu niyatam siDyati

column1: sarva viGna praSamanI AyuH Arogya varDanI SrezWA sarva mantrANAm rakzA karma viDAna tA nara nArI kumArANAm sOBAgya jananam param manuzya amanuzyAH ca ye ca anye duzwa sattva cetasA rAkzasoH tArakA pretA skandApasmAra guhyakA mAtR BUta graha gaNAH yoga mantra kRtAni ca rujaH rogaH vyADayaH ca nAnA DAtu samudBavAH sarpa mUzika lUtAH ca kIwa vizPowakAni ca SarIre na kramizyanti karmaNA anyatra pUrvakAt aDva vAda vivAdezu rAja cora udaka agnizu jayam kzemam Sivam SAntim lapsyate na atra saMSayaH BUrja patre TavA vastre liKitvA anyatra vA kvacid SirasA grIva kawyA vA bAhunA pANinA aTa vA vEdya vastra banDam SiKA banDam kRtvA granTimAlikAm DArayizyati yaH nityam svasti tasya Bavizyati yaH ca imAm prAtar utTAya svapan= ca parivartaye suKam kAla kriyAm kRtvA sapta jAtIm smarizyati rUpavAm SIla sampannaH muKena utpala ganDinA priyaH ca Adeya vAkyaH ca jAtyAm jAtyAm Bavizyati Bavanti ca atra sidDAni mantra padAni mantra saMjQAni yaTA ukta arTa karANi tu  tat yaTA BaQjane stamBane DA DA DA Datsa yA yA yA yate hA hA hA hate para karaNi vIryevIrye guNa teja BUta kari Badra kari rOdra kari kumBavati viza kumBavati sarva bale BUta bale rakza rakza mAm sarva vizeByaH sarva viGneBya tat yaTA  sidDakari sidDArtTe sidDa manoraTe sidDa kArye Puru nu rUpe svaste praSaste sidDi sidDArTe DEryavati samane tapane SaraNe Badre Bavati SAnte dAnte Sive hununu pari paritrANam kuru parigraham kuru paripAlanam kuru SAntim kuru svastyayanam kuru mama sarva sattvAnAm ca rakzAm kuru svAhA ayam hRdayaH aparAjitAyAH pUrvam mUla vidyA avaSyam sADakena kuSala pakza aBimuktena Bavitavyam tris kAlam japtavyam pUrvataram eva sakRt pustaka vAcikAyAm vAcayet etat eva kuSala pakzam Bavati upahRdayam ca atra Bavati  namaH saptAnAm samyaksambudDAnAm sa SrAvaka saFGAnAm sarva vEra Baya atItAnAm vipaScinaH tejasA RdDyA ca SiKinaH taTA viSva Buj prajQayA ca eva krakucCanda balena ca kanaka muneH SikzAyAm kASyapasya guNoH api SAkya siMhasya vIryeNa Sivam Bavatu sadA mama tat yaTA  jaye vijaye aparAjite mAra sEnya pramardanIye svAhA sarva arTa sADanIye svAhA ezA BagavatI sarva arTa sADikAH yaTA yaTA prayujyate taTA taTA karmANi karoti sarvatra ca rakzA viDAnezu prayoktavyA avaSyam sADakena manasi karttavyA sarva viGnAm nASayati sarva mAra karmANi ca viDamayati sarva mantrANi ca amuKIkaroti

column1: ezA taTAgata UrNA mudrA apratihatA sarva karmasu sarva prayoktavyA gorocanena tilakam kRtvA mantram japatA taTAgata UrNA saFgrAmam avatare sarva SatravaH stamBitAH Bavanti dRzwvA tam prapalAyante vigata kroDAH ca Bavanti mEtra cittAH hita cittA sarva sattvAH samASvastAH ca Bavanti dRzwvA tam rocana tilakam kRtvA sarva kravyAda AdayaH na Sakyante dRzwvA tam mahA rAja mahA sattva maheSa AKya mahA utsAham jvalantam iva paSyante sarva duzwa praduzwAnAm sarva yakza rAkzasa preta piSAca sarva graha BUta kaSmalAH rOdra cittAH mEtra cittAH Bavanti apakramante tasmAt deSAt sarva upadrava caryeByaH ca mucyate sarva graha gRhItezu sarva mAtara bAla grahezu brahmarAkzasa Adizu gorocanam aBimantrya lalAwe tilakam kRtvA darSayet sarve dRzwa mAtrA pramuQcante vidravanti ca prapalAyante sarveNa sarvam tasmE na Bavanti na BUyas gRhNante yadi gRhNanti sarveNa sarvam vinaSyanti evam sarva grahezu prayoktavyaH sarvatas mantra tantrANAm kalpezu yAni uktAni viviDAni sADayati lOkika lokottarezu yAni viDAna maNxala pawa sADanAni tani anena eva sADyAni kziprataram siDyante

column1: gorocanam aBimantrya tilakam kRtvA Satru maDye praviSet vigata kroDAH Bavanti na Sakyante aBiBavitum mahA jana maDye japatA praviSet sarve mEtra citrAH Bavanti Adeya vAkyaH ca Bavanti parEH anaBiBavanIyaH ca aDRzyaH ca sarvatra sarva BUtAnAm gorocanena aBimantrya sapta vAra Ananena mantreNa tilakam kRtvA mahA SmaSAnam praviSet

column1: jyezWa aFgulIyakO= UrDva sTitO lalAwa deSe nyaset eza BagavataH budDasya mahA karuNA mudrA mantram ca atra Bavati  om viSve svAhA sarva karmikA sattvAnAm prayoktavyA karuNa AtmakAH Bavanti tat eva hasta abudDezwya citrIkRtO= aBaya avasTitO ezA budDasya BagavataH mahAmudritA mudrA mantram ca atra Bavati   om muni muni gagana svAhA ezA BagavatI sarva karmikA sarvAsAm paripUrayati pramuditena cetasA prayoktavyA sarvam karoti sarva mantra kalpezu yAni karmANi sarva lOkika lokottarezu tAni aSezatas sADayati iti tat eva hastO= uBaya aFguzwa vinyastO citrIkRtO lalAwe darSayet ezA BagavataH taTAgata prekzA mudrA sarva karmikA sarva arTa sADikA mantram ca atra Bavati  om mahat gate upekzaya sarva DarmAm viSvAtmane viSvamUrtti jvala jvalaya sarva budDa DarmAm hum Paw svAhA zaz pAramitAsu ca zaz mudrAH Bavanti tat eva hastO vara pradAnO iyam dAna pAramitA mahAmudrA tat eva hastO anyonya saFkucitO nABi deSe sTApitO iyam SIla pAramitA mahAmudrA tat eva hastO aDas kRtvA kakzAByAm sat niyojya sTApayet iyam kzAnti pAramitA mahAmudrA

column1: iyam aparA sarva budDa Aspada mudrA maQju SriyaH tat eva Darma BerI mudrA tat eva hastO sampuwIkRtO maDye suzirO tarjanyA parivezwya mUla aFguzWa tala vinyastO aFguzWa avanatO SaFKa AkAra kRta cihnO iyam aparA maQju SriyaH Darma SaFKamudrA cakram pUrvavat Darma cakra AkAram iyam aparA maQju SriyaH Darma cakra mudrA tat eva mudram lalAwe nyastam nRtya yogam kRtvA kzipet avasavya yogena iyam aparA mahA krIxA vikurvANa mudrA mUlamantreNa eva mahA BayeByaH prayoktavyAH naSyante avikalpate iti evam anena prayogeNa asaFKyeyAni mudrANi Bavanti asaFKyeyAH ca mudrA kalpa mantra tantrAH ca asaFKyeyAni ca drazwavyAni mahA praBAva udgata svayamBuva udBavAH tAni ca sarve prayoktavyAni iha kalpa visare sarvANi ca Suci vastra antara avanadDena prayoktavyAni yaTA asamayajQEH sattvEH na dRSyante evam mahA praBAvAni anyaTA samaya vyatikramaH iti etA sADana upayikAni kara mudrANi hasta vinyastAH nRtta gIta prayogEH ca anekAni Bavanti ruta viSezEH ca sattvAnAm kramaSas kaTitaH evam aDunA maNxala sADana upayikAni mahAmudrANi Bavanti

column1: AryamaQjuSrIH manasi kartavyaH yat kAraNam aBiziktaH mayA sarva budDEH ca gaFgA sikatA praKyEH sarva mantrANAm gamBIra tattva arTa naya Darma deSanA kumAra bAla rUpiNA mantra rUpeNa sat karizyasi iti na mantra mudra saMyuktam na kuryAt Darma samAhitam ahitam kuryAt na atra na ahitam hitam Ipsitam mudrA mantra samAyuktaH ahitam ca eva nivArayet hita ahitam sadA sarvam ahitam ca eva nivAraNam hitA eva sarva mantraH kuryAt mantra mudritaH na mudra mantra tat kuryAt na mantram mudritam taTA mudrA arTa saMyuktaH saPala arTA sADayizyate saPalam mudra saMyuktaH mantraH mudra Pala udayaH vEdya sADayet karma vistAram mudra samam cintA SAntikAH ye tu mudrA ye mantrA ca eva SAntike mantra mudra samAyogA SAntikam karmam AraBe pOzwikezu ca mantrezu baDnIyAt mudra samBavam pOzwikam mudram iti AhuH kaTitA mantra yojitA SAntike SAntikam kuryAt mudra mantrezu iha uditEH jinEH jina mantra muKyEH tu mudrEH ca api viBAgataH SItalezu ca sarva Rtu sarva karmAn= ca sADayet puzwi arTam kaTitAH mantrAH abja kule tu samudBavA mantra tantrAni tIkzNEH mudrEH ca api tava uditEH viKyAtEH kaTitEH mantrEH mudrEH ca api mahardDikEH abjake tu samAdizwEH SuciBiH ca eva dIpitEH praSastEH maFgalEH ca api Arogya arTa supuzkalEH kroDa yuktEH taTA mantraH mudrEH ca api varNitEH Boga arTa sampadA uddizwEH nirmalEH ca api SoBanEH SuklEH sita mudrEH tu mantra mudra sama uditEH sADayet sampadAm mantrAm Boga kArAH janmani taTAviDEH mantra mudrEH tu sADitA sa Pala udayA kroDa mantrA taTA proktA mantra AdyA prANa uparoDikA kaTitAH vajriNe tantre jinAbje ca samudBave tejinaH bahuDA ugrA duzwa sattva dama apahA niyuktA prANa hiMsAyAm na kuryAt tAm tu DImatA mudrA ca daNxa damana vajra SUla aBipawwiSA viviDA praharaNAn= ca eva mahA SUlAH tu yamAntake saMyuktAH mantriBiH kzipram kRtvA prANa apaham Druvam tat na kuryAt ca tam DImAm sarva prANa uparoDinam Bajet mantra tantra jQaH krUram krUra samudritam mudrA krUrataraH proktA krUra mantrezu yojitA krUra sattvEH yaTA sidDA krUra karmAnta cAriBiH viviDAm nArakAm duHKAm prApnoti iha sa durmatiH na kuryAt krUra mantreByaH duHSIlAnAm ca aBicArukam krUra mantra taTA mudram na dadyuH sarvatas janAH vEdya yasmAt Palam anizwam vE column1: Bavati ca atra mantraH  AH maH ham tat eva pradeSinyO saQcArya naKena naKam AlaBet maNxala AkAra sUcyABiH kudRzwiSalyaviparyAsa dAhanam nAma mahA Darma cakra mudrA mantram ca atra Bavati  om Duna pAtaya Cinda cakre vajriNi hUm samayi ravaH BAge pradeSinyaH nirgugugulyA kAtRkam catur mAra ari SayanI vajravIrA cala acala mahA mahIkleSAsanI nAma mahAmudrA mantram ca atra Bavati  om vajrAnani hUm Paw paryak tu mudrA mantrA ca saMyuktA sarva karmasu naSyante sarva viGnAH vE SaradA eva yaTA ambudA catur mAra kRtAH ye ca ye ca viGnA sa sura asurAH naSyante dRzwa mAtram vE mudram paryam uttamam paratas tulyam uddiSya tRtIyA mukta pradeSinI saFkucita agryA SuBA ca eva muzwiH taTAgatI smRtA trElokyena mahAmaheSvaragaBastimAlinI nAma mahAmudrA mantram ca atra Bavati  om vijaye haH taTAgata muzwimudrA ca eBiH anyatamEH mudrEH hasta dvayena avabaDvA sADana kAle pUrva sevA kAle vA sakRt uccArya yAvadicCam japet nizaNNaH sTitaH vA evam sarva viGna vinAyakAH avatAram na laBante sidDiH ca aBimuKIBavati tAH eva pradeSinyaH saQcArya maDya maya upari saMsakta agrAm kArayet

saQcArya sUcyA naKasya aDastAt saMsaktA mantra aDipasya mudrA tAH eva pradeSinyA agrA saQcArya maDyamasUcyA naKa parvayoH antare saMsaktA mahA cakravarttine mudrA tAH eva pradeSinyA agrA saQcArya uzNIzAya ehi ehi Bagavam DarmarAja pratIcCeyam arDyam ganDam puzpam DUpam balyam dca mAm ca aBirakzA pratihata bala parAkramAya svAhA AvAhanam Sukla puzpEH sva rUpeNa ArDya pAdyam AcamanIyam Asana tattva avatAra DyAna anugatam anupravizwe sarva mantra caryA sADana viDi samAsa krIxA nAwaka bAla caryA visPUryAna anugata san katamam ca tat SRNu tvam maQjurava Tri imAm sarva sattva anuvartanam DyAnam sarvajQataH jQeyam sarva mantra arTa sADanam pUraNam sarva mantrANAm SoDanam pApa karmiNAm yam DyAtvA ca janAH sarve sidDim prApsyanti anAMvilAm sarva AkAra vara upetAm DyAna sOKyam acintitAm boDi tvam triviDam prApya uttama aDama maDyamAH atulAm mantra sidDim ca astuvanti janAH Bavet sarva arTa sADanam loke yaSaH kIrtti suKa udayam dIrGa Ayuzka tAm loke smim devAnAm ca mahat gatim sarva ASa avApti tAm kzipram prApnuvanti na saMSayaH dvi prapaQca anuttarAm boDim lapsyate DyAna cintakAH sarva sattva ahita hi agram sarva mantrezu kIrtyate smaraNAt eva mantrezu sarva tantrezu ca punar sidDayaH sidDi hetUnAm kzipram ASA nibanDanam ASAsyam Buvi tAm martyA punar gacCanti devatA AjahAra puram divyam devatA mandirezu iha tizWante mantra rAj sarve tad muKa apiDyAyine Agatya ca punar sarvam devatA mantra rUpiNAm kaTayanti yaTAtaTyam SuBa aSuBa Pala udBavam vAcAm prabudDaH svapne pratyakzam vA aTa jApine SuBa udayam Palam karma pratyakzam vA api devatAm paSyante svapna gatAH sarve mantriNA vA api tad antare itarAm ca api na paSyante jApinaH mantra lOkikA DyAnena pApam kzIyeta jape ca api su puzkale vEdya siDyante mantra rAj sarve acirAt tasya mantriNaH praBAvAH DyAna yogasya acintya adButa cezwitA evam uktaH tu DIreNa SAkya siMhena tApinA BUt maQjuravaH tUzNIm SudDAvAsa pure tadA sarve deva gaNA muKyA triDA DAtu samASritA amucat vAkya varam SudDam sarva mantreSvaram gurum sADu sADu mahA vIra sADu DarmeSvaraH viBoH yaH tvam hi sarva sattvAnAm hita arTam mantra jApinAm DyAnAm ca tattva nirdizwam pUrva nirdizwa tAm iti idAnIm tu mahA vIra evam uktAH surAH sa  agrAH hi agratame hitAH tUzNImBUtAH tatas tasmin SudDAvAsa pure pure iti uvAca mahA DIraH muniH tejaH SuBayA vAcAyAH divyAm loka tattva arTa darSanam kaTayAmAsa sambudDaH maDura akzara Goza jam SRNoTa BUta gaNAH sarve sTitA triviDAlayA DyAnam ca Bava nirdeSam kaTyantaH samAhitAH aneka arTam anAnAtvam nErAtmyam tattva darSanam sarva mantra arTariDiMsA arTam viviDa arTam tu lOkike sarva Darma ISvarAH loke yena AyAnti su cintitA kzipram ca jApinAm sarve ASu mantra arTa sidDaye AdO DyAyIta mahA vIram ratnaketum taTAgatam ratna SEla nizaNNam tu guhAyAm ratnaja udyate padmarAga mayam divyam mahApadmam mahA unnatam BagavAm tatra nizaNNa sTam paryaFke Darma deSitam DyAyantam mahA vIram padma samBavam eva tu padma uttaram ca sambudDam padma ABam ca eva budDimAm DyAyIta muni varAm paQca ratna ABam ca taTAgatam samatas su pratizWitAH jQeyAH guhezu eva paQcasu sarvAm SEla mayAm sa adri padmarAga mayam kvacid Binna indranIlam ABAsam kvacid sPawika sanniBam ucCrayam marakata ABAsam pramANam ca api Sata azwakam vEdya yojanAnAm sahasram tu lakza zoxaSa vistaram uparizwAt tu sambudDA aparyantA narottamA iti UrDvam aDas sarva diS vidiSaH ca api sarvatas prAptam muni varEH sarvam sambudDEH dvipada uttamEH candra ABAsam ca nirBAsEH Sveta puNxarikA AsanEH haMsa go kzIra nirBAsEH SaFKa kunda indu hima praBEH sambudDEH sarvam idam vyAptam iti UrDvam aDassaptatiryakam sat vyomni puzpa varza AdyEH sura muKyEH samantataH adRSya kAya sArUpyEH uparizwAt Ka samAgatEH aDas ca AtmAnam sadA cintet paryaFkena upavizwakam padma patre sTitam muKyam SarIram ca api nirmalam aBiziQcantam sadA apaSyantam toya DArABiH sarvatas asaFKyeyEH muni muni muKyEH sambudDEH dvipada uttamEH prasRtEH dakziNa agra karEH samantAt aFguliBiH sadA Sukla toyAH bahuBiH bahu DArABiH UrDvatas samantAt sarvatas ca eva mUrtti ca AtmAnaH eva tu azwAFga salila DArABiH suganDEH laya SItalEH acCEH anAvilEH ca eva sarva vyADi harEH taTA jarA mRtyu vinASinyEH Binna sPawika sanniBEH tAdRSEH toya DArABiH AtmAnam ca api cintayet aBiziQcya AtmataH cintyA tEH ca ApyAyita mAnasaH samantAt vAri DArABiH tatas DyAyI suKI Bavet santuzwa mAnasaH DImAm paSyet jQAnam tad Asanam citte samADitAm lipsye paQca aBijQAsu cintya DIH evam yuktaH sadA yogI paSyet DarmAm tadA svayam divyam Srotram taTA jQAnam pUrva jAtim anusmaram RdDi vikrIxitam jyotiH divyam cakzuH anAvRtam para citta gattim cintAm sarva sattva ASrayam tam sarvam jQAsyati yogi ISaH tadA yukteH samAhitaH anivarttyaH sadA boDaH anuttarAyAm na saMSayaH budDa BUmi gatAm DarmAm praTamAyAm avikalpataH prApsyate sO sadA jApI anivartyaH mRte pade vEdya anABogena eva samyak mantrAH siDyanti sarvatas ye ca loka uttarAH sarve aBimuKyEH praBAzitAH boDisattvEH tu sarvatra abjAH vajra udBavAH ca ye lOkikAH ye ca mantrAH vE brahma rudra indra BAzitA yakza muKya gaNEH sarvEH mAtR BUta graha gaNEH yakza rAkzasa kinnarEH devEH nAgagaruxEH ca sidDa vidyADarEH tadA kUSmANxEH vyantarEH ca api kaSmalEH piSita aSanEH para prANa harEH ca api rAkzasEH preta duHsvapEH piSAcEH BRta yakzEH ca aneka AkAra jAti jEH ye mantrAH BAzitAH loke te tasya yoginaH yAnti Izat boDAya boDitA kzipram sidDi tAm yAnti mantrAH sarva arTa sADakAH vacanam tasya vE mantraH kzipram tattva arTa darSine RzayaH ye ca vE devAH mAnuza udBavAH prasahya vRttAH muKyAH ca strIpuMsAH ca ApuMsakAH sarve mahardDikAH ca api uttama aDama maDyamAH sarve lOkikA ca api ye mantrA loka pUjitA tEH ca api aTa manEH ca mantrEH ca api mantrajAH BAzitAH muni muKyEH ca sarve sidDyanti yogine tantra mantra gatAH ca api ozaDyaH maNi BUzaNAH sarve mantra varAH tasya uttama aDama maDyamAH sarva ASa avAptaye vA api akzare kzarate yadA sidDyate tasya bEm yuktasya mantriNe evam yuktasya mantriNe evam uktasya mantrasya DImantasya viSezataH praTamam cihna liFgaH tu mantrANAm sidDi hetavaH SarIram jAyate SrezWam padma ABAsam suKa udayam gAtrasya SEtya tA ca api candana indIvara ganDi tA karpUra agaru sOganDyam padma kiQjalka varNataH vaktrAt romakUpeByaH ganDaH vAnti sa cAmpakam jAtI yUTika punnAgam nAgakesara vakulam DAnuzkArI sa sOganDI jAtimallika kola jam vEdya viviDAm DUpa muKyAH vA viviDA puzpa jAtayaH viviDAH ganDa muKyAH ca viviDAH dravya jAtayaH viviDA sarva gatAH ganDAH SuBa karma sama ucitAH tezAm ganDa varam hRdyam aBiBUya uBipravartate divyam mAndAravam ganDam sa kiQjalkam sa kokaNam sakaH tUryakam loke aBiBUyam tAm pravAyate tatas cihnam imAm jQAtvA gAtre vE ca api SEtya tAm citta ekAgra tAm ca evam muKam ca eva viveka jam praTamam DyAna jam ca evam cittam jQAtvA tu tIritam suKa duHKam upekzAya nirvRte ca api virAga tAm upekzam smRti pariSudDim dvitIye prerayate jApI tRtIyam cittataH DyAnam caturTam aSrayataH vratI yaTA muni vara uddizwam DyAnam sarvatas SuBam taTA mantra gataH jApI DyAyet ekAgra manaH mayam ye nirdizwa Adya abudDEH tu vartamAnam anAgatEH sambudDEH SrAvakEH ca api sUtrAntAH ca api kIrtitAH tezu yogezu mantra jQAH anupUrvyA DyAnam Acaret nirvarttyam SrAvakI boDi pratyeka jinam udBavAm mahA karuNa anuBAvIta mahA mEtrIm ca api yatnatas yat yat gotra Agatam cittam taTA cittam tu BAvayet para hita cittAt mEtrI para duHKa kRpAlutA karuNA para tuzwi muditA para dozam upekzaNam upekzA iti uvAca mahABAgA sambudDA dvipada uttamA anitya duHKam anAtma aSUnya tattvam Sivam padam kzemam Sivam param sTAnam nirdizwam loka nAyakEH kzaNikaH sarva saMskArAH triviDAH tattvezu acezwitA te eva asaMskRtAH DarmAH triviDA boDi saMsTitA te eva SivatamAH loke kaTitAH boDi parAyaNEH pudgala aBAva nErAtmyam tIkzNa patana varNitam tam na asti Sive mArge kzeme budDa upadeSite atyanta nizWe Darme smim BUta kowi samASrite DarmaDAtu samAnam te astinAsti vivarjite vEdya SuBe Darma udaye boDaH tri prakAra sama udite atyanta nizWe mokze ca bahuDA Bedam ASrite su prayukte su nirdizwe sarva budDEH su deSite mArge sTite Ta mantra jQaH sarva pApa hare Sive ye DarmAH muni varEH sarvEH pratItya utpannA SuBa aSuBAH sarve te jAtiBiH yoge DyAtavyA muni hetuBiH SrAvakAnAm tu yA SikzA aDi SIla anupravarttate aDicittam ca yat jQAnam SrAvaNya Pala hetukam anAsvaram sa svaram jQeyam jApiBiH sarvadA svayam jQAtavyam KaxgiNA SikzA pratyeka arha samBavAm sarva sattva AKya sattva evam su svaram tridiva uditam yaTA ajinEH ca nirdizwam mArga tattva anugAminam sa ASravAn ASravam DyAnam saMvaram ca SuBa udayam yaTAvRtti yaTAliFgam taTA SikzAsu vyavasTitam tad Darma AsevataH jApI mantra sidDi samaSnute Dyeyam ca DyAna jam puNyam puNyam brahma SuBa udayam tasya sidDi sadA jQeyAH DyAnEH puNyEH ca bRMhitEH upohya sarvatas mantrI japa homa rataH vratI DyAtavyaH sarvatas muKyaH jinaputraH mahardDikaH maQjuGozaH mahAvIraH kuFkuma AkAra samat tvizaH Izi smita muKaH devaH savyAm ABoga maNxalaH prasanna mUrttiH padma sTaH samantaraSmyA avaBAsitaH pUrva nirdizwa je sTAne sva mUrttyA aBizeka sevite uparizwAt toyatArANAm maDye jina vara Alaye tatrasTam tu suKa AsInam DyAyItam maQjuravam SuBam sarva budDa UrDvakam dRzwim sa namaskAram SuBam praBum vAme karavinyastam nIlotpalam SuBam dakziNena kare hi ukta Suci sTAne sadA aSuBe sa namaskAram sadA budDam Izat SIlAsa bAliSam tam DyAtvA muni putre vE sadA mantrI punar punar tatrasTaH DyAna jaH DImAm AturAyAm tu paSyati sarve te vyADi nirmuktAH dRzwa mAtreNa mantriNA vEdya aDas ca paSyat pAtAlam sarve BUmi gatA DanA vaSitA sarva mantra jQaH nitya uccAwana mantriNAm yat UrDvam samapaSyet sidDAm vyomnA anugAminAm sarvam vaSayitA loke sidDa dravyANi sarvatas aTa uttarAm diSAm paSyet yakza aDyakzAn= ca sarvadA kUzmANxAH vitta dAH ca eva vitteSaH ca mahardDikA ISAnaH BUtapatiH ca eva OzaDyaH hamejAH sarve rudraH ca eva saha umayA kinnarAH maru ganDarvAH RzayaH garuxaH taTA sarva sattva ASrayAH ye ca taTA uttarA vidiSe vidikzu ca eva sarvatra taTA sTAvara jaFgamAH sarve syuH vaSam AyAnti dRzwa mAtreNa jApine evam paScimatas jQeyam varuNa mahardDikaH mahA nAgEH sadA sarvam dRzwvA yAnti sammUrcCitA evam vEvasvatAm lokAm yamaH ca eva mahardDikaH sarve ye rAkzasAH duzwA Gora rUpA mahardDikA sa sutAH BRtya vargEH ca para prANa harAH KagAH piSita aScana rUpAH ca BIma rUpa anugAH sadA vyantarA kaSmalAH ca eva preta apretamahardDikA piSAcAH BUta kravyAdAH vyAlaH ca eva mahardDikAH aneka AkAra rUpAH tu aneka AkAra yoni jAH rUpAH manaH javAH ca eva sattvAH hiNxanti medinIm dAruNAH ruDira ganDena samantAt yojanam Satam sahasram punar AyAnti sapta sapte nuge sadA mAnuzANAm viheWantAm paryawanti mahI tale AhAra ArtTinaH kecid kecid krIxA anugAminaH sarve syuH vaSam AyAnti dRzwa mAtreNa jApine evam pUrvayAm taTA dikzi pUrva aDyakza Adi SA anugaH savituH sarva nakzatrA sa jyoti graha candramA mahA utpAda upagrahAm sattve virAjAH ca eva diSAm patiH sa sutaH sa parivAraH vE SastrI vA ca api sarvatas sarve te vaSam AyAnti DyAnena Avarjite jitA vEdya vidikzuH ca eva sarvatra sarvam sarvAsu dikzuzu suraSrezWA suraH ca eva strI puMsA Adaye Buvi sarva sattvA taTA loke mAnuzAH amAnuza udBavA sarve te vaSam AyAnti ye sattvA trizu sTAvarA ye tu DAtu jAH muKyA taTA maDyama kanyasAH sarve te vaSam AyAnti adRSyaH dRSyAH ca DyAyine triviDam DyAna jam karma jyezWa maDyama kanyasam jyezWe uttamAm boDim prApya DyAyI nivarttate anuttaram ca padam SAntam pratyekam mArga KaxgiNAm kanyasA SrAvakI boDiH prApyate para niSritA pratItya utpattika DarmANAm hetu samBUta lakzaNam tezAm niroDa DarmANAm evam vAdI nara uttamaH sAkzAtkriyena marhat tvam caturaH pawala samBavAm hetvABAsa vida jQAnam SUnyatA duHKa samBavam nErAtmya DarmataH nizWam atyantam BUtakowi jam niroDa mArga vat jQeyanarha tvam ca api kanyasam AlayA udDAtanaH varttma aparCedaH vadana Atma tAm pipAsA pratipad SozAvartma upaCedaH Ta dehinAm kAma nadyAm saha tRzNAm Soka SalyaH Ta dehinAm ruDyante sarvatas DyAne mArge smim DyAna je hite tri prakAram taTA karma aneka AkAra cihnitam triDA ca eva sa muKyANAm triviDA boDikIrtitA kanyasam SrAvake boDiH pratyeka arha KaxgiNAm maDyame ca sadA loke nirdizwA jina varEH purA uttamam tu sadA boDim samyak sambudDa tAm gatim evamAdyA prayogena triDA karma kriyA kramam SataDA Bidyate tatra sahasraH Ta masaFKyakam vrIhi aFkura vat jQeyam punar kzetra aFkura vat sadA tatas Fkura aFkura vat nityam santatyA samprakIrtitAm vIja uzaDa vat karma Sukla Darma samanvitaH sattva vijQAna santatyA punar toyatarat Bavat pravartate DyAna jAH DarmA punaDyIyIta budDimAm vEdya yaTA DyAna gatA yogI SudDim paSyet sarvatas triDiDam tri prakAram tu aneka AkAra samBavAm sidDim mantra yuktim ca samADim ca eva kIrtitam DAraNyA boDisattvAnAm triviDA eva samoditA aneka AkAra vara upetAH mantrAH ca eva su pUjitA lOkikAH lokamuKyAH ca taTA loka uttarA sadA sOgatIva rtmam AsTAya DyAnam DyAna paramparA

column1: siDyante sarva mantrAH vE sarva sattva ArtTa darSanAm prApnuvaH tam janAH sarve DyAyatAm sarvatas hitAm yaSaH kIrti yaTa Ayuzyam sarva vyADi praNASanam mArga tattva arTa dam jQAnam jIvitam ca api su puzkalam prApnuvaDvam narAH SrezWAH nityam DyAne samAhitAH eza yogaH samAsena nirdizwaH muni varEH purA aDunA ca mayA ukta idam viDi yogam samAhitam mayA api anuttarAm boDim samprApte me mRte padam eBiH eva samAyogEH mantrEH ca api su pUjitAH DyAna karma gatEH divyEH SuBEH ca api samADiBiH prApyam anuttaram jQAnam budDa tvam BagavAn Aha aparam tu pravakzyAmi tat me nigadataH SRNu krIxA arTam sarva mantrANAm krIxA Sata karma jam DyAna jena eva prayogeNa SRNu maQjuravaH janAH sadA hita ahitam jQeyam mantriNAm ca vikurvaNam DyAna jena eva yogena kuryAt bAliSa budDinAm AdO tAvat sadA DyAyet mahA nAga ucCrayam jale mahodaDiH samantAt vE SElarAja viBUzitam ratna SRFgam mahA uccam vE catur antamayam SuBam tatra AsInam mahAtmAnam budDam trElokya viSrutam sunetram Darma BUyizWam amita ABam ca jina uttamam jinaputram sadA Svetam lokeSam ca yaSasvinam padmaketum mahAsattvam mahA karuNa ja udBavam sunetre muni vare sTAne kumAram bAla rUpiNam sadA maQjuravam vindyAt vicitraH BUti lakzaNam vEdya indIvara karam vAme dakziNe sugata anaBam jale yaH tra mahA nAgaH anantaH nAma nAmataH sarva SvetaH taTA nityam sapta SIrza jEH sPawEH tam DyAtvA cintayet jApI vicitra alaFkAra BUzitam sugatAt sampratIcCantam tad muKam ca api cintayet evam nanda upanandO ca nAga rAjO mahardDikO tad pramANa ucCritO vRdDyA dviguNam ca api sarvatas ananta karkowakaH tulyEH padmaH ca api mahardDikaH kulikaH SaFKapAlaH ca kapilaH ca api varNataH mahApadmaH Ta nAga indraH padma ABaH ca late sadA vAsukiH takzakaH ca eva Izit kiQjalka varNataH padma ABO sarvatas jQeyO vicitra AkAra BUzaNO SaFKaH ca eva mahA nAgaH Sukla ABaH varNataH SuBO SaFKapAlaH maNiH nAgaH Sveta ABaH Izi varNataH sAgaraH ca mahA nAgaH mucilindaH ca eva viSrutaH kRzNa nAgaH Ta sarvatra kRzNa varNAH prakIrtitAH sarve tulya pramANAH tu nanda upanandaH Ta surcCritO ela patraH Ta nAga indraH BogavAm loka viSrutaH sAgaraH hi uragADyakzaH acintya adButa cezwitaH karoti viviDAm karmAm SuklAn= ca eva niboDatAm mRtakam viza suptAm vA sAgare na eva kArayet

column1: vastrena AvRta kRtvA vE DyAna yogena DImatA AkRtya sAgare sTAne SIGram uttizWate mRtaH viza suptasya sadA nAgaH pAdena Akramya cAlayet tam nyaset sAgare sTAne nirvizaH Bavati tad kzaNAt evam jvara piSAcAn= ca kravyAdAm vyantarAm SuBAm rakzasAm preta kUzmANxAm piSAca uraga mAtarAm grahaH ca eva sadA loke para prANa harAm narAm vicitrA Sramam ASritA mAnuzim tanum ASritya tizWante Buvi mAnuzAm gRhNante bAlinAm sattvAm tezAm DyAnena anena cintayet sAgarasya tu nAga indrA cintyAt agratA utTitam DyAyIta mAtaram sattvam kzipram muQcati bAlisam vEdya evam dazwam adazwAnAm kIwa lUta utTitAm nRNAm dadru kiwima kuzWAnAm pAmAkaNxU vicarcikAm anyAm ca utTitAm ca eva nityam Bagandara rohitAm plIha medA udarAm ca eva taTA padmam su padmakam yakzANAm sa padmakam ca eva taTA padma uttaram kRSam jvara roga gatAm sarvAm bADyantAm nRja bAlisAm sarvAm sAgare sTAne sanyaset pannaga uttame viviDa AyAsa duHKAnAm sarva vyADi gada rttinAm sanyaset sAgare sTAne DyAna cintya ahitena vE kzipram mocayate nAgaH sugata AjQAm pratIcCakaH evaQcam uragEH sarvEH sarva karma karEH SivEH uraga aDyakzEH tadA sarvam vyAptam amBoda tiryagam samantAt sarvatas SrezWAH uraga aDyakzAH mahardDikAH samaya jQAH maQjuGozasya AjQe dIkzaNa tatparAH dEva yakza ASritAH nityam mAnuzANAm SuBa udayAH vyatimiSrEH tu karma jQEH vyatimiSra Pala udayA kAle varza DarA nityam DArmikAm vRttim ASritAm samantAt toya DArABiH sasya ozaDye taTA brIhyAm nizpanne Palati hEtukam meGa rUpeNa mASlizwA paryawanti mahI tale mahardDikA maheSa AKyA kalpa sTA mahA udayA tezAm BogavatI nAma purI amBodam ASritA yadA Darma parA marttyA jambUdvIpezu sarvatas tatas tizWante mahA nAgAH parivArAH ca tezu vE tadA devAsure yudDe anuBUya jaya eziNaH jambU vRkza gatA tasTuH jambUdvIpam ca maDyatas punar punar narAm Beje sarvatra apratigocarAH sarva Sukla gatAm karmAm tezu nAgezu yojayet kurvanti samaye BrazwA ye nAgAH jalam ASritA kIwava upadrutAm sarvAm vizAm sTAvara jaFgamAm mumucuH sarvatas nAgAH AsuraH pakzam ASritAH pramATI JaluJaluH ca eva kapardI ca api mahA udaDiH BImaH BIzaNaH ca eva durmuKaH bahumuKaH taTA vEdya ete ca anye mahA nAgAH atidarpa aBimAninaH kRzNa karme sTitA nityam vyatimiSreNa vA pare maheSa AKyAH BIma rUpAH ca vizograTi jana ajane aDarmizWAH yadA marttyAH jambUdvIpa nivAsinaH tadA mahA Bayam kuryuH viza mUrcCA ati dAruNam CardiH BramiH ca jAyeta mahAm Arya upadravAm bahUm duzwa SarIsRpAm loke visRjanti ahita udayA evam te ca mahA nAgAH bahu prakAra upadrava aSuBA anAvRzwi anAvRzwim visRjanti ahite ratA tezAm ca darpa nASAya idam DyAnam samAraBet maQjuGozam mahA DIram boDisattvam mahardDikam vAma utpala karam savyam dakziNena vara pradam Binna gorocanA ABAsam hema kuFkuma vidvizam garuxam pakzi rAjAnam ArUXam sugata Atmajam DyAyIta mastake tezAm daMzwriNAm sarva viza utkawAm tatas te Binna hRdayAH trasta udvigna mAnasAH punar nivarttya gacCante praviSante ca ruzA Alayam utpAtAm bahuviDAm dRzwvA aSuBAn= ca eva sa SabdakAm evam DyAyIta mantra jQa maQjuGozam samAhitaH bahu prakArAH mantra jQa nAga daMzwrAm prakalpayet aneka AkAra rUpAH tu aNxa jAn= ca pradaMSinAm vakzye samyak budDyA SAstra dRzwena karmaNA tad gotra jaH ca uragAH vE daSante Buvi mAnuzAm tezAm viDi dRzwena SAstreNa eva garutmanA kuryAt sarvANi karmANi pakzirAjena dehinAm kRzNa Sukla AdayaH nAgAH ye nAgAH Buvi maNxale vicaranti mahIm kRtsnAm sUrya rUpeNa dehinAm

column1: sADya asADye tatas jQAtvA vizam ca caturaH hitAm pitta Slezma gatam ca eva vAyu vyati vimiSritAm SlezmaNA vAruNa iti AhuH Sukla varNaH Ta maNxalaH pittam ajQeya jam nAma tRkoNA AkAra samBavAm vEdya agni varNa sadA raktam Izat bAhuBa piFgalam kula sTam iva banDa antam catur asram vyatimiSritam mAhendram iti tam jQeyam kRzNa varNam mahA unnatam SlezmANAm ca gaja iti AhuH pitta jam dveza samBavam moham vAyujam jQeyam vyatimiSram kRzNa varNitam tat eva sAttvikam vindyAt SelazmaNam Sukla varNitam rAjatam pEttikam jQeyam pIta rakta avaBAsitam tAmasam vAtikam jQeyam vyatimiSra hita utvatAm vyantarezu api sarvezu kIwa visPowaka Adizu sarIsRpezu ca sarvatra vyatimiSram liFgam Ikzayet kRzNa ABam tatram udyantam maQjuGozam sucintayet garutma sTam suKa AsInam bAla rUpam suKa udayam cintayet vyantarEH duzwam mAnuza IzAt a sanDizu tatas rdDam cintayet divyam kumAram bAla rUpiNam viSva rUpam mahAtmAnam garutmatta upari sTitam tadA AsInam mahABAgam Sarad kANxa AkAra vidvizam UsaByAm cintayet DImAn na aBisyAt aDyomagam pIta ABam cintayet DyAyI uraH sTAne su supti gam maQjuGozam mahA vIryam pakzirAja agra vAhanam SiraH sTAne taTA acintyaH DyAyIta garuxaDvajam Sukla ABam vEnateya sTam bahi sTam ca aTa cintayet sAttvike viza mUrcCA tu Slezmam vamanti sarvatas lAlA ca sruvate jasram nimajjate ca muhur muhur tam vidyAt sAttvikam dazwam Sukla pakza ahitaH Bavet Bramate kampate ca eva stabDe kzoBe sarva ISvaraH vize ca pitta je mUrcCA dAGaH jAyati dAruNAm rAjase daMzwriNe dazwraH etat Bavati cezwitam tAmase tamasam mohaH mUrcCA nidrA ca jAyate vyatimiSrEH vyatimiSram tu cezwA Bavati dAruNam sattve Bavati Sukla ABaH daMzwre Bavati mAnuze rAjasI pIta vat jQeyaH Cavi varNAH ca kiQcana kRzNa varNA aTa moha AtmA Cavi varNA aTa jAyate vEdya vyatimiSre DUmra varNaH tu ApANxuH ca api kvacid taTA sAttvikaH rAjasaH ca eva Sukla pakza ahi jodBavA tAmasaH miSriNaH ca eva ahijA kRzNa varNinAm tad kula AkulinaH hi ete uraga aDyakza ISvaraH su ve Asuram pakzam ASlizwAH vicaranti mahI tale daMSa tezAm mAnuzAm loke aDarmizWAH nAga jAtayaH krUrAH krUratarA loke AhAra arTa parA sadA kecid viheWana arTAya daMzwriNaH prANa harA pare viza nirnASana arTAya sarva daMzwra upajIvinAm idam DyAna varam muKyam yaTA AliFga anuvarninam sannyaset prANinAm cintyA kzipram muQcati tat vizam sarvadA sarvakAlam tu sarva vyADizu yojayet sarva upadravAm hanti DyAnezu eva pratizWitA yaTA nAgA taTA sattvAH rAkzasAH graha mAtarA para prANa harAH ca eva duzwa citta aTa mAnuzAH sarva vyADimatA loke liFgezu eva tu yojayet DyAnam Dyeyam taTA muktim karmam ca api sadA nyaset kumAra rUpam mAFgalyam column1: ye ca tATAgatAH mantrAH vajra abja kulayoH api Sakra indra brahma rudrayoH Aditya vasava indrANAm nakzatra graha jyotizAm garuxa uraga yakzANAm Rzi muKyA sa pUtanAm sarva mantrAH ca sidDi ante asmim kalpe tu DyAyine vEdya paratantra viDAne pi svatantreNa aByantareNa vA kuryAt karma sidDim ca kzipram DyAna gatena vE Aditya maNxale DyAtvA udayante viSva rUpiNam kumAram bAliSa AkAram SiSu BUzaNa BUzitam ArUXa maNxale dIptam garutmante Ta vEnate mIdRSa AkAram avyaktam mUrje ca api su cintite dRzwvA para bala stamBam jAyate ca manIzitam sarve ca dazwAH staByante nRtyante ca parasparam hasante AturAH sarve graha AvizwAH ca dehinAm jvara ArtAH mUrcCitAH ye ca uttizWante drutam tatas krandante viviDAH ArtAH BIma nAdam karoti vE graha mAtara kUzmANxEH gRhItAnAm Buvi mAnuzAm eBiH liFgEH sa cAlayet nirvizaH Bavate suptaH viza sTAvara jaFgamaH tatA uttizWate kzipram viza suptaH na saMSayaH anyaH ca vardDate kzipram viza ArttaH Buvi BU tale punar anyaH punar ca api anyAt anyataraH pi vA evamprakArEH sarvatra SataSas Ta sahasraH yAvat nAxI prayogeNa tAvat BUtAni pAcayet vastra kudyaH taTA kumBe asmatoya hutASane kzaNena cAlayet nAxIm tatrasTam vizama Avize sarve hi AturAH svasTAH tad kzaNAt eva BU tale evamAdya prayogeNa kuryAt karma Sata azwakam asaFKyam ca viDim kuryAt para mantra asRtena vA eza prayogaH samAsena DyAnaH hi uktaH Ta jApinAm prayoktavyaH kalpa niKilaH paratantraH garutmanaH vEdya matam saFkalpa jam proktam SEvam ca api viSezataH sarve ca lOkikA mantrA prayoktavyA DyAna vistare iha maQjurave kalpe DyAnena eva viSezataH sarva tantra prayogEH ca mantrEH ca api su pUjite matayaH ye pi kalpa arTAH prayoktavyAH iha te sadA yoge smin DyAnaye divye kalpa rAja udite iha DyAnena sarve niyoktavyA yukti hetu niraQjane sUkzmaH citta vizaye mantra sidDi nibanDane muni rAja pawala visarAt dvitIya sarva loka tattva arTa tAra krIxA viDi sADana upayika sarva karma DyAna pawala nideSaH parivartaH samAptaH vEdya aTa ekacatvAriMSaH pawala visaraH aTa Kalu BagavAm SAkya muniH punar api SudDAvAsa Bavanam avalokya maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam Amantrayate sma asti maQjuSrIH sarva budDa anumodite tvadIya mahA kalpa rAja mahA visare mahA mantra caryA anuvartake sarva samaya pUjitAya hUm hUm Paw Paw eza mantraH mahA mantraH sarva Satru Baya pradaH Ayuzat sarva BUtAnAm karma SAntika pOzwike sarvezu eva hi karmezu prayoktavyaH manasA udBavE sarva BUta ruta jQAnam aBijQa jQAna cezwitam aBijQa vaSitA ca evam sarva SAstra jQa tAm samam prApnuyAt puzkalAm ca arTAm Pala hetu samudBavAm yAvantyaH lOkikA mantrA sarvAH ca supuzkalA tAm sarvAm prApnuyAt mantrI sidDa mantraH tu budDimAm yAvantaH lOkikAH mantrAH SEvAH ca api su pUjitA mantrAH guru tmane ca api sidDi homa Pala unmuKam sarva lOkika mantrAH tu indra rudra udBava udBavA te syuH mantra rAj sarve nibadDAH viDi hetutaH yAmya agni vAyu toyAnAm kuberaH mAtaraH dayA saFKyAH dvAdaSakAH hi ezA brahma ISAna pUrakAH savituH Sakra devAnAm pitAmaha supUjakA kAmaDAtveSvarA KyAtAH ye mantra amara cAriNAm sarve te vaSam AyAnti mantre nAmIrita aDipa svayAmi at agninAm divOkasa jalOkasAm diS mandira ASrayAH ye ca vidikzu Sca api cAriNaH tadA UrDvam naBastale ca api aDas pAtAla DAmakAH paToSraya samApannA PaNinaH ye mahardDikA himAdri kukzi saMvizwA vinDya kukzO samASritA mahADAtu vare citre mahA SEle Ta viSrute nAnA deva gaNa AkIrNe sidDa cAraNa sevite apsaraH gaNa saFgIte sumeraH raviH iva ujjvale yatrasTAH ye tra nAgAH vE ye tu BUta gaNa ASrayA

dvicatvAriMSaH pawala visaraH aTa Kalu BagavAm SAkya muniH punar api SudDAvAsa Bavanam avalokya maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam Amantraye sma asti maQjuSrIH tvadIya sarva sADana upayika maNxala viDAne sarva mantra tantrezu mudrA pawala samaya rahasyam yEH sarva santrAsamayam na atik samaya saQca uditam anupravizwAH Bavanti sarva lOkika loka uttara maNxalezu sAmAnya sADana upayika sarva mantra tantrezu sarve su dahyete parama rahasyatamA parama sOBAgyatamA parama AScaryA adButatamAH yEH vinA na Sakyante sarva mantrAH ArADayitum sADayitum pUrvam sarva taTAgatEH BAzitavantaH etarhi aham ca BAzizye sarva sattvAnAm arTAya hitAya suKAya loka anukampAyE mahataH jana kAyasya arTAya sarva mantra jApinAm mahA mantrakaH Saniti Otsukya Darma DAtu acintya mahAyAna nErAtmya Darma meGam anupraveSana tAyE katamam ca tat BAzizye ham SRNu maQjurava sarva guhya mudrA samoditAm yaTA taTA svayam vAcyam purA gItam Rzi sattamEH kRtsna mudrA gaNam hi agram guhya mantra arTinAm sadA sarva kAlezu yojyA idam sarva karmezu maNxale aTa maQjuravaH SrImAm vihasan paFkaja IkzaNaH nirIkza sugatam SrezWam sarva DarmI ISvaram praBum kRta aQjali puwaH vIraH jinaputraH mahardDikaH uvAca maDurAm vANIm divya Sabda arTa BUzitAm sADu sADu mahA prAjQa Darma cakra anubartakam Darma tattva arTa mantra tvam yaH tvam BAzayase viBoH evam uktvA tu sugatam SAkya siMham narottamam aTa maQjuravaH SrImAm tUzNIm tasTuH tad antare iti Aha BagavAm budDaH DarmaDAtveSvaraH tadA SRNoTa BUta gaNAH sarvEH devasaFGA mahardDikA maNxale Buvi martyAnAm daridrA vA aTa duHKitAm AliKantAnAm Buvi mudrANAm sAnniDyam vaH BavizyaTa ye ca vE sarva budDAnAm pratyeka arhaTa KaxgiNAm SrAvakAnAm tu ye mudrAH kaTitAH muni varEH sarva lOkika mudrAH tu jina abja kula vajriNa sarva mudrAH tu sarvatra sarva karmezu yojitA tAn aham aBisaMkzepAt vakzye ham sarva mantriNAm vEdya yat pUrvam kaTitam mantram sarvam maNxale ca karmasu sTAnam homaH japaH karma tam taTA eva prayojayet maNxale Aditas leKya mudraH yam budDa nirmitaH sitam Catro Ta budDAnAm samantajvAlaH Ta BUzaNam paQca raFgika cUrNEH tu samantAt maNi rAjitam vicitra raFga ujjvalam SrezWam indrAyuDa sama praBam eza mudraH mahAmudraH budDAnAm mUrdDajaH varaH tasya dakziNatas pAtram samantAt jyotimAlinam tad anantare KaKavarakaH daMzwrA jIbara jaH para SrIvatsa svastikaH cakra karakam ca api varNitam pustakaH Dvajam iti AhuH patAkam ca tad antare GaNwA paScima jaH mudraH kaTitam loka puFgavEH Catre vAmatas padmam maNimudro tad antare tad antare vajram iti AhuH trisUcI A AkAra samBavam utpalam tu gatAmudraH salilaH salila ASritaH toyaH ca tad antye vE toya DArA aBiniHSritaH tad ante kuNxalO jQeyO BUzAlO SoBanO taTA tad ante Ta mahA SElaH caturatnaH TaH ujjvalaH tad ante mahA udaDiH leKyaH vicitraH raFga ujjvalaH tad ante Ta mahA vRkzaH saPalaH dala BUzitaH eza bRkzaH mahAmudraH vAma pArSva jAntajAm sita AtapatraH Ta budDAnAm mudrohyuktaH vara ugrajaH mantre Ta KaxginAm jQeyaH pratyeka jinayaH varaH cIvaram mudra varaH hi uktaH sarva SrAvaka samBavaH AryANAm arhatAm loke daMzwrA ca eva pragIyate tad Pala udaDi gatAm loke SrIvatsaH mudram izyate KaKarakaH ca mahAmudraH pati eka jina jaH paraH Darma cakraH Ta mudraH vE sarva dRzwi vidAlakaH kaTitam Darmamudram tu kAraka Akzepa jaH smRtaH prajQApAramitAm loke jinaDAtuH mudraH Ta pustakaH Dvaja patAkAH mahA mudrO viGuzwO loka pUjitO vEdya sarva AkRzwO mahA vIryO sarvam uzNIza samBavO GaNwA paScimaH mudraH pratyeka arha mUrDajaH budDa mudre tu vAme vE padmaH lokeSa samBavaH munimudraH taTA jQeyaH samantajya utila aBine vajram vajriNemudrAH boDisattvasya DImataH utpalam maQjuGozasya kuNxalaH kzitigarBiNye mahA toyataH mudraH kaTitaH gagana Alaye mahA SElaH Ta mudrA iyam sarva dRzwi vidAline mahodaDi taTA mudra sugata Atmaja sAgare mahAvRkzaH taTA mudraH udGuzwaH loka viSrutaH sarvAn= ca jinaputrAn= tu mudraH yam triBava Alaye GaNwA samIpa je sTAne AliKet jina varNitam mudram sarva mudrANAm catur asra AkAra samBavam vicitram raFgaja upetam cAru varNam virAjakam samantAt ekaH eva mahAvIram asaFKyeyezu sa budDa kowi BAzitam ca aByanumoditam ca katamam ca tat SRNusva maQjurava SrImAm gamBIra arTa suta tvaDIH yam baDvAH jApinaH sarve mahAmudrAm mahA puNyAm mahA maFgala column1: SAkyasya kula jaH dakzaH SrImAm budDaH nirIkzyate tvam hi viSva mahA prAjQaH loka anugraha kAmyayA tvadIyam kalpa visaram mudrA mudritam tu idam aDyezaya mahA vIram budDa putra mahardDika yaTAnyAyam mantra mudra samIritA sidDim ca api taTA kzipram dadyAt mudrEH ca pUjitAH mantri jQEH mantriBiH yuktaH bali homa su pUjitAH kuryAt kziprataram sidDim budDAH budDa sutAH taTA arhantaH pi visaram pawala uttamam sarva budDEH taTA loke Sreyasa arTam udAhRtA mudrA paQcaSiKA iti AhuH sarva budDEH prakASitA Sreyasa arTam hi BUtAnAm maQjuGozasya DImate sarvatas Sira jAH jQeyAH mUrDnajAH tu taTAgatAm sA tu sarva arTa dA jQeyA Darma koSa prapUraNI pUraNa arTam tu mantrANAm mudrANAm ca mahardDikam sarvezAm lokottarAm SrezWAm lOkikAnAm ca sarvadA maQjuGozasya tantre tu agrA hi agratamA matA praBAvataH sarva karmANi kzipram kurya arTa nAmataH SuciH BUtvA SucO deSe baDnIyAt mudra varam praBum AdO hastO Ta kRtvA vE suzira AkAra sampuwO AkoSa virala aFguzWO nyasta aFguzWO Ta sUcitO paQca sUcika vinyastO mudrA paQcaSiKA Bavet SiraH sTAne sadA nyastAH eka sUcyA aTa aFgulEH mudrA eva cIrA tu mUrDni sTAnezu yojitA kanyasA aFguli vinyastA su SlizwA maDyamO taTA aFguzWO sUcitO uBO trisUcI A AkAra samAyogAt tRSiKA mudram udAhRtA sarvEH aFguliBiH yuktEH AkoSA suzira samBavEH SiraH sTAne sadA nyastA mudrA Sira varA Bavet saH eva ucCrita aFgulyO Izit saFkucita agrakO mahAvIrA tu sA jQeyA mahAmudrA mahardDikA ete paQca mahAmudrA pUrvam jina varEH tadA nirdizwA sarva mudrANAm kaTayanti manIziNO jyezWA mudra muKyanAm       mudritAm lokottarAm tu sarvAH vE lOkikAnAm ca sarvatas etAH paQca mahAmudrAH prayogA sidDi hetavaH su sidDA sidDatamAH hi etAH agrAH jyezWAH ca BAzitA maQjuGozasya mUrDajA praBAva ati adButa cezwitA yAvanti sOgatAH mudrA sarvezAm sidDi hetavaH mudrA mudrA iti viKyAtA SrImantam kisalaya udBavam vEdya maQjuGozasya mUrDajam mahA puNyatamam Sivam yam baDvA mahAsattvAH niyatam boDim avApnuyAt mahAmuKya avataMsam tam SrAdDam avikala indriyam sadA yajQam prAjQa yuktam ca viDivat karmam Acaret tAdRSena tu yuktena sattvena eva suyojitA mudrA iyam kurute hi arTAm yaTezwA ca api puzkalAm upadeSAt tu vidvAMsaH matimantaH rTa sADakAH AcArya sammatAH loke SizyAH grAhyAH tu sarvadA viDivat karma dRzwena puruzeNa iha BaktitaH mahAyAna gatEH nityam mudrA iyam samprayujyate sarvezAm tu mudrANAm triDA mantrezu yojitAm agrA hi agratamA loke ete mudrA praBAvataH sidDi artTam sidDi kAmAnAm taTA mantrEH suyojitAm kzipram arTa karAH hi ete sarva sOKya Pala pradAH maQjuGozaH svayam tizWet mudrEH etEH samAhita yasmim sTAne tu vaH ca etAH svayam maQjuravaH sadA rakzA hi agrAm prakalpIta jinaputraH mahardDikaH bAla rUpI mahAtmA vE viSca rUpI mahardDikaH bahu rUpI ca sattvAnAm mudrA rUpI Ta dehinAm bAliSAnAm tu sattvAnAm saMsAra arNava cAriNAm tezAm arTa karaH kzipram mudrA rUpeNa tizWate maQjuGozasya SirajAH sarva mUrDni pratizWitA sarva arTa sampadA hi ete japta mAtrEH tu yojitA mUlamantreNa saMyuktA hRdayasya anugatena vA sarve sOgatiBiH ca mantra eBiH ca suyojitA

column1: ye tu abja kule mantrAH vajriNe ca api kapardine sarvEH ca lOkikEH ca api mudrEH yukta arTa Pala pradA ete paQca mahAmudrA mantra yukta arTa Pala pradA vikalpyAH mantra gatAm tyajya mudrEH vA aTa Pala pradA mahArakzAH mahA puNyAH badDa mAtreNa dehinAm smarita Ehi eBiH mahAmudrEH mahArakzA viDIyate kaH punar japta mAtrEH tu mantra mudrA samASritEH vEdya yAvat vA jApinaH sarve niyatam boDim ApnuyAt apare tu mahAmudrAH SUla pawwiSa samBavAH mahA SUlaH Ta mudrANAm Gora dAruNam ucyate kroDa rAjena muKyena yama antena iha yojitA karoti viviDAm karmAm dAruNAm prANa roDinAm mahA Baya pradAm mudrAm vipasyasya api mahAtmane duzwa sattvAm vinASAya sRzwAH tRBava Alaye tEH eva yojitA mantrAH viviDAm mudram ASRtA tezAm vinASanAya eva sRzwAH jina varEH sadA mantra caryA ArtTa yuktAyAH SAsana arTAya kalpitA vihitA lokanATEH tu mudrA tantra ArtTa darSanA duzwa sattva prayuktAnAm gara kilbiza roga dAm tezAm nirnASana arTA eva uktAm sarvATa karmikAm yama SAsana nASAya mRtyu pASAya mokzaNAH nityam prANa harA mudrA prayuktA mantra yojitA yama dUta harA puNyA mRtyuH nASanI smRtA yama SAsana nItAmA anetA prANadA smRtA sarva roga nivASa arTam yamasya api Baya pradA muni muKyEH taTA yuktA prANa sanDAraNI hitA SAsane smin prasannAnAm hitA rakzA viDIyate saPalA nASanI duzwAm gItA maQjurave hitA sarva arTa prApaNI devI mahAmudrA pragIyate mahA praharaNe tu AhuH aparA mudra parAvarA taTA eva hastO saMnyasya tarjanyO pASa samBavO kanyasO sUcayet nityam muzwi yogena yojitO hastO sampuwitO nityO aFguzWa abucSritO= uBO eza mudrA mahA puNyA mahA SUle samAgatA viviDAH lokanATEH tu vicitra praharaNa udBavA

column1: yaH yasya cintayet jApI SatroH praharaNAni vE tena eva cCindayet gAtram citta utpAdAt ca tat Bavet niyatam nASayet Satrum mudrAH mantrAH ca yojitA nihanyAt Satru gaNAm sarvAMmantrAH ca api mahardDikAm vEdya yama dUta gaNAm viGnAm grahAn= ca api sa mAtarAm pUtanA skanda rudraH ca pretAn= ca api mahardDikAm japtA vEvasvatAm lokAm kRtsnAm ca eva sa vAsavAm yamAntaka kroDarAjena na anyam mantram prayojayet mudrEH etEH prayuQjIta mahA SUla samEH tadA sadyam vEvasvatam hanyAt kaH punarBuvi mAnuzAm sarva praharaNI mudrAm sarva duzwAm vinASinIm vihitAH loka muKyEH tu sambudDEH dvipada uttamEH taTA eva hastO saMnyasta maDyamAm SRtya kArayet taTA eva hastO kRtvA iha muzwi yogena kArayet aFguzWa agrO tu pIxitO suzirA= AFguli saMyuktO maDya aFgulyasamucCritO sUcika agrO taTA nityO tarjanyA aFgulim ASritO ezA mudrA varAH GorA SUla iti AhuH muni varAH mahA SUlA Bavet sADuH tarjanI AkuQcitO= uBO visRtEH pawwiSA jQeyA mahAmudra varA parA tat eva saFkuca agrO tu aFgulyAH triBiH ucCritA eza sA triSUla mudrA iti pravadanti manIziNaH vicitra praharaNAH jQeyAH aFguzWO= uBaya ucCritO mahA SUla samAH hi ete mahA vIryAH BayAnakAH pApa sattva vinASAya tantre smim maQjurave vare durdAnta damitA hi etAH mahAmudrA adButa cezwitA rOdra prANa harA te vikRta AkAra samBavA mahA GoratamA rOdrA mahA krUratamAhitA mahA Gora varA jyezWA bahu rUpiNyaH prakASitA sarvatra jApinaH budDA jarA vyADi vivarjitA vicaranti imAm lokAm saMsidDAH jApinaH sadA vihitA mRtyu nASAya sambudDEH muni puFgavEH jarA vyADi vinASinyaH mRtyu nASAya saMsRjet yojitA mantriBiH kzipram kRtAntasya api BayAnakA vEdya sRjet praBuvaraH SrImAm SudDAvAsa pure vare muni sattama je mudrA SAkya siMhe narottame na budDAH mantra BAzante na mudrA krUra karmiNAm sattva kAraNa vAtsalyAt sarva jQa arTa prapUraNA RdDi vikrIxana artTA vA boDi samBAra kAraNA upAya sattva vEneyAH mahAyAna agra niyojanA mahA saMsAra pUraNA aDimukti vasAm sattvAm mantra mudrAm udAhRtAm AkASa ca iti yA budDA na budDA vAcAya kalpitA niHprapaQca arTa yuktAnAm kutas saFkalpa gocaram DarmaDAtu samA nizWA BUtakowi samA ca yA mantra yuktAnAm nizWA mudrA samudritA kaTayanti Bava aFgAnAm mukti arTam hetavAm sadA sarvajQa mudram AKyAtA sarva jQAna arTa prapUraNA yukti yukta arTa pUjA arTam mudrA mudram udAhRtA budDEH ca budDa putrEH ca acintya acintya gocarEH sarvajQa darSinaH mudrAH uzNIza AdyAH praBAvitAH avalokita mudrA tu vajrapANe Ta lOkikAH kaTitAH kaTayizyanti Sreyasa arTam hi dehinAm
