column1: yAvat budDa sutEH mudrA muni SrezWEH ca BAzitAH sarva arTa pUraNA mudrA praBAva Acinta cintitA vikalpa arTam hi BUtAnAm triDA mantrAH tu BAzitA ekaH eva Bavet mantraH yaH budDEH tu BAzitaH sOgata arTam tu mantrANAm mantraH hi ekaH pragIyate uzNIza aDipatiH SrImAm eka varNOTa vi sadA cakravartI Bavet nityam takAraH rePa saMyuta UkAra sahitaH nityam yuktaH Ta pragIyate sa Bavet cakriNaH SrImAm budDAnAm mUrdDajaH varaH BAparam mantram iti AhuH budDa putrasya DImataH praBAvAt tad samaH jQeyaH makAraH nti ArtTa gIyate vEdya maQjuGozasya viKyAtaH hRdayaH yam budDa mUrDnajaH praBAva atiSayaH jQeyaH mahA puNya mahardDikaH sarva arTa pUraNaH mantraH mudrA paQcaSiKA upetO uBaya arTa arTa pUraNO mudrA paQcaSiKAH vA api makAre ca api yojitO parama arTam boDayet ca arTam iha eva arTam tu Boga dO aparam mantram iti AhuH jakAram rePa saMyuktam avozma arTa pUjitam eza mantra varaH hi agraH abjaketo Ta mUrDnajaH mudre padma vare yuktaH AryA puzwyA arTa janminAm jApinAm karma sidDim tu kuryAt sarva arTa sampadAm aparam vajriNe mantrAm hraMFkAram bAhu mUrDajam eza mantra varaH hi agraH caNxaH Ta gIyate prayuktaH vajra Alaye mudre kuryAt prAya arTa karmiNAm durdAnta damakaH GoraH mantraH yam nASa hetavaH ukta arTam SAsana arTam ca yaToktam viDim Acaret na kuryAt pApa karmANi sattva nigraham AdarAt na yojayet mantra varam nityam sOmya sattvezu nityaSa na aparADye lpa dozeNa sattva nASayata utsRjet na kuryAt AdarAn mohAt alpa dozezu jantuzu SAsane duzwa cittAnAm aprasannAm prasadanAm vinaya arTam tu sattvAnAm damana arTam piSita ASinAm nigraha arTam tu duzwAnAm sOmya sattva prasAdanAm uktaH mantra varaH hi agraH na kuryAt prANAntikam kadA sarva lOkika mantrANAm vajriNe ca mahardDikAm agraH mantra varaH hi uktaH sarva lOkika devatAm aparaH mantra varaH hi eza sarva lOkika devatAm mantrANAm mUrDnajaH jQeyaH SivaH eka akzaraH hi atas ISvaraH sarva lokAnAm mantrANAm tu lOkikAm praBuH parameSvaram iti AhuH sva kAraH tAH viduH buDAH vEdya sarva mantrAH tu gIyante yAvantyaH lOkikAH smRtAH sarve te yatra vE mantre nibadDA sarvatra pUjitA vihitA muni varEH hi etAH mudrA sarvatra yojitA matA SivatamA SrezWA lOkika agrA samAhitA ISvara Adya antar BUtA vE vipaSya graha mAtarAm kawa pUtana yakza AdyAm rAkzasAm piSita ASinAm garuxaDvaja vizNoH ca brahmaNaH ca api kIrtitA mudrAH hi etAH samAdizwA durdAnta damane hitA praSastA maFgalA hi etAH mudrA hi uktAH manIziBiH vaSyA vezaNa BUtAnAm AkRzwAH hetavohitAm vivikte tu sadA deSe Sukla puzpEH su SoBite su mRzwe sidDa ganDEH tu Svetacandana kuFkumEH jAtI kusuma mAlABiH aByarcya sugatam praBum SAkya siMham mahA puNyam sarva mantreSvaram viBum sarvajQam sarvadA BaktyA praNipatya taTAgatam mantra nATam ca lokeSam vajriNam ca api Saktitas maQju Sriyam mahAtmAnam DarmaDAtveSvaram gurum sarvam budDa sutAm budDAm anupUrvyA samAhitaH kuSaviNxe pallave ca eva sakzIare sArdre su SoBane upavizwaH prAFmuKaH SuciH udaFmuKaH SAnti karme tu paScAt Ahva Anane na muKe na kuryuH sarva karmANi yaTA dEvata mandirAm pravRttaH sarva BUtezu dayAvAm mudra karmaNi sarvatra yojitA mudrA kuryAt sarva sADanam pUrva aBimuKe pOzwikam karma mantrANAm Anayane Druvam paScAt muKe tu kurvIta vaSya arTam sarva BOtikam udak muKe SAntikam vindyAt sarva vyADi praNASane dakziNe pApa karmam tu na kuryAt prANAntikam sadA UrDvam viGna nASam tu uttizWa uttama sidDi daH asura pure karma pAtAla aDipate tadA vEdya aGomuKaH ca kurvIta sarvatra apratipUjitA vidikzu ca sarvatra yaTA yaTA ca samAsRtA tezu tezu kurvIta siDyante sarva dehinAm kuryAt sarvatra mudrANAm viDi homa samA japI tatrasTAm sidDim AyAnti tad muKAH ca api mudritA viDiH SrezWaH kaTyatAm tAm niboDatAm SuciH vastraSuciH BUtvA suKa SOca samAhitaH imAm mudrAm prayuQjIta sarva arTAm ca su sama aDikAm hastO= udDRtya ganDEH ca Svetacandana kuFkumEH suDUpEH prANi aFga rahitEH karpUra agaru candanEH yukti kuFkuma muKyEH ca kuryAt DUma varam vidA nivedya viviDA karmAm Acaret viDivat sadA Acaret pUrva nirdizwam karmam sarvatra kalpa BAzitam prAFmuKaH Ta tatas BUtvA uBO hastO su sampuwO miSrIkRtAm tatas nyonyAm aFgulyA veNitaH sTitO maDyamO kanyasO jyazWO anAmika agrO ca yojitO aFguzWO niScalO jQeyO samO ca api pratizWitO Sira sTAne tadA kuryAH lalAwa deSe tu BaktitaH namaskAram taTA mantram zaz varNoTa yojitAm om vAkyeda namaH vAkyam svAhAkAra varjitam huFkAra apagatam SrezWam PawkArApa gatam sadA pavitram maFgalam jyezWam hRdayam tu sadA japet eza maQjuvara SrezWam bAla rUpi surUpiNe paScAt me viSva rUpe tu hRdayaH yam prakIrtyate zaw ete zaz akzarA jQeyA mantrA SrezWA hRdaya uttamA tezAm agratarA hi ezA pravRttaH sarva karmasu idam mudrA uttamam mantram kuryAt sarva karmasu mUrDni sTAne dattvA lalAwa uddeSe tu yuktitaH maDyama aFgulyam tu cAlet vaSya arTam sArvaBOtikam aFguzWa agrO= uBO nAmyO AkRzwa arTam ca devatAm vEdya tEH eva visRtO nityam visarjyam mantradevatAm maDya jyezWO taTA SrAvakAn= ca muni varam tarjanyO kuQcitO nityO boDisattvAm kuliSa udBavAm daSa BUmyeSvarAH ye ca Ahvayante na saMSayam kanyasA aFguli saMyuktAH AkuQcyAt sara Ahvaye yakza rAkzasa pretAn= ca kUzmANxA kawa pUtanAm dEtya dAnava saFGAn= ca yakziNyAH ca Danada priyA mAtR vat kurute hi etAm mudrA iyam samprapUjitA arTa anarTAm taTA nityam izwa anizwA Pala pradAm mahAmudrA iti viKyAtA gIyate tRBava Alaye eza mudra mahAmudrA badDA mUrDasu paNxitaH aDRzyaH sarva BUtAnAm Bavate na atra saMSayaH dUrAt dUram namasyanti sarva viGna vinAyakA mahA brahma samam puNyam niyatam boDim avApnuyAt iti boDisattva piwaka avataMsakAn mahAyAna vEpulya sUtrAt Arya maQju Sriya mUla kalpAt dvicatvAriMSatimaH mahAmudrA pawala visaraH parisamApta vEdya aTa paQcacatvAriMSaH pawala visaraH aTa Kalu BagavAm SAkya muniH punar api maQju Sriyam kumAra BUtam Amantrayate sma sarvAm ca SudDAvAsa Bavana sannipatitAm deva gaNAn Amantrayate sma SRNvantu BavantaH deva saFGAH maQju Sriyasya kumAra BUtasya mahARdDi vikurvaNa prAtihArya vikrIxita cezwita bAla rUpa svarUpa nidarSana yaTA sattva pAka saMyojana mudrA mantra praBAva tatra sattva yojanam aBiprAya sampUraNa arTam mudrA pawalam parama guhyatamam sarva mantra tantra kalpezu bIja BUtam sAra BUtam parama rahasyam mahA guhyatamam parama uttara tantrezu sarva lOkika lokottarezu aprakASyam parama gopyam na aSizyANAm ca deyam aSrAdDAnAm anutpAdita boDi cittAnAm matsariNAm anya tIrTa Ayatana BaktyAnAm mahAyAna agra Darma vidveziNAm sarva mantra tantrezu agOrava jAtAnAm etezAm prakASya anyezAm prakASyam iti samaya jQAnAm budDa SAsane pratipannAnAm surUpa su veza SrAdDam avikala citta sanDAna mahA utsAhA sarva mantrezu ca sa gOrava sarva budDa boDisattvezu pratyekabudDa Arya SrAvaka sarva deva sa brahmacArI sa pratIsa Adara jAtezu sattvezu mahAsannAha sat nadDezu sakala sattva ADAtva uttAraNa aByudyama udyatezu mahA kAruNikezu kzAnti sOraBya su vacaskezu sattvezu etezAm deyam anyezAm adeyam iti Ahu ca eka mudrA gaNaH SrezWaH prayuktaH mantra yojitaH karoti karma viviDA manezwA manu yojitA jApiBiH sarvakAlam tu prayoktavyaH sidDim icCatA nAmnA trElokya viKyAtaH budDEH ajitaH sadA strI sampad karaH hi eza praTitaH sarva jantuBiH SrIvatsaH nAma mudraH yam pramuKaH zwaSate Buvi mudrANAm azwaSatam jQeyam maQjuGoza SRNohi me purA jina varEH gItam budDa putrEH ca DAritam aham vakzye pratyaham varttamAnam anAgatam arTa arTam samanumodye rakzye ham Buvanatraye maQjuGozaH taTA hRzwaH uvAca vadatAm varam deSayantu mahAtmAnaH budDAH sarvatra pUjitAH yam SrutvA puruzAH prAjQAH niyatam boDim ASraye sarvezAm tu pravRttAnAm japa homa vrate sTitAm Druvam mantrAH tu sidDyeyuH imEH mudrEH tu mudritAH aDyezye ham mahA vIram SAkya siMham narottamam asmAkam sattvam arTAya Darma koSa arTa pUraNam mahAyAna agra Darma arTam mantra caryA arTa sADaka vEdya durdAnta damakam puNyam pavitram pApa nASanam deSayantu mahAvIrA pawalam mudra samBavam pUraNa arTam tu mudrANAm sUcanA arTam tu devatAm anukampA arTam tu jApinAm evam uktvA tu maQjuSrIH kumAraH bAla rUpiNaH nirIkzya sugata SrezWam suKaH maQjuravaH tadA uvAca maDurAm vANIm muni SrezWaH vinAyaka kalaviFka rutaH SrImAm meGa dunduBi niHsvanaH brahma svareNa vacasA vAcaH maByAcacakza saH SRNoTa BUta gaNAH sarve kalpa arTam mantradevatAm samayam sarva dEvAnAm muKyam mudrAH ca dEvatam samatikrAnta budDEH tu pratyeka arhata sADakEH kaH punar anya sattvEH tu vidyA dEvata lOkikEH eza mudrA gaNa jyezWaH sarva mudrezu katTyate yam taTA jApinaH sarve niyatam sidDyanti devatA AdO kisalayam nAmnA dvitIyam Bavati meKalA tRtIyam sumeKalA ca eva caturTI sumanusodBavA paQcamI saFkalA iti AhuH zazWI reKA praGuzyate suvarNA saptamI jQeyA mAlA Bavati ca azwamI navamI aFkuSI KyAtA daSamI saptadaSa= CadA ekAdaSI Bavet kuntA sukuntA dvAdaSI Bavet kardamI trayodaSI ca atra pawahI paQcadaSI Bavet zoxaSI tu Bavet yazwiH muzwiH saptadaSI viduH azwAdaSa samAKyAtA vajramAlA pragIyate hema mAlA UnaviMSA tu padma mAlA Ta viMSati nAgI nAgamuKI ca eva tRtIyA Bavati mahA muKI vaktrA ca vaktra sahitA CatrI Bavati lohitA lohitA ca azwaviMSA tu nIlalohitikA sinI jyotsnA jani tAmasI dvAtriMSA kaTitAH Buvi tArA sutArA tArAvartA su mudra jA api Gora rUpiNI viKyAtA rAtrI Baya dA sadA mahA praBAva iti viKyAtA yA mudrA Buvi locanA vEdya saptatriMSati mudrAH tu saFKyA hi ezA pragIyate SvetA paNxarA ca eva evalA mAmakI ca yA mahA Baya harI devI BrukuwI tu pragIyate ajitA aparAjitA KyAtA jayA vijayA parAjitA sADakI sADanI ca eva tArA SvetA iti gIyate Gawakarparam iti AhuH sugatI gati SoDikA padmI padmasutA ca eva vajrI vajra manodBavA strI saFKyAH gaNaH mudrEH puruzANAm tu pragIyate Badram mudra pIWam tu Asanam Sayanam Buvi svayamBU SamBu cakraH ca kuliSaH musalaH taTA svastikaH liFgamudraH ca pakzirAj garutmanaH mudraH garuxaDvajaH jQeyaH vizNuH udrasa vAsavaH brahmA padmodBavaH SrImAm SrI sampuwaH eva ca taTyam yamala mudram ca mayUrAsanam eva tu viditam sarva diS DImAm kArttikeya arTa daH sadA kumArasya anucaraH jQeyaH maQjuGozasya tasya mudram mahA vIryam tAH tAH SaktiDaraH sadA mayUrAsana mudram tu tasya eva etat prayujyate anena badDvA mantreNa kArttikeyasya yuktitaH yAvantaH lOkikAH mudrA SEvAH ca eva sa vAsavAH sarve Bavanti badDvA vE vaSya arTam hi prayujyate eza mudrA karaH hi arTAm puzkalAm sADu cezwitAm prasannaH budDa putrasya maQjuGozasya DImataH budDa SAsanam avatIrNaH bAla rUpI mahardDikaH kArttikeyaH Ta viKyAtaH mantra muKye Ta lOkike sarvezAm ca prayoktavyaH bAliSAnAm viSezataH graha mAtara kUzmANxEH gRhItA kawa pUtanEH dEtya dAnava yakzEH ca piSAca uraga rAkzasEH kravyAdEH mAnuzEH ca api nityam ca api vimokzakaH rOdra sattve Ta duzweBiH piSita aSana vyantarEH mudriteBiH ca manujEH mudraH yam sampramokzakaH sarva sattva arTa yuktaH ca prayuktaH suKa daH sadA vEdya saMkzepeNa tu uktaH yam vistaraH ca eva saMjQakam aparam mudram pravakzyAmi yam badDvA suKI Bavet jApinaH sarva karmezu prayuktasya api amoGavAm nAmnA budDAsanaH nAma mahAmudrA prakatTyate vistaraH sarva tantrezu paWyate tAm niboData yam badDvA jApinaH sarve niyatam boDi parAyaNAH kaH punar sidDi kAmAnAm Boga Alipsa parAyaNam pUrvava cOkza samAcAraH sTitvA ca prAFmuKaH SuciH uBO hastO samO kRtvA aQjalyAkAram ASRtO kuryAt vikAsitO ca agre uBO= aFguzWa nAmitO maDyama aFgulim ASlizwO kuNxala AkAra cihnitO paryaFkena upavizwe tu nABi deSe tadA nyaset eza mudrA varaH SrezWaH sarva karmezu yojitaH uttamezu ca uttizWe na aDame maDyame pi vA kzipram arTa karaH hi eza sidDaH sarvatra yujyate mahA puNyaH pavitraH yam maFgalyam aGa nASanaH sarva pApa haraH puNyaH mudraH yam sidDi hetavaH dvitIyam aparam mudrA mahAmudrA prakatTyate nAmnA SatruQjayI nAma sarva viGna vinASinI yam badDvA SatravaH sarvAm vaSam kuryAt na saMSayaH sarvet Sozam AyAnti gacCante vA aTa dAsa tAm rAgaH dvezaH ca mohaH ca sva pakzaH sa gaNEH saha lokamAtsaryamAnaH ca vicikitsA kaTaMkaTA pramAdyaH mAyA kOsIdyam sADyezyA kumArga tA mitTyA dRzwi daSe mAne dante stamBe ca lubDa tA daSA kuSala paTA karmA sarve te SatravaH smRtAH eza Satru gaNaH proktaH budDEH budDasu tEH taTA eza mArgezu avasTABiH prANinaH yaH ca mA aSRtA budDa SAsana hantAraH tezAm mudrA prayujyate iyam mudrA mahAmudrA gItam budDEH purA sadA prayoktavyA prANinAm hi ezA damana ArtTam pApa nASanI vEdya taTA eva puratas sTitvA uBO pANi samASraye samASlizwO Ta tO kRtvA aQjalyAkAram ASRtO aFguzWa yugale kzipram tarjanyO saMnyaset uBO kuNxala AkAra saMSlizwO tRtIye parvam ASrayet ezA arTa karI mudrA dvitIyA kaTitAH jinEH SatrUNAm nASayet kzipram hRdayAMsi pradoziNAm tRtIyam mudram pravakzyAmi maQjuGoza SRNohi tAm nAmnA Salya harI divyA sarva Salya vinASinI sarvatra yojitA mudrA sarva vyADi cikitsakI viza Sastra kRtAm dozAm jala pAvaka samBavAm anila udBava dozAn= ca duzwa sattva gara pradAm kravyAdAm mAnuzAn= ca api sa vizAm sTAvara jaFgayAm yat ca deha gatAm SalyAm nArINAm prasava AtminAm saMsAra aBiratAm ca anyAm prANinAm doza pIxitAm sarva netAH taTA SalyAH viSalya karaNI hi ayam eza mudrA mahAmudrA smaritA sarva jantuBiH viSalyA suKitA kzipram Bavate na atra saMSayaH nAma mAtreNa te martyAH mantrasya asya praBAvataH sarva vyADi vinirmuktAH vicarante mahI tale pUrvavat cOkza samAcArA SuciH vastraSucI tadA baDnIyAt mudra varam SrezWam tRtIyam pApa nASanam uBO hastO samAyojya viparIta AkAra samBavAm samO vyaktO aQjalI AkArO hRdaya sTAne tu tam nyaset eza mudrA mahAmudrA sarvAnartTa nivAraNI yam badDvA jApinaH sarve niyatam boDi parAyaNAH caturTI tu mahAmudrAm mahA yakzIm tam AdiSet mahA praBAvA vijQeyA sarva mantrezu jApinAm atra yakza gaNAH sarve yakziNyaH ca mahardDikAH mantra devata sarvezu uttama aDama maDyamAH sarva sattvEH tu sampUjyAH mudrA iyam sampragIyate AdO badDvA japet mantram homa sADana karmasu sarvatra yojitA puNyA sarva mantrANi sADayet vEdya vajrapANiH taTA mAntraH sarva mudrA ISvarI hi ayam paWitA lokanATEH tu purA jyezWEH hi atItakEH taTA eva SucinaH BUtvA sTitvA udaFmuKaH tadA baDnIyAt mudra vare SrezWeH sarva karmezu jApinaH damana arTam sarva BUtAnAm yaTA ayam kurute kzipram yaH sattva Acezwitam Buvi uBO hastO tadA nyasya sampuwa AkAra vezwitO kuryAt trisUcika AkAram aFguzWO kanya sa maDyamO anyonya saMSlizwO caturBiH ca api aTa nAmitO kuryAt mudra varam hi uktam SiraH sTAne tu saMsTitam yam dRzwvA sarva BUtAH vE vidravanti na saMSayaH paQcamI tu mahAmudrA SRNu tvam maQjuravaH sadA nAmnA tri samayA ca eva mahA puNyatamA SivA durdAnta damanI nityam sarva sattva ArtTa sADanI Gora rUpI maheSa akzA kAlarAtri sama praBA kRtAnta rUpiNI BImA yamasya api BayAnikA caNxA ca caNxa rUpI iti duHprekzA duHsahA sadA rudra vAsava yakzezAm rAkzasa graha mAtarAm devAn anusarAn= ca eva mantra muKyAm mahardDikAm sarva sattvA taTA nityam durdAnta damakI hitA akAla mRtyu vinASAya mRtyu nASAya vE hitA sRzwA sarva budDEH tu kRtAntasya api Baya AvahA yam badDvA puruzAH nityam samaya jQAH Bavanti ha ye ca mantra ASritA nityam te pi muktA jape ratA tezAm sidDyanti mantrAH vE ayatnena eva dehinAm ajApinaH pi Bavet jApI aSuciH SucinaH Bavet saMyuktaH kroDa rAjena yama antena iha mudrayA sarva karma karA hi ezA saMyuktA tattva darSiBiH sarva viGna vinASa arTam sarva vyADi cikitsanA sarva sattva arTa samBArA sarva duzwa nivAraNA sarvAsAm pUraNa arTAya vihitA muni varEH purA vEdya eza mudrA hitA loke samaya BraMSAt ca pUraNI badDvA tu mudra varam SrezWam samaya jQaH tad kzaNAt Bavet sarvezAm ca eva mantrANAm lOkikAnAm ca tata uttamAt pravizwaH maNxalaH jQeyaH mudrA mantreNa IritaH taTA eva SucinaH BUtvA pUrvavat sarva karmasu trisUcI A AkAra taTA vajram aFgulIBiH samAcaret jyezWa maDyam aaFgulyO aFguzWEH ca satA nyaset mUrDni sTAne tatas kRtvA apasavyena BrAmayet eza mudra varA SrezWA prayuktaH sarva karmasu etA paQca mahAmudrA lokanATEH tu BAzitA niyatam puruza varAH badDvA samboDi agram spRSanti ha sarvAsAm pUrayati ete jApinAm manasA udBavAm sarva taTyam yaTABUtam darSayanti yaTA Ipsitam apare mudra varA SrezWA paQca ca eva prakASitA SiraH vaktraH Ta gAtram ca utpalam kavacam taTA ete mudra varAH divyA maQjuGozasya DImataH purA loka varEH muKyEH kaTitA tattva darSiBiH aham ca maQjuravam vakzye katTyamAnam niboDyatAm SRNuzva ekamanAH nityam mudrA mudra vara uttamAm pUrvavat cOkza samAcAraH sTitvA DAtu vara agratas baDnIyAt kara puwe nityam mudrAm paQcArTa saMjQikAm uBe kara puwa agre tu kuxmala AkAra kArite dadyuH Sira vare nityam SiramudrA iti saMjQitam yaTA eva utpala mudrA tu nyastaH duravare sadA sA ca sarvatas kziptA gAtra mudrA viDIyate sa ca eva kutas jQeyA vaktra mudrA tu sA Bavet taTA eva hastO saMnyasya nABi sTAne tu saMnyaset Izi tarjanyA aFgulI anABim AtmanaH saMspRSet sA Bavet kavacamudrA tu Atma rakzA tu sA Bavet sarvatra yojitA hi ete saPalA sarva arTa sADikA ete mudrA mahAmudrA maFgalyA maGa nASanA jApiBiH sarvakAlam tu prayoktavyAH saPalAH hitAH vEdya mahA vIryA mahA puNyA sarva anarTa nivArikA yam badDvA puruzAH nityam niyatam boDi parAyaNAH apare paQca mahAmudrA loka nATasya tApinaH munine SAkya siMhAya taTA ratna SiKe gurO su puzpAya sukeSAya taTA sumanasA urave saFkusumAya ca budDAya taTA padma uttare vare sampUrNAya sunetrAya SudDA ca eva jagadguroH pitAmahAya ca eva muktAya jagat vara ambara muktaye etezAnAm ca budDAnAm anyezAm ca mahAtmanAm atIta anAgatA sattvAm vartamAnAm svayamBuvAm sarvezAnAm ca budDAnAm mUrDni samBUti lakzaNA mahA praBAvA mahAmudrA samantAt jvAla mAlinaH uzNIzAH iti viKyAtA tRDAtu samAlaye cakravarttI mahA puNyaH maFgalyaH maGanASanA sarvezAm ca vidyAnAm vidyA rAjaH smRtaH praBuH eka akzara saMyuktaH mantraH sugata mUrDajaH

column1: mudraH tasya vidaH jQeyaH praBuH eka akzarasya tu cakravarttI jina kule jAta mudraH parameSvaraH uBO hastO samASlizya sampuwa AkAra cihnitO muzwi yogena badDvA vE maDya aFgulyO su sUcitO Izit saFkocya vat kRtvA kuNxala AkAra darSitO eza sarvatrage mudrA sarva mantreSvaraH vidaH mUrDAnam devatam kRtvA suzira AkAra kuxmalam Izit na amitatarjanyO kanyasam tu su pUjitO eza mudra varaH SrezWaH tejaH rASe tu kaTyate tat eva sampuwam ca agryA Catra AkAra saMjQakam vikAsya aFgulI sarvAm sita Atapatra iti saMjQitam jaya uzNIzam hitam devam hi maDya aFgulyO su sUcitO tat eva visAritO ca agre pANiBiH sarvatas gatEH uzNIza saFkaBavA jQeyA sarvatra arTa darSiBiH muni mUrDaja samBUtA mudrA agrA pragIyate paQcamA tu Bavet sA tu sarvam uzNIza samBavA vEdya anena vE sarva budDAnAm yAvantam uzNIza mUrDajAm sarve te ca samAyAnti sarva karmezu yojitA sarve muni varEH mudrAH ye gItAH Buvanatraye sarvezAm tu mudrANAm mudrA iyam parameSvarI anena abAhayet mantrAm anena eva visarjayet anena sarva karmANi kuryAt sarvatra jApinaH ete paQca mahAmudrA purA gItAH muni varEH sarva kama arTa yuktA vE sarvam uzNIza sADikA yAvantaH muni varEH gItAH uzNIzAH Buvanatraye sarvezAm tu sarvatra ime paQcArTa pUraNA sarvam uzNIzataH jQeyA mudrA vE ca asaFKyakA tezAm paQca varA proktA sarvam uzNIza sADanI avalokita mudrasya paQca vA ete sumudrakAH prakRzwA padma kule SrezWAH mudre te Buvi maNxale uzNIzam ca SiraH vaktra padmamudrA ca kaTyate mahA karuNa jA devI tArA Bavati paQcamI pUrva cOkza samAcAraH DOtavastra su japta DIH pANinA SirasA mRSyaH UrDva hastaH Bavet naraH vAma pANi tale leKyAm muzwi yogena vezwayet ezaH uzNIza mudraH yam avalokita mUrDajAm tat eva Sira vare dattvA SiramudrA pragIyate tat eva saFkucitO ca api nABi deSe pratizWitO vikAsya aFgulI sarvAm padmamudrA iti sA vidoH uparizwAt eva vaktra ante hastO tO na samASRte anyonya miSritO hastO virala aFgulim ASritO tat eva vaktra mudrA tu padmaketo Ta gIyate yA tu padma Dvaje mudrA nAga loke prakaTyate sa Bavet muzwi yogena uBO hastO samASritO uBO tarjanyatAm ca UrDvO sUcIBUtO su cihnitO aFguzWa pIxitO SrezWO tArA mudrA iti kaTyate ezA mudra varA SrezWA karuNA padma Dvaje vidoH iti evam paQca mahAmudrA kaTitA padma Alaye sadA vEdya boDisattvasya muKye tAH lokeSasya mahAtmane atra padma kule Bavanti banDam sarva karmasu mantra nATa ISvaraH ye ca vidyA devata lOkikA sarve te atra vE mudre mudrAH yAnti su mudritA ye ca yakzeSvarA gItA vajrapANi mahardDikA mahA mantra ArtTa rOdrAH ca kroDa prANa harA taTA ye ca anye lOkikAH muKyAH mantra yuktAH ca devatA sarve te ca samAyAnti mudrEH etEH su mudritA ete mudrA mahAmudrA pavitrA pApa nASanA yam badDvA jApinaH sarve kzipram AyAnti kziprataH muktA tATAgatI mudrA anyezAm parameSvarI avalokita nATasya sarva vyADi cikitsane mudrE taH paQca mahA BogAH vicaranti mahI tale strI rUpa DAriNaH BUtvA sarva sattva arTa yojitA yam badDvA puruzA prAjQa niyatam boDi parAyaNA aparA paQca mahAmudrA vajrapANi mahardDikA yaH eza vajreSvaraH SrImAm sarva mantreSvaraH praBuH daSa BUmi apatiH SrImAm sarva anarTa nivArakaH mahA Baya pradaH caNxaH duzwa sattva nivAraNaH darda anta damakaH DImAm dakzaH sattva arTa sidDizu yakza rUpeNa sattvAnAm AtmanA ca izwine Buvi sattva arTa kriyA yuktaH Darma arTam avatArayet boDi samBAram arTAya viceruH yakza rUpiNaH ye te sattvAH hitA loke yakziNyA saha mohitA tezAm sidDiH na Bavet mantrAm vAcA duScarita IritAm boDisattvaH mahA puNyaH bahurUpI mahardDikaH pradozya cittam mantreSe kutas sidDyanti mAnavAH mudrA etA paQca varA proktA budDEH ca api mahardDikA vajrapANiH mahA puNyA tAm ca kzipra suyojayet taTA eva hastO= udvartya Svetacandana kuFkumEH taTA eva sampuwa AkArO kuxmala AkAra vezwitO SiraH sTAne taTA anyastO  ca api susTitO vEdya sA tu vajraSirAH jQeyA mahAmudrA hitAH vidoH yakza senApateH mudrA dvitIyA Bavati mUrDajA uzNIza mudrA hitAH loke uzNIzam yakza pateH hitam tat eva vajram SirAmudrA UrDvam aQjali sTApitAm eza mudrA mahAmudrA uzNIzA iti pragIyate tRtIyA vajrodBavA nAma lalAwa sTAne tu sA Bavet saMnyasta aQjali sampUrNA DruvO maDyezu anAmikO ezA vajrodBavA nAma vajrapANe rTa sADikA caturTI tu mahAmudrA vajra vaktra iti gIyate uttAnO hasta talO nyasya veNikA AkAra samBavO vakzaH sTAne taTA nyasya maDya aFgulyAm su sUcitO ezA mudrA mahAmudrA varA yakza vare hitA sarva vajra AlayA ca sA paQca mAtrA mahAmudrA vajrapANi mahardDikA taTA eva hastO saMnyasya nABi sTAne tu kArayet tarjanyA kuQcitO kRtvA aFguzWa agre tu nAmayet tRtIye parvam ASlizya kanyasO ca su saMsTitO badDvas ca veNikA AkArAm SezEH aFguliBiH tadA ezA vajrAlayA nAma mahAmudrA pragIyate atra eva sarva mudrA tu lOkikAH ye ca vajriNe SEvAH SakrakAH ca api rizINAm ca mahardDikA hitA sA varA mataFginaH hi agrA mudrA proktAH mahAtmaBiH yakza rAkzasa pretEH ca kUzmANxEH kawa putanEH ye tu mudrA varA proktAH vizNvi indrEH ca vana AhvayEH ISAna mAtarEH loka grahEH ca api BAskara indu vivasvAkzEH vasavaH ca api su pUjitEH rakzA AtmakEH sRzwAH mudra varAH ye tu sarva BUta gaNEH sadA sarve ca eva samAyAnti mudre smim vajram Alaye praTitA mudra varAH hi agrA kule smim vajram Ahvaye muktA taTAgatIm mudrAm avaloki ISasya api mahAtmanaH mudrA hi eke te vE anyezAm praBuH izyate ezA mudrA mahAmudrA yakza senApateH vidoH vEdya yam badDvA puruzAH niyatam sarve boDi parAyaNAH ezA mudrA varaH SrezWaH parama AhuH taTAgatAH hati etAH paQca mahAmudrA vajrapANe yaSasvinaH jApiBiH sarvakAlam tu smartavyA ca mahA Baye ASu naSyanti BUtA vE kravyAdA piSita ASinA yakza rAkzasa pretAMsi kUzmANxAH kawa pUtanA deva ganDarvam anujAH kinnarAH ca sa sidDakAH graha muKya varAH garuxAH mAtarAH ca mahardDikAH ye pi te loka muKyAH ca brahma avizNu maheSvarAH sarva sattvAH ca vE loke yezu savartra mA ASRtAH sarve te dRzwa mAtram vE vidravanti na saMSayaH ete mudrA jina EhyAsI vajraDRte praBoH mantra nATasya yakza ISe lokISasya api mahAtmane tasmAt ca jApiBiH sarvEH niyatam sidDi lipsuBiH

column1: smartavyA japa kAle tu sarva mantrezu sidDi dA yaH sO kisalayA iti AhuH mudrAm AdO pragItavAm taTA eva hastO saMnyasya uraH sTAne nyaset buDaH tAm AdO veNikAm kRtvA aFgulIBiH samantataH sA vidyA kisalaye mudrA lOkikAm mantradevatAm tAm AdO yojayet kzipram kzudra karmezu DImatAm jvara roga gatA sarvAn nASayet na atra saMSayaH sA eva sumanasA jQeyA kanyasA aFgulinA amitO pawahI tu Bavet sA tu maDyama aFgulinA amitO kandarpI ca Bavet sA ca uBO aFguzWam ucCritO GawaKarparikA jQeyA anAmikA agra sunAmitO taTA eva kuxmalam kRtvA hasta agrO ca su BUzitO utpala AkAra cihnam tu mudram utpalam ucyate vikAsita uBayO hastO aFgulIBiH samantataH ezA vE padmamudrA tu Bave jyotsnA sanAmitO taTA eva yojitAm sarvAm aFgulyA agra agra kAri tA ezA suparNine mudrA suparNI iti pragIyate vEdya tat eva lampuwa AkAram viparyasta AkAra cezwitam sA Bavet yamalamudrA tu garutmasya api mahAtmane taTA eva hastO saMnyasya muzwi yogena yojitO uBaya aFguzWa maDya sTO liFga mudrA iti gIyate utTita aFguzWa maDya sTO tat evam SaFKam izyate tat eva hastO visrajya jayA Bavati viSrutA vijayA Bavate mudrA kanyasA aFguli vezwitO anAmikABiH samAyuktA ajitA Bavati pUraNI visRjya hastO saMyuktO vAma hastena mIlayet aFguzWa agram aDas nAmya muzwim badDvA iha paNxitaH ezA aparAjitA jQeyA mudrA iyam ca su pUjitA catuHkumAryaH viDi jQeyA Baginyezu prakIrtitA tumburuH tu eza viKyAtaH jyezWa BrAtA prakalpyate nOyAna samASritAH hi ete amBoDeH tu nivAsinaH vicaranti imam sTAne mahA puNya mahardDikAH vaSya arTam sarva BUtAnAm sRzwvA brahma vidaH vide sarvatra pUjitA hi etAH guhya mantrEH tu yojitA amoGA sidDim etAMsi sarva karmezu yojitA kzipram arTa karAH sidDAH maFgalyAH maGanASanAH SucinA Suci karmezu sADanIyA taTA uttamEH utTitam jvalanam SAntam Ka caram kAyi sidDaye maDyam sa maDya karmezu aSOcam kaSmala Adizu ye ca api pApa karmA vE nitya ucCizwAH ca dehinAm tezAm sidDi antya yatnena kzudra karmANi vE sadA taTA eva hastO saMyamya nABi deSe samAnayet maDyama aFgulI atas sUcyA veNikA AkAra vezwayet sumeKalA ca sA mudrA udvezwA Bavati meKalA tam eva maDa talO nyastO mudrA Bavati sampuwA sA evam ucCritA grIve SrI sampuwam ucyate nABi sTAne tadA nyasya apasavyena BrAmayet rajanI mudra varAH hi ezA duzwa sattva nivAraNI vEdya dakziNe karam udyamya muzwi yogena mASrayet mudrA muzwi vara iti AhuH sarva mantrANi cUrNanI sA eva aFgulim utsRjya uBO hastO prayojitA muzwimudrA vara iti AhuH piSita aSana nASanI sA tu saFkucitAH jQeyAH aFgulyA agrO su kuQcitO mudrA sukuntA vijQeyA kuntA ca eva prasAritEH tArA sutArAH viDi jQeyAH eka rUpO uBO Bavet utpala AkAra saMnyastA tarjanIBiH su saMhatA eka sUcikam iti eva sampuwa AkAra vezwitO tat eva prasAritA hastO tArA Bavati Guzyate tat eva hastO saMnyasya aQjalyAkAra kAritO tarjanyA miSritO SrezWO tRtIye parvaNi sTite aFguzWO ca ante mudrA Bavati locanA tat eva aFgulim utsRjya tarjanyO samprayojitO tat eva vihitA mudrA mudrA mAmakyA samprayojitA evalA mudra vara iti Ahu maDyama aFgulyEH su nAmitEH SvetA yABra mudrA vE karEH ca atra prasAritEH paNxarA tu Bavet mudrAH muzwiBiH samprapIxitEH mahA praBAvA mahA puNyA tarjanyO= ucCritO= uBO tat eva hastO sammiSra sampuwa AkAra vezwitO tarjanIBiH tatas kRtvA netra AkAram tu pIxayet BrukuwI mudravarA KyAtA mahA Baya harI sadA iti ete ca azwa mudrA vE kaTitA jina varEH purA mahApraBAvA mahA puNyA maheSa AKyA mahardDikA sarva mudrezu sarvatra mantrEH ca api viSezataH sarvatra pUjitAH hi ete smartavya arTa Pala pradA mahA rakzA pavitrAH ca maFgalyam aGa nASanAH sarvatra pUjitAH budDEH sarva mantrAn= ca sADayet tArA BRkuwI ca eva SvetA paNxaravAsinI mAmakI locanA ca eva sutArA tAra vartinI iti ete ca mahAmudrA paWitAH loka tattviBiH eza rakzA viDiH proktaH mahA rakzezu kaTyate vEdya mahA pApa harI hi etAH mahAmudrA svayamBuve lokISasya ca vIrasya mahA yakza pateH taTA ete mudrA mahA puNyA niyatA sidDi hetavaH

column1: kaTitAH loka muKyEH ca sambudDEH ca yaSasviBiH taTA eva hastO saMnyasya vENika AkAra samBavO sampIxitO viparyastO mudrA Bavati saFkulA taTA eva sUcika agram tu aFkuSasya Ahu varNitaH taTA eva kara puwaH gram vE unnanAmyaH SiraH sTitO vikAsya aFgulIm sarvAm CatrA Bavati SoBanA saMyamya muzwikAmArO rAtrI Bavati devatA tAmasI visRtEH nityam mudrA Bavati tattvataH taTA eva aFgulAm vezwO UrDvam aFguzWa nAmitO viza ninISanA sRzwAH reKa mudrA yaSasviBiH manasA na amitO jQeyAH mahA mAnasa mudritEH taTA eva hastO= utsRjya eka hastena mIlayet tarjanyO vezwayet maDyAm ezA sA garuxaDvajA uBO hastO samAyuktO veNim ASRtya maDyajO haMsamAlA iti mudrA iyam nAmnA sarvatra gIyate tat eva visRtO hastO tRsUcya AkAra vezwitO sA Bavet vajramudrA tu mudrA SrezWatamA hitA prakRzwA sarva mudrANAm vajrapANeH samAhitA tat eva visRta aFgulyO padma mAlA tu sA Bavet jyezWA mudra varA KyAtA padmaketoH samA Bavet ezA mudra varAH divyA mahA puNyA mahodBavA prayuktA sarva karmezu sidDim AyAnti dehinAm Buvi column1: boDisattva anuBAvena catur dikzu rAgatyaH evam vAcam udIrayante  paritrAyasva Bagavam vajrapANi paritrAyasva pIxitAH sma Bagavam su pIxitAH sma gatiH anyA na vidyate tvam eva Bagavam SaraNam tvam eva trANam iti atra antare vidyA rAjena SAsane suSAsitA sarva deva nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahA uraga manuzya amanuzyA sarva sattvAH ca sarva gati saFgRhItAH ca su vinItAH ca suSAsitAH mahAvidyA rAjena vEdya vajra aDipatinA anuBAvena tAH BaginyaH BrAtR sahitAH BItAH su vinItAH Arta svaram krandamAnAH avatizWante aTa Kalu maQjuSrIH boDisattvaH mahAsattvaH tAm devatAm BrAtR sahitAn Amantrayate sma mA BEzwata BaginyaH mA BEzwaTa budDam SaraNam gacCaDvam dvipadAnAm agram Darmam SaraNam gacCaDvam virAgANAm agram saFGam SaraNam gacCaDvam gaNAnAm agryam aTa tAH BaginyaH sa BrAtR paQcamAH budDam SaraNam gacCanti evam SaraNam gacCanti saFGam SaraNam gacCanti sma tatas tAH suKa sOmanasyAH parameNa suKa sOmanasyena samanvAgatAH aBUvan mukta gAXa banDana AtmAnam san jAnate sma prItI suKa samarpitAH labDa prasAda parama saQjAta hRzwa romakUpAH idam udAnam udAnayanti sma aho AScaryam idam prAptaH ratnatraya udBave suKitAH sma kzaNAt labDAt sarva durgati GahitAH sugatO svarga mokzaH ca sadA budDi niveSitA tatas tAm tuzwa manasaH maQjuGozam nirIkza ca praNipatya caraNO mUrDnA idam vAcam udIrayam trAtaH tvam sarva duHKeByaH gatiH tvam Bo mahA dyuteH yaH tvam sarva DarmANAm gaBIra padam akzarA tvam deSayase nATa banDu BUta namaH stu te AjQApaya mahA vIra mantra nATam jina Atmajam kim AnItAH sma devena AjQAm kim karavAni ha evam uktAH tu vIraH vE sarva budDa AtmajaH viBuH uvAca maDurAm vANIm devatABiH sa coditaH gacCa tvam SaraNam BUyas vajrapANi jina Atmaje

column1: avEvartika saFGaH vE boDisattva agraja udBavet tRratnam AdO kRtvA vE vaMSa jam jinavara Atmajam cittam ca boDaH IraDvam mEtra cittA Bava utsukA tatas vA sarvatas kRtvA jaGnuH svasTa tA Aspadam tatas tAH devatAH sarve praNipatya jina Atmajam AjQAm sampAdya sarvam vE yena vajrI tadA unmuKA namaskRtvA tu tAm kzipram vajrapANim mahA dyutim aBizwutya tatas sarve sTitAH tad muKa udBavAH prasamIkzya tadA kanyA sa BrAtR saha paQcamA vajrapANim ca yakza ISam nirIkzamANAH sTitAH aBUvam nitya arTam AspadAH devyaH anitya arTa arTa BUzitAH vEdya praNema maDurAm vAcAm Atma mantra ArtTa SoBanAm namaH te sarva budDAnAm boDisattvAm mahardDikAm pratyeka arha saFGam ca asatAn= ca eva yoginAm Atma mantra arTa vistAram kaTayAmaH mahA dyute

column1: yaTAtattva avaboDa ArtTam janAnAm tu mahI tale sa rahasyam guhya mantrANAm tvad vakzAn nisRta AtmanAm anurakza arTa mantrANAm AspadArTa ArtTa BUzaNAm evam ukte tu mantreSaH vajrapANiH mahA dyutiH Izi smita muKaH BUtvA vilokya vikasat muKaH pUjAyAmAsa tAm kanyAm sa BrAtR saKI janAm anujQAtam mayA yUyam nirviSaFka BavizyaTa saMSrAvya kalpa vistAram sa rahasyam sa maNxalam jantuBiH pUjitAH nityam varam vaH dAsyaTa sarvadA RziBiH pUjitAH yUyam yakza rAkzasa kinnarEH garuxEH deva ganDarvEH asurEH ca api mahardDikEH kUzmANxEH mAtarEH ca api samagrEH soma BAskarEH lokapAlEH DanADyakzEH patadBiH vasavEH taTA tEH iva iyam sura aDyakzEH piSAca uraga mAnuzEH BUta aDyakzEH niSA aDyakzEH piSita aSana vyantarEH rAkzasa aDipa muKyEH ca rOdra cittEH viheWakEH dEtya dAnava saFGEH ca yamEH preta mahardDikEH mAnuzA mAnuzEH ca api brahma vizNU maheSvarEH sura muKyEH mahA jyezWEH sidDa cAraNa pUtanEH yogiBiH jinaputrEH ca pUjitAH vaH BavizyaTa na sandehaH praBAvA vara kramA jayAyAH mantram iti AhuH kalpa vistAra vistarA nava kowyaH tu mantrANAm tantra kalpasa vistarA vijayA ca eva mantrANAm zazwiH labDA prakIrtitA ajitAyAH tu Bavet mAtra lakza zoxaSaka udBavA aparAjitAyAH tu kanyAyAH catur kowyaH udAhRtAH tumbureH sArTavAhasya nava kowyaH Ta gAyataH tad pramANAH Bavet kalpAH nRsura asura pUjitAH vEdya sarvam SEvam iti KyAtam sarvEH BU tala vAsiBiH mayA eva nigaditam pUrvam kalpe masmim sa vistare paScAt anyaH janaH prAhuH kalpa mantrAm pRTak pRTak tumburuH sArTavAhasya tryambakasya tu DImateH anantA kalpa vistArA Sarvasya asya kapardine yad praBAva ArtTam mantrANAm sidDim yAsyanti BU tale anujQAtA aTa vE yUyam kala rAje Ta vE sadA BAzaDvam mantra tantrANAm sa rahasyam sa vistaram sa guhyam guhyatamam ca api sarva sattva suKa udayam iti uktvA vajraDRS SrImAm vajram ASRtya lIlayA tUzNImBUta tadA tasTO ratna paFkajam ucCRte aTa tAH kanyakAH kzipram sa BrAtRm aTa paQcamAH praNipatya mantra nATam vE yakza ISam jina vara Atmajam vajrapANim mahA vIram mantra nATa ISvaram viBum uvAca maDurAm vAcAm ekEkAm anupUrvataH maNxalam tu samAsena vakzye ham BujayA udayam jyezWa maNxalam iti AhuH jayA jyezWam agAyata vijane rahasi sampAte vigate ca eva mahAjane pracCanne grapra sambADe sarit tIre Siloccaye vivikte kAnane ramye budDa aDyuzita mandire SUnye devakule ca api SUnye veSmamu SoDite eka vRkze SuBe ramye mahA udaDi samASraye eka liFge SmaSAne ca vigate DUma pAMsuBiH vajrAsana mahA puNye Darma cakre su SoBane yatra SAntim gataH budDaH yatra jAtaH mahA muniH ete sTAnA Bavet muKyA maNxala Ali Kane SuBA gaFgA tIre Ta sarvatra sa dvIpa pulina ASraye sarit varAH ca muKyAH ye kIrttitA loka viSrutA tezu tIrezu sarvatra nityam maNxalam AliKet samantAt sarva toyAntA mahA udaDi sama plavA himavanta vinDyA toya antA prasTitAH nimnaga ambuDeH sarit varizWezu tIrezu yuktaH maNxalam AliKet vEdya anye vA rahasi BU BAge uxaye vA su SoBite deva Ayatana ramyezu stUpe ca api mahA ucCrite DAtu garBe taTA cEtye vApI kUpAsu vITikEH tezu tIrezu sarvatra maDye ca api su SoBitE gozWe padmasarat sarvAm kvacid toya ASraya udBavEH anyEH vA sTAna agrEH nityam vihAra ArAma BUpitEH yaTizwa manasaH tuzwiH muni juzwe mahI tale parvata agrEH grahEH ca api kandarEH sa anucihnitaH SAntEH AvasaTEH divyEH grahEH ca api vijantuBiH DyAna anukUlEH praSastEH ca Rzi muKyEH nizevitEH yatra vA manasaH tuzwiH tatra maNxalam AliKet ezu sTAnezu vE nityam yaTA udizwEH su pUjitEH nipetuH devatAH kzipram sAnniDyam ca api kalpayet tatra sTAne tadA nityam japa homa kramaH viDiH ye sADyAH mantra muKyAH ca uttama aDama maDyamAH sidDyanti mantrAH sarve vE sidDa kzetrezu iha udite sidDyanti sarva mantrA sarve vE jyezWa maDyama kanyasA

column1: viviDAH hi Bave sidDiH triviDA eva kriyA viDiH tri prakAraH tu mantrANAm triDA kAla praBedataH tri sanDyam sarva mantrANAm triDA karma Pala unmuKAH SAntikam karma nirdizwam jaya AKye maNxale SuBe vijaya AKye tu pOzwI arTam ajita AKye ca aBicArukam aparAjita AKye taTA nityam nirdizwam kzudra karmasu sarva karmasu mantra jQaH tumbura AKyam samAliKet paQca eva maNxalAH jQeyAH amBoDe tu nivAsinAm samantAt catur asram vE ukti mAtram Kanet Buvi catur hasta azwa hastam vA saMSoDya pANinA punar kaWaNNaH SarkarA aFgAraH tuza keSam avaskarAm kapAla asTi SakR t uzwAm saMSoDya pANinA tatas svayam ca api parEH tatra sarva avaskara tAm japet kRmi jantu samAkIrNAH saMSoDyaH yatnataH vratI ApUrya aranya mRttikEH SuciBiH ca suganDiBiH vEdya nadI kUla udBavEH meDyEH taTA valmIka agra samBavEH gozWa BUta layoH maDye tad anyEH vA pArTiva udBavEH sikatABiH samantAt vE saQSAdya prasanna DIH aTavA gomaya miSrEH vA mRttikABiH samantataH samantam Alepayet kzipram paQcagavya samAsRtEH kuFkuma aktEH taTA snigDEH viviDEH ganDa miSritEH mRttikABiH samantAt vE maNxalam tu samantataH Alepya Buvi yatnA vE mantra vid mantra tantra vid paQcAFgika cUrNEH tu viviDEH DUpa vAsitEH AliKet maNxalam divyam samantA catur hastakam azwa hasta pramANam vA jyezWam maNxalam ucyate catur hastaH Ta kanizWam maDyamam parikIrtyate paQca hastaH Ta viKyAtaH zaw hastaH Ta muktavAm sarvezAm tu devInAm sa BrAtR sahita AtmanAm maNxala pramANam iti uktaH samantA ccaturaSritam catur dvAram catur koNam catur toraNa BUzitam AliKet maNxalam divyam praSastam cAru rUpiNam maDye kumAram AliKya bAla rUpa su BUzaNam kuFkuma AkAra varNa ABam vAma maDye Ta saMsTitam nIlotpalam samantAdya kara lagna upaSoBitam dakziNe karavinyastam SrImAlam Palam Ayatam kiQcid vara dam devam maQjuGozam mahA praBum kiMcid unmIlita akzam tu Izit prekzaNa devatAm dakziNena samantAt vE mahA udaDi samAliKet tatrasTAH nOvArUXam devyAm BrAtR paQcamAm AliKet mantra vidyAnAm su vezAm cAru rUpiNAm vicitra ABaraNa vinyastAm vicitra praharaNa udyatAm kumArI AkAra cezwAnAm sa BrAtR kumAra vikramAm nOyAna samArUXAm sa BrAtR saha paQcamAm karNaDAra samopetAm tumburuH sArTavAhikAm mahodaDi samantAt vE maNxala aByantaram sTitam RzA AdyE prANiBiH yuktam sPowakam vAri pUjitam vEdya AliKet maNxalam DImAm gupte rahasi sarvatas yaTA hi viDi nirdizwam tattvam ca api kIrttitam

column1: tat sarvam kArayet kzipram lOkikezu eva yojayet yAvanti SEvatantre smim ye tantre ca api gAruxe brahma AdyEH Rzi muKyEH ca BRgu AFgirasa kASyapEH mArkaNxa muni varEH ca api pulastya agasti samBavEH vAsavEH SakradevEH ca rudra indra sa BAskarEH viviDEH sattva muKyEH ca yama AdyEH preta mahardDikEH graha mAtara kUzmANxEH yakza rAkzasa pUjitEH mAnuzA mAnuze loke citta nATEH mahardDikEH pUjitA kalpa vistArAH vizNuH udra sa vAsavEH kaTitA kalpa mahAtmyam niKilAH ca eva BU tale tasmim maNxale yojyA sidDyanti iha na saMSayaH viviDAH yoni muKyEH tu viviDa AkAra cezwitEH kaTitA kaTayizyanti devInAm kalpa vistarAm tasmim samaye niyoktavyA jaya AKye maNxale BuviH iti boDisattva piwaka avataMsakAn mahAyAna vEpulya sUtrAt Arya maQju SrI mUla kalpAt paQcacatvAriMSatamaH pawala visarAt praTamaH catur BaginI maNxalam anupraveSa samaya guhyatamapawala visaraH parisamAptaH iti vEdya aTa azwacatvAriMSaH pawala visaraH aTa Kalu vijayA nAma devI tatra eva parzadi sannipatitA sannizaNNA aBUvam sa svakam maNxala upacaryA sADana viDim BAzayati sma AdO tAvat vivikte deSe pracCanne rahasi paQca raFgika cUrNena Sukla kRzNa pIta rakta haritEH cUrNEH paQcamyA SuBe sita kRzNayoH pakzevA maNxalam AliKet catur hasta pramANam samantAt caturasram catur koNam catur toraNa BUzitam samantAt maNxala maDye mahA udaDi samAliKet catur mudrA alaFkRtam maDye sArTavAhaH ca mudrA maNxala AkAram indu varNa ABam pUrva uttare koNe jayA mudrA arDacandra AkAra sitam dakziNa pUrva koNe vijayA mudrA paScima dakziNa koNe ajitAyAH mudram banDa AkAram rakta avaBAsam uttara paScima koNe aparAjitAyAH mudram vajra AkAram kRzNa nirBAsam sarvatajvAlA mAlinaH karttavyAH pUrvavacA okza samAcAreNa BUtvA catur koNa catvAraH pUrNa kalaSAH sTApayitavyAH Amra pallava pracCAdita muKAH sarva vrIhi ratna paripUrNa g maDye tu sArTavAhasya tumbureH paQcamam kalaSam taTA eva Amra pallava pracCAdita muKam pratyagra vastra avakuNWitAH ca kAryAH tat ca taTA eva bali nivedya puzpa AdayaH yaTA mudrAH taTA eva kAryA tad varNaH ca pUzpa DUpa ganDa AdayaH tat sarvam taTA eva kAryam caturdiSam ca baliH kzeptavyA arDarAtre maDyAhne ca aBicAruke pratyUze pOzwike aparAhne SAntikam astam gate vA savitari karma trayam ca api yaTAkAla upadizwa maNxala hprayoktavyam SucinaH dakza SIlAH cam strI puruza AdayaH avyaTitAH ca praveSayitavyAH saradArikAH ca guhya mantra DAriNaH AdO praveSayitavyAH prAFmuKam sTApayitvA vijayAyAH mUlamantreNa udakam aBimantrya sapta aBimantritam kRtvA sarvezAm aByaziQcet sakRt ahorAtra uzitAnAm Suci vastra prAvRtAnAm azwO praBRti yAvat ekam prAFmuKam paScAt dvAreNa praveSayet pratyagra muKa pracCAditAm kRtvA ekEkam vijayAyAH mudram badDvA aQjalim kRtvA pIta puzpa datvA kzipApayet vijayAyAH mantram kRtvA muKam utsAdya maNxalam darSApayet pradakziNam ca kArApayet sarvezAm mudrAm darSayet tatas nupUrvataH sarve praveSayitavyA yAvat azwO= iti pUrvam tAvat devInAm Ahva Anana mantreNa BrAtR sahitAnAm mUlamantreNa yaTocittEH puzpEH AvAhayet pUrvam paScAt DUpam datvA yaTocitam namaskAram kRtvA yatra utsahate SizyaH strI puruza dAraka dArikA vA sa tasmim maNxale bahis aBizecayitavyaH rAja vat sarva upakaraNEH yaTA aBirucitEH vA mantram maNxala AcAryasya tuzwiH yena vA tuzyeta tayA aBizecayet aBizicya ca eka vA trayaH vE aBizecanIyaH Arya aBizekeNa

column1: ekam ca vaktavyam SRNu kula putra kula duhituH vA labDa aBizekaH tvam anujQAtaH sarva devatABiH ca sa BrAtR sahitEH ca sva mantra tantrezu yaTezwam maNxalam AliKya sva mantrANAm viDi niyama caryA kalpa vistarAm dadasva iti vaktavyaH tad anye vidyA aBizekeNa aBizecayitavyA dvi trayaH vA janAH SezAH tu sva mantra caryAyAH SikzApayitvA visarjayitavyA vEdya tatas maNxala AcAryeNa candana udakena aByukzya arGam dattvA sva mantreNa eva DUpa puzpa AdiBiH devatAm visarjayitavyA sarvam ca upakaraNam AtmanA grahetavyam gRhya ca svam pratyaMSam tritIya BAgam sarvam anATeByaH dAtavyam Sezam udake plAvayitavyam tam pRTivI pradeSam su liptam kRtvA su SoBitam vigata rajaskam yaTA izwayaH gantavyam yaTA sva mantra caryAsu ca taTA SikzApayitavyAH sarve SizyAH pracCanne rahasi vigata jana sampAte sva devatA mudrAn= ca banDApayitavyAH tEH eva mantrEH pUrva nirdizwEH mantrEH su viSezataH sarva mantrA sidDim gacCanti iti ASu sidDi kriyA yukti mantrANAm ca viSezataH jaya AKye maNxale hi uktam pUrva nirdizwa hetuBiH tad karma viDi nirdizwaH vijaya AKye maNxale SuBe dvitIyam maNxalam iti AhuH nirdizwam tattva arTa mantriBiH vijayA nAmataH jQeyA sarva karma arTa sADikA IpsitAm sADayet arTAm sarva mantrezu mantra vid pUrvam japtaH mantraH tu sarva karmezu mAnavI tati Atma devatA rakzA vijayAyA tu kIrtyate parABavaH ca viGnAnAm AramBaH ca Pala unmuKaH maNxale vijaya AKye tu dvitIye sarva arTa sADane darSanAt muQcate puMsaH sarva kalvizam AyatEH japAt yogAt ca mantra jQaH pApa SudDiH ca jAyate parABavaH ca anyezAm mantrANAm tu BU tale paripakza gatAm dezAm sva duzwa aduzwa yoni jAm na ASaye tad kzaNAt mantrI vijaya AKye maNxala AvRtIH sarva karmikam iti AhuH vaSya AkarzaNa BUtikam saPalam karma jam loke puzwi SAnti arTa sADakam sarva arTa sADakaH hi eza maNxala udaDi samBavaH vijaya AKye bahu mataH puNyaH praSastaH soma pUjitaH nityam nityatamaH puNyaH maFgalaH maGanASanaH surUpaH rUpam antar ca DanyaH sarva arTa sADakaH liKanAt mantriBiH kzipram UrDva gAm arTa sADakam itid iti ajitAt evam iti AhuH prasannAH budDa SAsane maNxalam trayam eka vE kaTitam loka pUjitam pUrvam rizi varEH muKyEH kaTitam loka cihnitEH aDunA ca pravakzye ham ajita AKyam maNxalam vEdya yat va tat yaTA eva niyojayet kintu varNa varam raktam raktEH ca api cUrNakEH taTA eva bali puzpa AdyAm ganDa DUpa AdiBiH kramEH sarva rakta mayam bAhyam asRk grasta aFga SoBanam taTA eva mudrAm sarvatram BImAm ca eva viyojayet bali homa kriyA yuktiH raktEH ca api niyojayet kalaSAH ca eva rakta ABAm rakta vastrAn= ca dApayat taTA eva muKavezwam vA rakta= Catram taTA eva ca Asanam Sayanam yAnam raktam ca eva samAlaBet taTA eva rakta mantrANAm strI puMsA arTa kAraNam rAga arTam AvRte mantrAm rAgiNasya eva yujyate na anya mantrezu mantra jQaH matim kAreTa kattRNAm budDimantaH sadA ayogI mantra jQaH mantram Irayet kAma arTam sampadam prAptAH vaSya AkarzaNa hetukam prApnuyAt sampadAm sarvAm ajita AKye maNxale dButAm sarva BUta vaSa arTAya maNxalam Buvi mucyate kaTitam mantriBiH nityam citta vikzepa kAraNAt AkRzya mahA Ujam karma vaSyA BOtika cezwitam vikzipta cittaH martyaH vE AvizwA vira lekzitAm dAsa BUtam samAyAtam sarvajQA sampratIcCakam vivaSam vaSam AyAtam kiFkara anuvaSa vartinam tAdRSam mAnuzam dRzwvA punar eva sampramokzayet striyam vA yadi vA puMsam dArakam vA aTa dArikAm BUyas pi mUlamantreNa ajitena eva mokzayet pUrva nirdizwa karmEH ca viDi yuktEH mahI tale AliKet maNxalam DImAm sarvadA eva prayojayet saPalam karma nirdizwam sa mantram mantra karmaNi pUrvam anya prayogEH tu sADayet viDim uttamAm sADyamAnAH hi sidDi ante sarve mAheSvarAH gaNAH viDAna jQApataH rUpam mudram mantra arTa tantra tA kriyA yoga pramANam tu kaTyamAna ativistarA etat pramANataH jQeyam maNxale smin niboDatAm vEdya hastA ca dazwa saptAH vA zawpaQca caturaH taTA dvi hasta hasta mAtram vA vRtA maNxalam udBavet jyezWam azwaH taTA hastam sapta zaz paQca maDyamAH catur hasta dvi hastam vA hasta mAtram tu kanyasam jyezWe SAntikam kuryA taTA maDye tu pOzwikam ABicAruka mantrezu kuryAt kanya sa maNxale vaSya arTam sarva BUtAnAm nityam jamBana mohane kuryAt sarva karmANi jApI mantra rataH sadA ajita AKyam maNxala nirdizwam sarva graha vimokzaNam yatra BUtAH piSAcAH ca graha mAtara pUtanAH dRzwa mAtrAH vaSam AyAnti nityam jamBita mohitAH darSanAt maNxale nityam kzipram gacCanti vaSyatAm iti aparAjitA tu devyAH vE praNamya jina vara Atmajam vajrakam guhyaka indram tu maQjuGozam su BUzaNam sarvAm budDa sutAn= ca eva  mahA ojasAm sa BrAtR paQcamAm devIm imAm vAcam udIrayet aham api evaMviDam kAryam maNxala arTa iti yukti jam vavre ca SuBa saFgItam  yuki arTa akzara saMsRzwiH eza pra mahA praBAvam mahA ojaskam durdAnta damakam matam sa kRzNam kRzNa varNa ABam kAlarAtri sama praBam yama dUta AKya varNa ABam sAkzAt vivasvatam Goram para prANa haram Bayam yaTAvat pUrva nirdizwam devInAm tu maNxale taTA eva tat kuryAt sarvam varjayitvA tu varNataH SmaSAne nityam AleKyam pure dakziNatas sadA sa DUme jvAlA m AlIXe asTi kaFkAla vezwite maDyasTe sa vasRje deSe tatrasTe tu mahI tale SmaSAna BasmanA leKyam kRzNa varNe tu BU tale yaTA evam pUrva nirdizwam mantrEH arca viDi kramam tat sarvam kziprataH mantrI sarvam ca eva niyojayet sva mantram mantra nATam ca tumburum sArTavAhakam mahodaDi samAvRtAm vEdya ajitAyAm ASu nirdizwA vijayA Kaxga pANinI DanuH hastAm sadA devI jayA tAm aBinirdiSet vicitra praharaNA hi etAH vicitra ABaraNa BUzitA vicitra gati sattva AKyA vicitrA veza cezwitA AliKya maNxale hi atra kRzNa varNA tu BU tale para prANa haram hi etat maNxalam Buvi cezwitam viviDa arTa kriyA mantrA karmam udBavA tat sarvam pUrvavat kRtvA paScAt karma samAraBet japa homa kzayAH mantrAH maNxalAn= ca eva darSanam praveSam maNxale hi asmin tad pUrvam viDim udBavEH eza saMkzepataH hi uktaH kaTyamAnaH tivistaram maNxalam devi muKyAyAH kanyasAyA tu kIrttitam aparAjita AKya nAm atas jQeyaH maNxalam Buvi viSrutam ajitam sarvatas pUrvam rAkzasa ISvara kinnarEH BUtEH dEtya muKyEH tu yama mAta rasa grahEH kUzmANxe vyantarEH ca api piSitASEH sa pUtanEH tantre tu sarvatas mantrEH kravyAdEH tu sa kaSmalEH asura aDyakzEH mahA GorEH sarva BUta mahodayEH iti aTa tumburuH sArTavAhaH vEsvam maNxalam aBAzayam tumbura AKyam vAmatas martyAm vajraDRk pizwvA sva mantreNa aBimantrya pAdO mrakzayet yojana Satam gamana Agamanam karoti aKinnam yAvat na tyajate vijayA mUlam gRhya taTA eva kartavyam taTA jayAyAH sarvam karoti iti ajitA evam Aha  ajita mUlam saFgRhya taTA eva karttavyam sarvam sADayati iti aparAjitA evam Aham  aparAjitA mUlam gRhya Sukla kRzNO sa patra Pala mUlO sarvam taTA eva kartavyam yaTA sArTavAhasya iti kintu ayam viSezaH ASu kAri kzipram sidDyati iti putraQjarI kRtAQjalI sahA ca sahadevA ca mahA uzaDI Catra aDicCatrA taTA devI mahAkAlaH ca viSrutaH nAkulI ganDana AkulyO taTA saFkucita karNikA etezAm mUlam AdAya SUrja cUrNAni kArayet anena pRzwa mAtraH tu vaSam AyAnti dehinaH raktaSAli tuzam ca eva kuFkumam sahacandanam kastUrikA samAyuktam divya vAri sama plutam triloha AkArayeva izwam vE guwikAm kurvIta mantra vid akza mAtram tatas kRtvA guwikAm vaktre tum tAm nyaset candra grahe Ta rAtrO vA japet mantram samAhitaH praBAte sidDam antar tu yaTezwam yAti deha jaH parivartayate jApam vaktra sTA guwikA sadA yaTezwa paSu rUpI vA samantAt hiNxati medinIm udgINe taTA yuktiH sva dehI Bavati jApa DIH anyaTA yadi vaktra sTA viSva rUpA Bavet sadA sva mantreNa Atma rakzam tu kRta jApI viSizyate anyaTA hRyate guwikA yadi rakzAm na karoti jApI sarva mantrAH tu sidDi ante mantra rAj sarva lOkikAH pUjanAt sarva kalpAnAm sarva sarvEH ca BAzitAm te smim sidDim AyAnti mantra tantra aBiBAzitAm vicaranti mahIm kRtsnAm vicitrAH veza DAriNaH gati yoni videha sTAH SvAna vAyasa rUpiNaH mArjAra taTA ulUkAH mUza maNxUka vRScikAH sarva yoni samAkIrNAH videhAH deha visTitAH paryawanti mahIm kRtsnAm sarva BUta rutAvinaH vEdya sarva sattve vaSA vezA sarva BUte priya udayA kurvanti ca sadA martyA tadA tezAm niyojayet na anyezAm kaTyate loke pUjitAH ca eva devatEH sarvam ca sarvatas jQeyam sarva mantra prasADakam kaTitam kaTayizyanti ye ca anye Buvi mAnavAH tat sarvam kalpa visaram iha ca uktam loka mAtarEH evam uktAH tu devAH vE sUtrAnta saha paQcamAH tUzNImBUtA tatas tasTu praNamya jina puFgavam nizaNNaH Darma SravaNAya tasmim parzadvaret vare aDizWAnAm ca budDAnAm aSezANAm ca jina AtmajAm aDyezya ca mahA vIram tUzNImBUtAH tad anantare aTa vajraDRS SrImAm pUjayAmAsa devatAH sADukAram adAt tezAm sattva anugraha kAmyayA sADu sADu tatas kanya samaye tizWaDva yatna tAm iti

column1: vidyADara rAjA Bavati yatra icCati tatra gacCati boDisattva caryA AcArI Bavati kumArIm prAsAdikAm su snAtA alaFkRtAm kRtvA pawasya agratas yaTA viBavataH pUjAm kRtvA vAma hastena gRhya sTitaH tAvat japet yAvat tayA tayA eva sArDam vidyADaraH Bavati eka liFgasya upari hastam datvA tAvat japet yAvat saKAyAH na paSyanti adRSyaH sarva sidDAnAm agamyaH antarDAnikam Bavati trayodaSyAm candra grahe sUrya grahe vA haritAlam boDi vRkza patra antaritam kRtvA maheSvara Ayatane sa DAtuke ca etyE tAvat japet yAvat DU tilakam kRtvA antarhitaH Bavati kzIra yAvaka AhAraH samudra tawe vRkza mUle sahasram japet trisanDyam sapta rAtram samudra gAni ratnAni paSyati yaTezwam gRhNIyAt mudga AhAraH parvata SiKaram Aruhya azwa sahasram japet viMSati rAtram parvata gatAni maNi ratnAni darSanam Bavati tatas hasta Sirasi kRtam tasya upari upavizwa azwa sahasram japet evam divasAni sapta sa vaSaH Bavati rAjAnam rAjamAtram vA vaSIkartu kAmaH tasya maDUcCizwakena pratikRtim kRtvA nirDUma aFgArezu kzipet sapta rAtram sa vaSaH Bavati vastra kAmaH Sveta puzpANAm aparimarditAnAm sakRt parijapya udake kzipet sapta rAtram azwa sahasram vastra yugam pratilaBate go GRtam azwa sahasram japtvA striyAm AdadyAt viSalyA Bavati navanIta azwa Sata japtena aByakta agnim praviSati na ca dadyate tena eva ca aByaktaH jalam praviSati stamBitaH Bavati japamAnaH yAvat utsAham Bikzam Bakzayati Ayasam pradeSa mAtram Kaxgam kRtvA sa DAtuke cEtye pawam pratizWApya udArAm pUjAm kRtvA aSvatTa patrEH pradakziNa AvarttEH Kaxgam prtAvat japet yAvat jvalitaH iti tena gRhIta sa parivAra utpatati vidyADara sahasra parivRtaH aBedyaH sarva vidyADarANAm varza kowim jIvati kRta puraScaraNaH kRzNa azwamyAm kRzNa caturdaSyAm vA pawasya udArAm pUjAm kRtvA saFGa uddizwakAm Bikzam Bojya manaHSilAyAm BUmO padmam Satapatram leKya padma karNikAyAm upaviSya tAvat japet yAvat BUmim BitvA padmam uttizWati padma patrezu ca upavizwAH viMSati vidyADarAH prAdurBavanti tEH parivRtaH utpati yAvantaH satvAm paSyati yEH ca dRSyate tEH sArDam gacCati sa ca padmaH aneka ratna alaFkRtaH Bavati vimA AtuH a kalpam jIvati Binna dehe sva icCayA upapati gRhNAti pAnIye azwa sahasra aBimantritena Suzka vRkzam siQcet puzpyati Palati ca Suzka nadIm avatIrya japet udakam Bavati nadI prataraNe japet SrAntasya sTalaH Bavati rAjAnam rAjamAtram vA vaSIkartu kAmena pawasya agratas kRzNa azwamyAm AraBya vEdya puzpANAm azwa sahasram nivedayet lavaNa Ahutim ca azwa sahasram juhuyAt niyatam rAjA vaSI Bavati tAm eva azwamIm AraBya gorocanA trisanDyam azwaSatikena japet yAvat ekAdaSI tena tilakam kRtvA yam vIkzyati sa vaSaH Bavati yat icCe dAraka dArikAm vaSIkartu kAmaH pawasya agratas sidDArTakAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tAsAm pAdapAsum gRhya puttalikAm kRtvA yasya nAma grahaNam karoti sa vaSaH Bavati meGa arTinA gavya GRtam gRhya candra grahe sUrya grahe vA tAmra BAjane prakzipya tAvat japet yAvat triviDA sidDiH UzmAyamAne Sruti DaraH yam yam SRNoti tam gRhNAti DUmAyamAne rasa rasAyanam jvalitena jAti smaraH Bavati arka puzpANAm lakzam juhuyAt dInAra lakzam dadAti pawasya agratas arka puzpANAm azwa sahasram nivedayet dInAra Satam laBate pawasya agratas SAli tandulAnAm GRta aByaktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt paQca dInArAm laBate kRta puraScaraNaH pawasya agratas daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt dInAra Sata trayam laBate kRzNa tilAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt dInAra Sata aDikam laBate kula patim vaSIkartu kAmaH pawasya agratas arka samiDAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tri sanDyam sapta rAtram kula patiH vaSIBavati lokapatyam vaSIkartu kAmaH pawasya agratas dUrvA pravAlAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram trisanDyam kOlapatyam karoti yAvajjIvam Arya saFGam vaSIkartu kAmena arka puzpANAm pawasya agratas azwa sahasram nivedayet sapta rAtram yad arTam kuryAt tam anvicCati satata japena arTam laBate guggulu gulikAnAm pawasya agratas azwa sahasram juhuyAt suvarNa sahasram laBate pawasya agratas kunduruDUpam azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram niDAnam laBate pawasya agratas arka kAzWa samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm trisanDya sahasram juhuyAt dInAra sahasram laBate Satru vaSIkaraNe pozaDikaH pawasya agratas tri sanDyam rAja sarzapANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta aham sarva SatravaH vaSAH Bavanti lAkzA AhutInAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta aham sarva jana priyaH Bavati SAli tandulAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tri sanDyam sapta aham kArzApaNa Satam laBati kRta puraScaraNaH kRzNa azwamyAm kRzNa caturdaSyAm vA mRtakapuruzam akzata aFgam gRhya snAna alaFkRtam kRtvA suganDa puzpa DUpEH aByarcyamastake AhantavyaH tatas uttizWati puzpa loha maye Kaxge AhantavyaH jAtarUpam suvarNam laBati aTa na icCati vaktavyam  Cardasva iti tatas cintAmaNi nirgacCati tam Sirasi kaNWe vA kRtvA anyatra vA badDvA yam cintayati tam prAdurBavati Sukla pratipadam AraBya ahorAtra uzitaH samudra gAminim nadIm aMsa mAtram udakam avatIrya jAtI puzpANAm daSa sahasrANi pravAhayet daSa mAzakam laBate suvarNa sahasram vA Sukla pratipadam AraBya samudra gAminyAH nadyA padmAnAm daSa sahasrANi nivedayet sapta rAtram niDAna saFGAwakam laBate kRta puraScaraNaH tAm eva nadIm avatIrya puzpANAm daSa sahasrANi pravAhayet sapta aham daSa grAmANi AlaBate aSoka puzpEH caNaka mAtrAm guwikAm kRtvA pawasya agratas daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm tri sanDyam azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram yam mRgayati tam laBate
column2: bi shva sam bha ba /

column1: apAmArga samiDAnAm eza viDiH suvarNa sahasram laBate aSoka guwikA vyatimiSrEH apAmArga tandulEH pawasya agratas tryaktAnAm daSa sahasrANi vEdya  juhuyAt nAma grahaNena rAja kanyam laBati mAsa mAtreNa rAjAnam sa mantriNam vaSIkartu kAmaH pawasya agratas aSoka samidBiH agnim prajvAlya aSoka puzpANAm eva daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm daSa sahasrAN sa mantrI vaSam AgacCati pawasya agratas agnim prajvAlya apAmArga samidBiH SatapuzpAm daDi maDu GRta aktAm daSa sahasrANi juhuyAt sva gRhe niDAnam paSyati samudra gAminyAm nadyAm kawI mAtram udakam avatIrya daSa sahasrANi nivedayet ye tAm jiGranti vAma hastena muzwim baDvA lakzam japet tatas sidDaH Bavati muktvA dRSyati sa DAtuke cEtye nadI tawe vA parvate vA pawam pratizWApya padmAnAm lakzam juhuyAt Sriyam paSyati etena eva viDinA nIlotpalAnAm lakzam juhuyAt viDAnAm paSyati
column2: a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /

column1: guggulu gulikAnAm lakzam juhuyAt dInAra lakzam laBate suganDa puzpANAm lakzam juhuyAt vastrANAm kowim laBate guggulu DUpena azwaSatikena manoBilazitAm ca pUrayati tila sarzapANAm pawasya agratas pratidinam azwa sahasram juhuyAt divasa trayam paQcaviMSati dIna ArAm laBate anena eva viDinA sapta rAtram juhuyAt dInAra Satam laBati lavaNa mayIm pratikRtim CitvA CitvA juhuyAt azwa sahasram yam icCati sa vaSaH Bavati strI vA puruzaH vA uBaya Ardram hasta sarzapANAm GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt divasa trayam sarva viGna upaSamanam udake eka pAdam prakzipya sTale ekaH eva tAvat jpet yAvat udaka sTam pAdam laGuH Bavati tatas pApAt muktaH Bavati arka kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya rAjikAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta aham karma AvaraNam kzIyate brAhmI guxUcI pippalI cUrNam sama BAgAni kRtvA maDunA saha AryamaQju Sriyasya agratas ekaviMSati vArAn parijapya lihet sapta aham meGAvI Bavati dvi sapta rAtram parama meDAvI Bavati dvi mAsa yogena Sruti DaraH Bavati pawasya agratas pratimAyAH vE azwa sahasram japam kRtvA paScAt pibet evam dinedine mOnI japet meGAvI Bavati badDaH rudDaH vA japena eva mucyati cOrAm dRzwvA japet corEH na muzyati tElam azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA Siram mrakzayet sarva jana priyaH Bavati BagavataH budDasya agratas ye spRSanti te sarve vaSyAH Bavanti anena eva mantreNa Sastra Ahatasya puruzasya tElam azwa sahasra aBimantritena mrakzayet vraNaH naSyati na vedanA Bavati anena lozwam parijapya sapta vArAm jale prakzipet makara kacCapa AdInAm tuNxa banDaH kRtaH Bavati pUrNamAsyAm tri rAtra uzitaH nABi mAtram udakam avatIrya Sukla puzpANAm azwaSatam nivedayet paQcadInAra mUlyam vastra yugam laBate candra grahe sa DAtuke cEtye guQjAnAm SlakzNa cUrNIkRtAnAm DRta maDu miSrAH guxikAm kArayet sapta aSvatTa patra antaritAm hastena avacCAdya tAvat japet yAvat jvalati Bakzayet Sruti DaraH Bavati anena sarva AturANAm karmANi kuryAt SUla dAGavaH tastrI mUtrakRcCra ajara gRDa Bideya tElam parijapya nirogaH Bavati Sukla pratipadam AraBya tri rAtra uzitaH aSvatTa patra vRkzasya aDastAda yUTikA kalikAnAm GRta daDi kzIra aByaktAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt rUpaka Satam laBate aTa na sidDyati karma kuryAt rUpaka Satam laBate paSyati vA piSAca jvara BUta graha vinASakam sUtreNa mokzayati nAryAH aprasavamAnAyAH tElam azwa Satam parijapya nABim kawi pradeSam vA mrakzayet viSalyA Bavati kumBIra DAraNam lozwa Sata aBimantritena anantO= etasI brAhmI vacA bRhatI maDu saMyuktA sa DAtuke cEtye candram apaSyatA vEdya tAvat japet yAvat muktaH iti
column2: la hu la hu /

column1: ParaParAyate BakzayitvA Sruti DaraH Bavati saFgrAme pratisara azwa Sata aBimantritam kRtvA granTim haste baDvAH ahata balaH Bavati ahorAtra uzitena BagavataH grataH sADayitavyaH samudra gAminIm nadIm avatIrya gatvA kzIra yAvaka AhAreNa pakzam upozya vikasitAnAm Sveta padmAnAm udake nivedayet niDAnam paSyati paQcagavyena kAya SoDanam kRtvA Sukla pratipadam AraBya yAvat pUrNamAsI iti kRta puraScaraNaH ante tri rAtra uzitaH kumArIkartita sUtram gRhya sa DAtuke cEtye pratimAyAm vA gRhe daSa sahasra aBimantritena haste baDvAH adRSyaH Bavati sa DAtuke cEtye pawam pratizWApya padmAnAm triMSat sahasrANi juhuyAt Kadira aFgArEH agnim prajvAlya svarUpeNa paSyati yam mRgayati tam laBate pratipadam AraBya yAvat paQcadaSI iti tri rAtra uzitaH sa DAtuke cEtye udArAm pUjAm kRtvA udumbarIBiH samiDABiH agnim prajvAlya GRta Ahutim juhuyAt grAmam laBate samudra gAminyAH nadI tIre stu upa sahasram kArayet pratidinam ekEkasya stUpasya ganDa puzpa DUpa AdIm datvA azwa sahasra aBimantritam kArayet yAvat paScimam stUpam jvalati tatas jQAtavyam BagavAm mahA boDisattvam AgacCati AgacCamAnasya pRTivI prakampaH suganDa ganDa vAyavaH vAnti tAvat japet yAvat sva rUpeNa tizWati sa yam varam yAcate tam laBate BagavataH grataH Kadira patra KaNxikAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt pratidinam dInAram ekam laBate awavIm gatvA BikzA AhAraH daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm araNya gomayAnAm viMSati sahasrANi juhuyAt yAvat vRkza devatA siMha rUpam kRtvA AgacCati sa ca nidAnam dadAti na gRhetavyam svayam evam upatizWasva iti rAjyam Danam vA anya ratnAni vA dadAti nityam ratnatraya upayojyam Bogam dAtavyam araNyam prativiSitvA daSa sahasram japet Sata sahasram japet punar api Sata sahasram japet agaru kAzWa pratimA agratas BagavataH vatsa laNxakAnAm maDu GRta aktAnAm sapta sahasrANi juhuyAt
column2: bhr'um bhr'um/

column1: kapilA kAmaDenuH AgacCati yadi na AgacCati punar api vatsa laNxam viMSati sahasrANi juhuyAt AgatA ca sidDA Bavati puruza sahasrasya kzIram dadAti pawasya agratas GRta maDu AktAnAm jAtI puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt zaz mAsAm dInAra sahasram laBate paNa sahasram vA vikasita padmAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt sa DAtuke cEtye budDa aBiprasannA devatA vara dA Bavati Arya maQjuSriyasya pUjAm kRtvA gOrasarzapANAm sapta aBimantritAnAm saFgrAme prakire SAntiH Bavati pratihAraka pakze Sukla trayodaSyAm ganDa puzpEH pUjAm kRtvA vikasitAnAm padmAnAm GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt Basmam ca gRhItvA AtmanaH lalAwe tilakam kRtvA grAmam nagaram praviSet sarve vaSAH Bavanti kRzNa caturdaSyAm praBRti yAvat paQcadaSI iti eka rAtra uzitena vRkza sya aDastAt catur hasta mAtram maNxalakam upalipya ganDa puzpa DUpam datvA Arya maQjuSriyasya pUjAm kRtvA yakzANAm balim datvA mAnuza asTim gRhItvA triSUlam kArayet vAma hastena prakzipya sapta rAtra tri rAtra uzitena vA jAtI puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tena SUlam jvalati tatas sidDaH Bavati icCayA yam nirmiNoti tam laBati divyam gRham candra sUrya grahe sa DAtuke cEtye pratimAyAm vA gRhe kapilAyAH samAna vatsAyAH go GRta palam gRhya sOvarNa BAjane sTApya BagavataH pUjAm kRtvA candram apaSyatA vEdya darSana uparicCAdya tAvat japet yAvat UzmAyati Pena Ayati jvalati UzmAyamAnam pItvA sarva sattva vaSIkaraNam PenAyamAnam pItvA antarDAnam Bavati jvalamAnam pItvA AkASena gacCati zaz mAsa kRta puraScaraNa go mUtra yAvalA hAriNA mOna vratinA nitya jApena ayAcitam suvarNa Satam laBate pratihArakapakzam AraBya saMvatsaram BagavataH AryamaQju Sriyasya agratas pUjAm kRtvA ganDa puzpa AdInAm dadatA azwAFga pozaDa samanvAgatsaMvatsare sidDaH Bavati BagavAn asya pawwabanDam karoti Arya maQjuSriyasya pUjAm kRtvA pratipadam AraBya yAvat pOrNamAsI dine dine Dika pUjA kAryA BikzavaH ca BojayitavyAH sidDaH smi iti vAc nissarati GRta AhutInAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt parasya SAntiH Bavati prAtihAraka pakze BagavataH budDasya pUjAm kRtvA udArAm Arya maQju Sriyasya ganDa puzpa dIpa DUpa AdIn datvA SaFKapuzpI puzpANAm iFguda tESata sahasram juhuyAt grAma nagara hastyaH ca raTa go mahizAH ca Bavati sapta rAtram kzIra yAvaka AhAraH pozaDikena Amalita GRtena pAtram pUrayitvA Sukla varttinA dIpam prajvAlya kumAra kumArikAnAm darSApay tatra eva alpa jQAnam sampannam paSyati sarva upadraveByaH Bayam na Bavati nitya jApinA boDi vRkza samiDAnAm nava nIktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt pawasya agratas taTA eva kuSa saMstare svapet svapne viMSati sAhasrikam dravyam paSyati arTa BAgam ratnatraya upayojyam pawasya agratas Sukla pratipadam AraBya yAvat pOrNamAsI iti atra antare dine dine zwam asahasram japet ganDa puzpa DUpa AdiBiH pUjAm kRtvA ante tri rAtra uzitena mOna vratam kurutA mantram japatA prAticArakeByaH balim haste datvA mahApaTamBUtam krUram nivedayet pratIcCa iti vaktavyaH gOrasarzapANAm droNam gRhItvA daSa diSaH DastAt ca kzipet ekaviMSati vArAn aBimantrya param AtmAnam prakASayet taTA eva kRzNa azwamyAm ganDakuwim praviSya BagavataH grataH sahasram japet ganDa puzpa AdiBiH bali viDAnam kRtvA tatas svapne paSyati BagavAn Arya maQjuSrIH vasi SAKa mAse kRzNa pakze pozaDikena kzIra yAvaka AhAraH sa DAtuke cEtye ganDa puzpa dIpa AdiBiH pUjAm kRtvA BikzavaH ca dine dine Bojayit BikzavaH akAla mUla kalaSaH catvAraH salila pUrNAH sTApayitavyAH sarva ozaDi bIjAni prakzipya rAtrO ekEkam azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA akAkolIne putra dAra dArikAm sTApayet rAjyam pakza aByantarayoH kRzNa azwamyAm BagavataH Arya maQju Sriyasya ca pUjAm kRtvA SmaSAna agnim prajvAlya SatapuzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyA anna pAnam akzayam Bavati tam eva Basmam grahAya AtmanaH parasya vA lalAwe puNxrakam kRtvA saFgAme vataret sarve vaSAH Bavanti banDanAt ca nigaxAt pramocayet agni gatAm nASayati mAlatI puzpANAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt zaz mAsam go mUtra AhAraH dInAra sahasram laBate Sukla pratipadam AraBya nIlotpalAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt yasya nAmnA juhoti sa vaSaH Bavati paQca kAlakAnAm tri sanDyam azwa sahasram yasya nAmnA juhoti sa vaSaH Bavati prAtihAraka pakze pawasya agratas kzIra yAvaka AhAraH tri sanDyam paQcadaSyAm tAvat japet yAvat BagavAn AgacCati dIpa SiKA vardDate pRTivI kampate pawam vA pracalati sidDA iti vAc niScarati dInAra sahasram laBati vizaya patiH Bavati zaz mAsa kRta puraScaraNaH sa DAtuke vEdya cEtye BagavataH AryamaQju Sriyasya agratas zaz mAsa aByantareNa dInArANAm paQca sahasrANi laBati sa DAtuke cEtye pUjAm kRtvA Sata sahasram japet rUpakasa sahasram pratilaBati sa DAtuke cEtye Sata sahasram japet sarva kAma pradaH Bavati sarva vyADizu praSamanam kartu kAmena azwa Sata sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA kanyA kartrita sUtrakam banDitavyam sOBAgyam pratilaBate vyADiH ca praSamati samudra gAminIm nadIm avatIrya kRzNa tilAnAm azwa sahasram nivedayet Dana DAnyam pratilaBate sa DAtuke cEtye Sukla pratipadam AraBya paQcadaSyAm tri rAtra uzitena udumbara kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya rAja sarzapANAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAmjuhuyAt paQca grAmANi pratilaBate
column2: dzi na dzi ka /

column1: rAjavRkza samidBiH agnim prajvAlya Sveta tilAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt paQcadaSyAm tri rAtra uzitaH yadi te tilAH diSi vidiSam gacCanti tatas sidDaH Bavati sarva sattvAH vaSIkaroti AryamaQju Sriyasya agratas pUrvam Sata sahasram japet tatas candra grahe GRtam azwa palAni datvA tAvat japet yAvat PenAyati pItvA Sruti DaraH Bavati kundurukam Sata sahasram juhuyAt ayAcitam purANam ekam laBate Arya maQju Sriyasya agratas pratidinam azwa Satam suganDa puzpANAm nivedayet
column2: manydzu shri ye /

column1: SrImAm Bavati apAmArga samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm pratidinam azwama sahasram juhuyAt grAmam laBate bahu putrikA samidBiH agnim prajvAlya vacA azwa sahasram juhuyAt tena BasmanA tilakam kuryAt antarhitaH Bavati yadi na Bavati tris api sADayet candra grahe nadI tIram gatvA bilva samidBiH agnim prajvAlya bilva puzpANAm GRta aktAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt yakza kumArI AgacCati arDarAtre punar api azwa sahasram japitvA tatas ekA AgacCati yAm vAcAm ucyate tam karoti niDi sTAne mantram azwa sahasram japet puzpa DUpa ganDa AdiBiH pUjAm kRtvA tatas kRzNa caturdaSyAm bali viDAnam kRtvA japet piSAcAH AgaCanti tatas Kanet niDAnaH uttizWati gRhItvA AtmanA trayANAm ratnAnAm dAtavyam evam pawwabanDam api karma BagavataH grataH viBItaka kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya tila taNxulAnAm pratidivasam azwa sahasram juhuyAt
column2: su shr'i ye /

column1: raNxA vaSA Bavati amAtya vaSIkaraNAH gOrasarzapAm juhuyAt vaSaH Bavati rAja vaSIkaraNe sarjarasam juhuyAt vaSaH Bavati puruza strI vaSIkaraNe evam eva juhuyAt agasti kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya dIpa vartInAm pawasya agratas dInAra Satam laBate kzIra AhAreNa palASa samiDAnAm juhuyAt pratidinam tris kAlam suvarNa Satam laBati samudra gAminIm nadIm gatvA Sata Sata sahasram juhuyAt yAvat ratnAni pratilaBate grahetavyam ratnatraya upayojyam BAgaH deyaH vESAKa pUrNam Asya aMsa kalAm rAtrim japet AnantaryAt mucyati boDi vRkza mUle BagavataH Arya maQju Sriyasya pUjAm kRtvA apAmArga samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm juhuyAt AtmAnam uddiSya sarva pApEH muktaH Bavati sapta sapta maricAni aBimantrya akAkolIne Bakzayet paQcASat Saloka SatAni gRhNAti tat ca yAvajjIvam DArayati BagavataH budDasya agratas Sata sahasram japam kRtvA pannaga banDam karoti jale vEkaFkata samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm Arya maQju Sriyasya agratas Sata sahasram juhuyAt arDarAtre paQca dInAra SatAni pratilaBate arDam ratnatraya upayojyam kumudAni dine dine zwa sahasram juhuyAt vinAyakEH muktaH vEdya  Bavati kArttika Sukla pakze kzIra yAvaka AhAraH SAka AhAraH vA pozaDikaH paQcadaSyAm tri rAtra uzitaH vEkaFkata PalAnAm GRta aktAnAm lakzam juhuyAt rUpaka sahasram pratilaBate grAma svAmI Bavati arDam ratnatraya upayogam SucO BU pradeSe gocarma mAtram maNxalam upalipya tad maDye padma AkArAm vedim kRtvA ganDa puzpa DUpa vicitra balim kRtvA vEkaFkata samiDAnlakzam juhuyAt agni AkArAH nIla varNAH arcizaH niScaranti sADakam pradakziNIkRtya punar api agnikuNxe praviSanti evam sidDaH Bavati
column2: t'a ra ya m'am/

column1: sarva sADanezu agniH AvAhitavyam evam sidDaH Bavati gaFgAyAm aMsa mAtram udakam avatIrya lakzam japet yAvat AkASa Aditya maNxalam dRSyati tatas BagavAm sidDaH Bavati yadi na paSyati na siDyati eka vArAhim gatvA ganDa puzpa DUpa bali viDAnam kRtvA sakalAm rAtrim japet yAvat uSvaSatim tatas sidDaH Bavati sarva sADanezu sA ca vaktavyA rUpaka Satam me dine dine dadAti sarvam vyayIkartaSyam anyaTA na dadAti palASa kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya araNya gomayAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt go Satam laBati mAtulaFga PalAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt palASa agnO yAvat gaNapatiH AgacCati sa vaktavyaH  mama dine dine dInAram ekam dehi dadAti sarvaH vyayIkartavyaH BagavataH pAdO spRSa iti vaktavyaH tatas sidDaH Bavati aTavA na dadAdi bilva PalAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm sa DAtuke cEtye pawasya agratas eka rAtra uzitaH vEkaFkata samiDA agnim prajvAlya azwasajuhuyAt anena karmaNA SrImAm Bavati vizaya aDipatiH Bavati kiFkirAwa puzpANi dine dine azwa sahasram juhuyAt dinAni sapta azwO paNam pratilaBate SAntikam kartu kAmaH lAja AhutInAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt SAntiH Bavati puzwim icCatA kzIravRkza samiDAnAm agnim prajvAlya tri sanDyam tila taNxulAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt divasAni trINi puzwiH Bavati Amra kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya dUrvA aFkurANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt vivAde uttara vAdI Bavati astamite vrIhituzANAm nAma gRhItvA vAma hastena juhuyAt sapta rAtram vaSaH Bavati rAja samidBiH agnim prajvAlya tila taNxulAnAm azwa sahasram tri sanDyam juhuyAt divasAni trINi arTam dadAti gaFgAyAH musala Sabda rahite SucO pradeSe uBaya kUla mRttikAm gRhya sa caturasrAm sapta hastAm vedikAm kRtvA maDye sahasra patram padmam kRtvA tasya upari sugata vitasti pramANam paQcalohitakam cakram pratizWApya maNxala maDye pawasya agratas sADayitavya ganDa puzpEH Sveta candanEH arcayitvA mandAraka rakta puzpa mAlAm datvA tatas ganDa AdiBiH pUjAm kRtvA GRta pradIpa mAlA sapta deyA caturdiSam catvAraH GRta kumBAH prajvAlayitavyAH caturdiSam catvAraH kalaSAH sarva bIja pUrNakAH ratnAni ca prakzipya sTApayitavyA kundurua ga ru SrI pizwaka guggulu DUpaH deyaH bali viDAnam kRtvA caturdiSam pUrva uktena daDi BaktaH pUpakam deyam dakziNa BUta krUram udaka miSram deyam paScimAyAm diSi kuraFguxa kzIra pUrNakam deyam uttarAyAm diSi pAyasa pUrNakam balim upaharet tatas palASa samidBiH agnim prajvAlya apAmArga samiDAnAm sapta aBimantritAnAm GRtAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt nAmam grahAya vaSaH Bavati rAjavRkza samidBiH ignim prajvAlya lavaNa mayIm pratikRtim kRtvA SirAt AraByaH ekEkAm Ahutim sapta aBimantritAm yAvat caraNO= iti nAmam gjuhuyAt rAjA vEdya  vaSaH Bavati Sukla paQcadaSyAm azwamyAm vA pozaDikaH horAtra uzitaH patita gomayam gRhya gocarma mAtra sTaNxilam upalipya sa DAtuke cEtye Arya maQju Sriyasya rajata maye vA BAjane kapilAyAH goH samAna vatsAyAH kumArI maTitam navanItam gRhya kuSaviNxaka upavizwaH vAma hastena BAjanam gRhyam dakziNa hastena anAmikAyAm aFguhyA Aloxayam tAvat japet yAvat UzmAyati tat pAtavyam meDAvI Bavati sakRt uktam gRhNAti

column1: aTa DUmAyati vaSIkaraNam aTa jvalati antarDAnam Bavati bahuputrikAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tena BasmanA udaka kumBAn= cAtvAraH sa miSrIkRtvA kArayitavyA azwa Sata aBimantritAm vAcAm dakziNa haste baDvA yAvat sarvatra uttaravAdI Bavati aparAjita puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt saFgrAme parAjitaH Bavati kumArIkartita sUtreNa sapta aBimantritena granTayaH kartavyAH banDitavyAH sTAvara jaFgamAH vizAH na atra praBavanti dAruNena sarpeNa dazwasya nAmam grahAya sapta aBimantritam udaka cUrNakam pAnAya deyam mRtaH pyuttizWati taTA eva catur diSA aBimantritam kRtvA pAnAya deyam takzakena api dazwaH jIvati stana gaNxikAyAm sapta aBimantri tayA mRttikayA lepayet mucyati vedanA na Bavati mArI upadrave nagara maDye vE arDarAtrO sTaNxilakam upalipya Suklam balim kRtvA kzIravRkza samidBiH agnim prajvAlya kzIra Ahuti sahasra mArI upaSamayati aTanA upaSamayati tatas nyatamasmin divase maDyAhna velAyAm SlezmAtaka samidBiH agnim prajvAlya sidDArTAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt

column1: sadyas mArim praSamayati anena viDinA kRtena vizama banDaH yAvantaH sattvAH te tasya vaSAH Bavanti kUzmANxa vaSIkaraNe kUzmANxa samiDAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt mArim upaSamayati preta vaSIkaraNe tila pizwakAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt pretAH vaSyAH Bavanti piSAca vaSIkaraNe SmaSAna celakAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt piSAcAH vaSAH Bavanti yakza vaSIkaraNe vawa vRkza samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt yakzAH vaSAH Bavanti apasmArojehAra vaSIkaraNe UrNA AhutInAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt vaSAH Bavanti GRta aktAnAm guggulu gulikAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt mahAdeva anucarAH grahAH vaSAH Bavanti vIra kraya krItAm manaHSilAm gRhItvA arAjavRkza samidBiH agnim prajvAlyam tAvat japet yAvat agni varNA Bavati tatas samAna vatsAyAH goH kapilAyAH kanyA maTitena navanItena kRtvA tasmim GRte nirvApayet evam daDi pUrNa BAjane maDu pUrNe ca tatas anena eva rakzAm kRtvA samudgake sTApya candra grahe tri rAtra uzitena sa DAtuke cEtye AryamaQju Sriyasya agratas pUjAm kRtvA uttarAmuKena aSvatTa patra catuzwaye sTApya tAvat japet yAvat UzmAyati DUmAyati prajvalati vaSIkaraNa antarDAnam AkASa gamanam iti evam aQjana haritAla rocanAm ca iti rocanayA ayam viSezaH  Sukla paQcadaSyAm padma patre sTApya Arya maQju Sriyasya agratas kara sampuwena gRhItvA tAvat japet yAvat triviD ete ca karmA mUla pawasya agratas kartavyAni sapta rAtram paQcalohena padmam kRtvA kuFkuma rocana karpUram udake pizwvA padmam mrakzayitvA tatas Sukla azwamyAm upozaDikena triHkAla snAyinA Suci vastra prAvRtena sa DAtuke cEtye Arya maQju Sriyasya agratas dakziNena hastena gRhItena tAvat japet yAvat prajvalati tatas tena gRhItena vidyADaraH Bavati daSa varza sahasrANi jIvati vEdya  evam kawaka makuwa SRFKalA ca iti evam SEla raktacandanam guggulam nandyAvarta mUlam girikarNikA tuzam vrIhi kuzWa tagaram maDu pippalI turuzkam ca ekatas kRtvA sama BAg tatas kapilAyAH samAna vatsAyAH goH kzIram gRhya kanyA maTitena navanItena modayitvA gulikAm kArayet akza tElena dIpaH dAtavyaH tatas upozaDikena Sukla caturdaSyAm ahorAtropitaH aSvatTa patra antaritA gulikAm kRtvA AryamaQju Sriyasya agratas tAvat japet yAvat DUmAya saKAyAnAm datvA AtmanA muKe prakzipet

column1: antarhitaH Bavati aTa jvalati AkASa gAmI Bavati aparaH viDiH sa DAtuke cEtye pawasya agratas pozaDikena udArAm pUjAm kRtvA arka samidBiH agnim prajvAlya daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm Kadira samiDAnAm azwa sahajuhuyAt Sukla caturdaSyAm AraBya yAvat paQcadaSIBi sidDAH eva sidDaH Bavati evam pozaDikena lakzam japtavyam paratas karmANi Bavanti anayA pUrva sevayA sidDaH Bavati aTa rAjAnam rAjamAtram vA vaSIkartu kAmaH BagavataH pUjAm kRtvA rAjavRkza samiDAnAm iFguda tElA aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt caturdaSIm AraBya yAvat paQcadaSI iti anena karmaNA duHSIlasya api sidDiH Bavati catur varNam vaSIkartu kAmaH pAyasam havizya annam AnIya peyakrasarA ca iti juhuyAt vaSyAH Bavanti rAtrO SuciH azwaSatam japet
column2: aa mri tong bha ba /

column1: sarvAbanDanAt mocayati kroDam upaSamanam piNxaka tuza homena vA kanyA vaSIkaraNe tilAm juhuyAt vastra kAmena karppaNa juhuyAt azwa sahasram sapta rAtram vacAm azwa sahasra aBimantritAm kRtvA haste baDvA yam yAcayati tam laBate nitya jApena pratyaFgirAH padma sUtra AdinA azwa sahasra aBimantritena yasya haste baDnAti tasya rakzA kRtA Bavati Danam icCam guggulu gulikAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram kulapati kAmaH ganDAm juhuyAt saptarAtam DRta aktAm grAmam laBati puzpam azwa Sata aBimantritam yasya dadAti sa vaSaH Bavati kuFkuma tagara tAlIsa patram sa mRNAla Sata puzpa SrIvezwa samAyuktam viDinA aBimantritam rAjadvAre vaH traya mAlaBam strI puruza prayukta vaSIkaraNam yudDa vijaya karaNam Dvajam azwa sahasra vArAm parijapya ganDa puzpa DUpam ca aBimantrayitvA sapta daDi kuNxezu arDyam visajayet para sEnyam darSanAt eva ca naSyati kRzNa tilAm pawasya agratas azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA yasya nAmam grahAya Bakzayati sa vaSaH Bavati azwa sahasra japtA sarva bIjAni sarva ozaDyaH sarva ganDAni ca suraBi puzpANi padmam vA sarvANi akAla mUla kalaSe prakzipya boDi vRkze azwa sahasram japet svayam vA snApayet anyam vA snApayet sarva upadraveByaH muktaH Bavati padmam vA padma patram vA nirDUmezu aFgArezu yasya nAmnA juhoti sa vaSyaH Bavati bilva patram maDu saMyuktam azwa sahasram juhuyAt rAja patnI vA rAja mahizI vA vaSIkaroti sarva sattva vaSIkaraNe priyaFgum juhuyAt yasya nAmam grahAya rakta SAlayaH juhoti sa vaSaH Bavati kumArI vaSIkaraNe kesara puzpAm juhuyAt pawasya agratas kzIra pAyasam azwa sahasrAm juhuyAt yasya nAmnA sa vaSaH Bavati sa DAtuke cEtye pUrva aBimuKam pawam pratizWApya Sukla pratipadam AraBya vediH pUrva uttara agrEH darBEH vistArya bilva samiDABiH agnim prajvAlya vikasitAnAm padmAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm tri sanDyam azwa sahasram juhuyAt agaru turuzka kunduruka SrI pizwakena ca DUpaH deyaH kzIra daDi Baktam balim dadyAt viGnAnAm sarva BOtikam balim deyA
column2: p'a pam me n'a sha ya sv'ah'a /

column1: tatas zwamyAm vEdya praBRti vikasitAnAm Sveta padmAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm tri sanDyam azwa sahasram juhuyAt mahA niDAnam vizayam vA laBate daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm pIta puzpANAm dine dine zwa sahasram juhuyAt deSam laBati tri rAtra uzitaH saktavAhAreNa vA homaH kartavyaH evam saptatiH Sata sahasrEH Anantarya kAriNasya api sidDyati tat eva samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm lakzam juhuyAt suvarNa kowim laBate prAtar utTAya prayataH snAtaH brahmacArI agnim prajvAlya nAgakesara priyaFgu rAjAnam rAjamAtram vA vaSIkartu kAmaH zwa sahasram juhuyAt trisanDyam tri mAsa aByantareNa viSizwa Palam prApnoti dravyam praBUtam ca go vatsa laNxAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt go Satam laBate priyaFgu nAga kesara sa miDAnAm yasya nAmnA juhoti sa vaSyaH Bavati Kadira samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm pawasya agratas zwa sahasram tri sanDyam juhuyAt mahA niDAnam laBati tat dIyamAnam akzayam Bavati samudra gAminIm nadIm avatIrya padmAnAm raktacandana aktAnAm Sata sahasram pravAhayet padmarASi tulyam niDAnam paSyati pawasya agratas bilva AhutInAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt trisanDyam BogAn utpAdayati tila taNxulAn ekIkRtya pawasya agratas zwa sahasram tri sanDyam juhuyAt sapta rAtram akzayam annam utpadyate nAgAnAm nAgapuzpANi juhuyAt vaSAH Bavanti yakzANAm pawasya agratas guggulu gulikAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tri sanDyam sapta rAtram aSoka samidBiH yakziNI vaSA Bavati SrIvAsakam pawasya agratas juhuyAt kinnarAH vaSAH Bavanti devAnAm vaSIkartu kAmaH mUla pawasya agratas garu samiDAnAm GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tri sanDyam ekaviMSati rAtram vaSAH Bavanti pawasya agratas kundurukam juhuyAt pretAH vaSAH Bavanti sarjarasam juhuyAt vinAyakAH vaSAH Bavanti piNyAka homena sarvAm vaSIkaroti rAjAnam rAjamAtram vA vaSIkartu kAmaH pawasya agratas rAja sarzapAm tEla aktAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram vaSAH Bavanti yat ucyanti tat karoti rAja kanyA vaSya arTe pawasya agratas rAjikAm juhuyAt purohitam vaSIkartu kAmaH pawasya agrata GRtam juhuyAt kzatriyam bAhutiBiH vESya vaSIkaraNe kziram juhuyAt SUdra vaSIkaraNe kRsarAm juhuyAt sarva striyaH vaSIkaraNe lavaNa homena raNxA mAza homena sarva sattvAm tila tEla akte vaSIkaroti sarvezAm azwa sahasrikaH homaH sapta rAtram SuciH BUtvA catur Bakta uzitaH bilva samiDABiH agnim prajvAlya bilvAnAm juhuyAt Sata sahasram niDAnam paSyati viMSati rAtram kzIra yAvaka AhAreNa Sveta sarzapANAm lakzam juhuyAt arTam laBate kRta puraScaraNaH gOrasarzapANAm GRta aktAnAm pawasya agratas rAtrO divasam juhuyAt mAsena va su vRzwiH yatra icCati catur Bakta uzitaH daSa sahasrANi etat eva juhuyAt arTam laBate sa DAtuke cEtye pawam pratizWApya palASa kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya utpalAnAm lakzam juhuyAt grAmam laBati pawasya agratas ganDa puzpa DUpam vA kzIra yAvaka AhAraH padmam juhuyAt suvarNa sahasram pratilaBate kumudAnAm pawasya agratas lakzam juhuyAt yam manasA cintayati tam laBate pawasya agratas bilvAnAm sahasram juhuyAt niDAnam paSyati pawasya agratas daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm padmAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt kzIra yAvaka AhAraH suvarNa sahasram pratilaBe tri rAtra uzitaH garu samiDAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tatas sarvarAtrikaH jApaH vEdya  deyaH pawaH prakampate sragdAma calanam vA tatas sidDaH Bavati yam manasA cintayati tam dadAti mahApuruza vaSIkaraNe pawasya agratas jAtI puzpANi juhuyAt vizama arTam karavIra puzpANAm juhuyAt karNikAra puzpANAm juhuyAt dInAra Satam laBate senApati kAmaH kunda puzpANi juhuyAt sEnApatyam laBate tArAvartta puzpam juhuyAt dInAra sahasram laBate mucilinda lakzam juhuyAt suvarNa sahasram laBati Sveta karavIra puzpa homena tripawwe badDaH Bavati vizayam api laBate pawasya agratas ADArakaH gnim upasamADAya pratidinam vardDamAnA pUjA kAryA ganDa tEla aktAnAm kanakasya tuwi mAtram sahasram juhuyAt

column1: yAvat BagavAm vara daH tatas vidyADara cakravartI Bavati yam prArTayati rajata cUrNam juhuyAt rAjyam dadAti Ayasam cUrNam juhuyAt dInAra sahasram laBati kuFkuma Ahutim ganDa tEla aktAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt yAvataH prArTayati tam laBati sarva ganDa AhutInAm lakzam juhuyAt yaTA aBipretam vizayam laBati karpUra AhutInAm lakzam juhuyAt dInAra lakzam laBati candana samiDAnAm ganDa tEla aktAnAm lakzam juhuyAt dInAra sahasram laBati suvarNa celA huti lakzam juhuyAt dInAra sahasram laBati agaru samiDAnAm lakzam juhuyAt Sruti DaraH Bavati DAsaka samiDAnAm ganDa tEla aktAnAm lakzam juhuyAt

column1: mahA vyADi upaSamaH Bavati nimba PalAnAm ganDa tEla aktAnAm lakzam juhuyAt sarva banDanAt mocayati samAna vatsAyAH goH GRtam gRhya lakza aBimantritam pibet meDAvI Bavati arka puzpANAm lakzam juhuyAt sarva sattva vallaBaH Bavati puzpa Palam sapta aBimantritam kRtvA yasya dIyate sa vaSaH Bavati pozaDikaH Sukla paQcadaSyAm sa DAtuke cEtye patita gomayena maNxalakam upalipya ganDa puzpa GRta pradIpABiH pUjAm kRtvA udumbara kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya brahmI samiDAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt havizya AhAraH meDAvI Bavati brAhmaNa vaSIkaraNe kzIram juhuyAt sa vaSaH Bavati kzatriyasya havizyam juhuyAt vaSaH Bavati vESya vaSIkaraNe yavat aDimiSram havizyam ca ekIkRtya juhuyAt vaSaH Bavati Satrum dRzwvA japet stamBitaH Bavati udakena sapta aBimantritena sarva ASA pUrayati
