column1: sarva rogezu umArjanam loGragulikAyAH sapta aBimantritayA akzINI aQjayet akzi rogam apanayati glAnasya sUtrakam sapta aBimantritam banDitavyam sarva grahAH na praBavanti BasmanA sapta japtena maNxala banDaH SiKA banDena Atma rakzA Bavati sapta japtena lozwakena diSAbanDaH duHprasavAyA tElam parijapya dAtavyam suKam prasavati mUXagarBayA Rtu kAla samaye krAnta snAtAyAH go kzIram azwa Sata aBimantritam kRtvA

column1: sarva budDa boDisattvAnAm praNAmam kArayitvA pAnAya deyam paramAnnam ca GRta miSram BojayitavyaH tatas putram prasavati prAsAdikam Sukla pratipadam AraBya pUrva aBimuKam pawam pratizWApyaH pratidinam guggulu guxikAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt trisanDyam yam icCati tam dadAti kRta puraScaraNaH sa DAtuke cEtye pawam pratizWApya ganDa puzpa DUpa balim datvA pawasya agratas garu samiDAnAm aFguzWa parva mAtrANAm turuzka tEla aktAnAm juhuyAt sapta rAtram trisanDyam rAjyam dadAti vidyADaram antarDAnam vA pAda pracArikam vA Sruti Dara tvam dadAti aTa gulikAm sADayitu kAmena karNikAra kesaram nAgakesaram Svetacandanam gaja madam cekIkRtya CAyASuzkAm guxikAm kRtvA Suci vastrAyAH kanyAyAH pIzayet puzya nakzatre vEdya  karaNIyam SuciH BUtvA sapta guwikAm triloha vezwitAm kRzNa agaru samudgake prakzipya pawasya agratas japet yAvat Kawa KawAyati tAm gRhya BagavataH ekam datvA muKe prakzipya antarhitaH Bavati pawasya agratas lakzAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt niDAnam laBati kadamba puzpANAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sarva sattvAH vaSAH samudra gAminIm nadIm avatIrya upavasita kesara puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt daSa vastra yugAni laBati pawasya agratas jAtI puzpANAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm tri sanDyam azwa sahasram juhuyAt divasAni sapta sarva sattvAnAm priyaH Bavati vizayam dadAti laBati kumuda puzpANAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt divasAni sapta paQca vizayANi laBante rAja vaSIkaraNe rAja sarzapAm juhuyAt sapta rAtram brAhmaNa vaSIkaraNe karaNwaka puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram vESya vaSIkaraNe sOganDika puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram SUdra vaSIkaraNe zwa sahasreNa agnO juhuyAt sapta rAtram raNxA vEkaFkata samiDAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram sa DAtuke cEtye rocanAm azwa sahasra aBimantritAm kRtvA rAja kule gacCet sarve vaSAH Bavanti dUrvA aFkurANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt SAntiH Bavati parasya AtmanaH SAntim karttu kAmena tri sanDyam kzIram juhuyAt SAntiH Bavati mahAdevasya dakziNAm mUrttim tAmra BAjane GRtam sTApya sahasram japet sarva BUtikam balim nivedyA ca GRtam calati tatas sidDaH Bavati lalAwe tilakam kRtvA

column1: meDAvIkaraNe BagavataH ca amita ABasya Arya maQju Sriyasya ca pUjAm kRtvA rajate vA tAmre vA GRtam sTApya tAvat japet yAvat triviDA sidDiH tam pItvA meDAvI Bavati DUmAyamAne ntarDAnam jvalitena AkASa gamanam manaHSilAm sADayitu kAmena kzIra yAvaka AhAraH lakzam japet

column1: mahAdevasya agratas tri rAtra uzitaH saptaBiH aSvatTa patrEH pratizWApya triBiH AcCAdya sarva BUtikAm balim nivedyam ayantritaH AtmanaH saKAyAnAm ca rakzAm kRtvA tAvat japet yAvat triviDA sidDiH jvalitena daSa varza sahasrANi jIvati ayaH mayam cakram kRtvA triSUlam vA udArAm pUjAm kRtvA dakziNa hastena gRhItvA pawasya agratas paryaFka upavizwaH tAvat japet yAvat ciwaciwAyati jvalati tam gRhItvA vidyADaraH Bavati sarva deva manuzyAH vaSAH Bavanti aFguli sADanam kartu kAmaH nadyAH uBaya kUla mRttikAm gRhya tayA aFgulim kArayet tam aFgulim pawasya agratas sTApayitvA tAvat Akarzayet yAvat AgacCa iti sidDA Bavati tayA yam AkArzayati saH AgacCati rocanAm sADayitu kAmaH kRta puraScaraNaH pawasya agratas pratizWApya ganDa puzpa DUpam datvA tAvat japet yAvat jvalitam iti tayA ca sidDayA paQca varza sahasrANi jIvati padmam sADayitu kAmena raktacandana mayam padmam kRtvA pawam sa DAtuke cEtye pratizWApya tasya agratas gRhItvA kRta puraScaraNaH tAvat japet yAvat jvalati iti gRhItvA sarva vidyADara cakravartI Bavati kElAsa anucarAH devAH vaSAH Bavanti sarva vidyADarANAm aDRzyaH udakena viza cikitsA jvara AdeSanam svasTa AveSinam sakRt japtena Atma rakzA sUtrakena udakena japtena saKAya rakzA tri japtena diSAbanDaH catur japtena maNxala banDaH kRzNa azwamyAm ahorAtra uzitena kapilAyAH goH samAna vatsAyAH apatita gomayena AryamaQju Sriyam kRtvA pUrva aBimuKam sTApya mahatIm pUjAm kRtvA tasya agratas lakzam vEdya  japet tatas BagavAm SiraH kampayati anyam vA sidDi nimittam darSayati tatas sidDaH Bavati yam cintayati tam sarvam karoti BagavAm vara daH Bavati sarva icCAm sampAdayati svapne ca SuBa aSuBam kaTayati yaTezwam prayuQjIta pUrvAhNe sahasra japtena muzwam annam utpadyate pozaDikaH kzIra yAvaka AhAraH parvata SiKaram Aruhya Sata sahasram japet darSanam Bavati IpsAm sampAdayati pawasya agratas sapta rAtram kundurukam azwa sahasram juhuyAt kRta puraScaraNaH eka pradeSe rAjA Bavati trisanDyam kaNAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sarva rAtram dInAra Satam laBati Awaruzaka kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya Awaruzaka puzpANAm GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt suvarNam laBati kRzNa caturdaSyAm ahorAtra uzitena GRta aktAnAm rAjikAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt rUpaka sahasram laBati aTavA grAmam Bavati pawasya agratas SlezmAtaka kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya tri rAtram dUrva pravAlAnAm lakzam juhuyAt go sahasram laBati surasI patrANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt divyam gRham laBati manasA lakza japtena purANa sahasram laBati SrI pizwaka sahasram juhUyAt sapta rAtram trisanDyam dInAra sahasram laBati yaTA aBipretam sarvam sampAdayati SrImAn= ca Bavati suBagaH ca Bavati nadyAyAm rakta puzpANi homayet raktAni vastrANi laBate Sukla azwamyAm Sukla paQcadaSyAm vA vivikta BU pradaSe Sveta arkasya aDastAt Arya maQju Sriyasya ganDa puzpa DUpam ca datvA mAlyam ca azwa sahasram japet paScAt aFguzWa parva mAtram Arya maQju Sriyam kArayet Sukla azwamyAm vivikte pradeSe valmIke Sukla ganDa bali mAlya DUpa nivedyam azwa sahasram japet tatas valmIka mRttikAm gRhya ganDa udakena mardayet tasyAH mRttikayA pUrva kRtam pratimA mudram arka kzIreNa pratimudrAm kRtvA tatas Sukla pratipadam AraBya yAvat azwamI iti tris kAlam BagavataH pUjAm kRtvA balim dadyAt tatas jAtI puzpANAm azwa sahasreNa hantavyaH pozaDikena kzIra yAvaka AhAreNa darBa saMstara SAyinA sADayitavyam dInAra sahasram laBati satata jApena yAtrA sidDim avApnoti yadi divasAni sapta azwa sahasram japet grAmam laBate SrImAm Bavati arTam utpAdayitu kAmena gozwam gatvA kRzNa azwamyAm pareByaH kzIra yAvaka AhAraH lakzam japet aparasmim kRzNa caturdaSyAm te tatas horAtra uzitena tatra eva Sata sahasram japtavyam dInArANAm azwa SatAni laBati yam icCati suvarNam vA grAmam vA laBati kRzNa caturdaSyAm ahorAtra uzitaH pawasya agratas boDi vRkza kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya vacAm azwa sahasram japet dInAra Satam laBati kRzNa azwamyAm palASa kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm guggulu guxikAnAm pawasya agratas Sata sahasram juhuyAt dInAra Satam laBate SatapuzpANAm lakzam juhuyAt dInAra Satam laBati bilva samiDAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt yam icCati tam sampAdayati gaFgA nadI tIre samudra puline vA anupahate mAnuza varjite vAlukAyAm sugata vitasti pramANam stUpam kRtvA yaTA viBavataH ganDa puzpa DUpam datvA azwa sahasra aBimantritam kuryAt evam dine dine ganDa AdIn dattvA yAvat azwa uttaram stu upa sahasram pUrNam iti pawwabanDam avApnoti tilAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt yasya icCati sa vaSaH Bavati sa DAtuke cEtye pUjAm kRtvA azwa sahasram japet SuBa aSuBam kaTayati ApyAyanam karttu kAmaH BagavataH grataH kzIravRkza samiDAnAm GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tatas sA vidyA ApyAyitA Bavati saptame vEdya sADane prayoktavyaH yatra brahmarAkzasaH nyaH vA sattvaH kRta puraScaraNaH tatra gatvA daSa sahasrANi japet mahA niDAnam prayacCati kzIra yAvaka AhAraH sa DAtuke cEtye saMvatsaram japet tatra eva pawam pratizWApya kRzNa azwamyAm tri rAtra uzitaH udArAm pUjAm kRtvA balim nivedyam pawasya agratas agnim prajvAlya vawa vRkza samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt kubera AdyAH yakzAH AgacCanti na Betavyam ca sTApya tasya upari supiNxam paryaFkam baDvA hastena avazwaBya tAvat japet tAvat jvalitam iti

column1: atra antare sarva naraka tiryagyonikAnAm duHKam vyupaSamayati vidyADara nikAyAH ca sannipatanti tatas sarva budDa boDisattvAnAm namaskAram kRtvA gRhItavyam vidyA DEraranugamyamAnaH vidyA purIm gacCati vidyADara rAjA Bavati sarva vidyADarA pUjayanti mahAkalpa sTAyI Bavati anena viDinA cakra Kaxga mudgara AdayaH praharaNa viSezAH sADyAH sA ced vidyA sADyamAnA na sidDyati tAm anena mantreNa sametam BagavataH budDasya agratas pawasya ca pUjAm kRtvA azwa sahasram japet tatra kuSa saMstare svaptavyam Una atiriktam yam vA mRgayati tatra sTAne yakza yakziNI sahitA pUrva sevaH tatra maNxalakam upalipya gOrasarzapANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt AgacCati yaTezwam vaktavyA aDyezyatAm prayacCati tAm Bakzya kalpAyuH Bavati aTa na AgacCati sapta rAtram kuryAt AgacCati aTa SAntim kartu kAmaH BagavataH grataH kzIra AhutyA azwa sahasram ganDa udakena vA aByukzayet SAntiH Bavati pallavena mayUra candrakena vA sarpa dazwam umArjayet nirvizaH Bavati valmIka SiKaram Aruhya nirAhAraH ekapAda pUrvAhnAt yAvat aparAhNam japet niyada vedanIyam kzIyate tatra sTAne yatra tizWati tatra pUrva sevaH tatra gatvA maNxalakam upalipya gOrasarzapANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt yakzAH AgacCanti pUrva sTApitena ganDa udakena kalaSena arGyaH deyaH yakzaH bruvanti kim karttavyam AhUtAH sma vaktavyam yakzAH vE AjQA AkArAH Bavantu taTA astu iti uktvA antarDIyante yakzAH sidDAH Bavanti yam mRgayati tam dadAti divyAH rasa rasAyanAni ozaDa viDAnAni prayacCanti tatas sahasra parivRtasya api zaz ra samAhAram prayacCati yat mRgayati tat sarvam prayacCati evam vaSIkaraNe kRzNayoH ekatareNa tri rAtra uzitaH kRta rakzaH su yantritaH pawasya agratas nirDUma aFgArEH guggulu gulikAnAm azwa sahasram j GRta aktAnAm

column1: arDarAtrO devatA AgacCati vaktavyA ozaDIm prayacCanti yam vA mRgayati vastra arTIm dUrva kANxAnAm GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt vastrANi laBati vacAm azwa sahasra aBimantrite kRtvA muKe prakzipya sarva vyavahArezuttara vAdI Bavati suganDa tElam parijapya muKam mrakzayet rAja kulezu uttara vAdI Bavati aQjanam azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA akzINi aQjayet vyavahAraH uttaravAdI Bavati candra sUrya grahe vA SrotAQjane muKe prakzipya tAvat japet yAvat muktaH iti pozayitvA rakzAm kRtvA aQjanam azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA akzINi aQjayet adRSyaH Bavati sarva ganDAnAm pawasya agratas lakzam juhuyAt Sriyam paSyati yam varam mRgayati tam laBati mOnI BikzA AhAraH lakzam japet antarhitaH Bavati pawasya agratas maNxalakam upalipya puzpa avakIrNam kRtvA udaka cUlakAH sapta aBimantritAH pAtavyAH divasAni sapta meDAvI Bavati pUrva aDItam ca na naSyati brahmI rasa karzam kzIra karzam azwa Satam vEdya parijapya pAtavyam dinedine meGAH vardDate yAvat ekaviMSati rAtram paQca SatAni DArayati gRhNAti rakzA udakena sapta japtena Sirasi dAtavyam maNxala banDaH Kadira kIlakEH ekaviMSati japtEH guggulu DUpena AveSayati viza= CurikayA cikitsA pallavena vA graha nASanam sapta japtena SvetapuzpeNa guggulu DUpena vA graha gRhItAnAm snApayata sUtrakam banDitavyam Sveta sarpazAm tila miSrAm GRta aktAm juhuyAt vagdaH Bavati rAtrO homaH sa DAtuke cEtye pUrNamAsyAm sa gOraveNa maNxalakam upalipya azwO pUrNa kalaSAH azwO ca puzpam AlA garu turuzka candana kunduruDUpam duhatA tatas SarIra sidDim prayacCati sa DAtuke cEtye kzIra yAvaka AhAraH yaTAvi BavataH pUjAm kRtvA Sata sahasram japet jamBana mohana Adizu karmasu samarTaH Bavati saktu BakzaH nadyAm aMsa mAtram udakavatIrya lakzam japet vaSIkaraNam antarDAnaH SilA Adizu prayogezu su samarTaH Bavati nAga sTAne karpAsa asTim juhuyAt nAgAH vaSyAH Bavanti ye mRgayati tam laBate dakziNa hastAt aFgulim azwa aBimantritam kRtvA gajAnam tarjayet vaSyaH Bavati anena eva viDinA gaja vyAGra mahiza AdIstamBayati tila homena nara nArI va SIkaraNam viSita vikrayena rakzA Atma rakzA para rakzA sapta aBimantritena SiKA banDaH

column1: yudDe rAja kule vivAda japamAnasya vijayaH Bavati AtmanA aBizekam karttu kAmaH catvAraH kalaSAH akAla nadI palvala prasravaNa udake vA sarva ganDavIjAni prakzipya azwa sahasra aBimantritAni tena udakena AtmAnam aBiziQcet sarva viGna vinAyaka alakzmI vinirmuktaH Bavati piSAca jvare ganDa udakena azwaSata aBimantritena aByukzayet svasTaH Bavati vetAxam pUrva aBimuKa Kadira kIlakEH vAlA SallakEH su mantritam kRtvA su prayatnataH catur dikzu diSAsu Kaxga hastAn puruzAnsTApya vetAxasya hRdaye upaviSya Ayasena sruveNa loha cUrNam juhuyAt tasyAH muKAt jihvA niHsarati tAm tIkzNena SastreNa cCidya nIlotpala sannikASam Kaxgam Bavati tena gRhItena sa parivAraH utpatati vidyADara rAjA Bavati ekAdaSa varza kowIm jIvati kAlam gataH ca devezu upapadyate puzpa loha mayIm muNxim lakzaNa upetAm kRtvA pawasya agratas kRta puraScaraNaH sapta rAtra aDivAsitAm kRtvA sahasra sampAta Ahutim BagavataH grataH kRzNa caturdaSyAm tri rAtra uzitaH udArAm pUjAm kRtvA bali viDAnam rakzA maNxala banDa sImA banDa Adikam kRtvA Arya saFGam yaTASaktitaH BojayitvA pAdayoH praNipatya Arya saFGam anujQApya mriyate pawasya agratas sidDArTaka puQjakam sTApya puQjasya upari japya dAtavyam sarva graha AveSanam guggulu DUpena sarva akAla mRtyu praSamanam sarva vAta meGa stamBanam jApena sarzapAn kzipitvA sa avazwamBena AkASe kzipitavyam sarva meGa stamBanam Kadira kIlakam sapta japtam dAtavyam nirvizaH Bavati sarva kali kalaha vigraha vivAdezu paQjaraFgikam sUtram azwa Sata aBimantritam kRtvA guhya sTAne DArayitavyam sarva kali kalaha vigraha vivAdAH stamBitAH Bavanti sarva vizayam mantrezu pAnIya sapta japtam dAtavyam nirvizaH Bavati arTa kAmaH SucinA Suci vastra prAvRtena ahar rAtra uzitaH pawasya agratas kunduruka DUpaH deyaH svapne kaTayati SuBam vA aSuBam vA sapta sahasrANi rUpakam laBati sarva mudrA Beda BasmanA Boga arTI nadI saFgame taxAgAnAm ekatame nyatra vA Suci pradeSe pawam vEdya pratizWApya jApa homam samAraBet padmAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm lakzam juhuyAt dvi lakzam vA tatas sarva kAmam avApnoti lakzatraya homena rAjyam dadAti ekaviMSati homena mahADana patiH Bavati guggulu guxikAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt ekaviMSati rAtram puzwiH Bavati dInAra sahasram laBate kuxye prakzeptavyaH

column1: sarva SatravaH stamBitAH Bavanti gomaya maNxalakam kRtvA sUtrakam gRhya maNxala maDye sTApya guggulu DUpam datvA mantram japet yadi jIvati sUtrakam nartati na jIvati na nartati gomayena maNxalakam upalipya catur hasta pramANam puzpa DUpam dattvA tasmin= eva sTitaH japet SutrUNAm stamBanam Sastram sapta vAra parijapya DaraNyAH sTAne niKanitavyam sarva kArKowAH CinnAH Bavanti para cakra daNxam sapta vArAm parijapya nikzeptavyam avaDyaH Bavati apasmAra nASanam apAmArga samidBiH agnim prajvAlya kRzNa tilAm Sveta karavIra miSrAm juhuyAt apasmAra grahAH naSyati sarva jvarezu kRzNa sUtrakam banDitavyam sarva graha xAkinIzu nIlasUtrakam banDitavyam utpAta ganDa piwaka lUta loha lipta= Cedanam gOramRtikA ASyA Bavati sarva sattvAnAm candra sUrya uparAge upavAsam kRtvA tElam japet tena tElena muKam mrakzayet ari kulam praviSet

column1: mEtra cittam utpadyate anena eva viDAnena pratisara azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA haste baDvA saFgrAme vataret aparAjitaH Bavati kAlyam utTAya sa DAtuke cEtye gomaya maNxalakam kRtvA udaka culuka dvayam ekEkam sapta vArAm parijapya mititavyam anAlapataH pibitavyam prAtar velA kAle tatas Bojane praTamam AlApam trayaH vArAm parijapya Boktavyam vikAle zwa Satam japya svaptavyam sarva karmANi viSuDyati vAkya pariSudDiH Bavati dine dine Sloka Satam gRhNAti evam divasAni sapta udakam sapta vArAm parijapya tatas Fguli sidDA Bavati tatas FgulyAm Akarzati yam spRSati sa vaSyaH Bavati mRttikAm parijapya banDaH deyaH CinditA Bavati badDaH  udara SUle hastam sapta vArAm parijapya pramArjayet svasTaH Bavati trayaH vArAm cIvarakarNakam parijapya cIvarakarNikam banDitavyam corAH badDAH Bavanti tElam parijapya SarIre deyam yam dadAti tam laBate gomaya maNxalakam kRtvA puzpa avatIrNam loha BAjanam BasmanA paripUrayitvA maNxala maDye sTApya tUlikA azwa Sata vArAm parijapya tasya upari sTAtavyam guggulu DUpam datvA mantram japatA acCowikA dAtavyA yatra coraH tatra gacCati BasmanA maNxalakam kRtvA sa vaSyaH Bavati sarva sattvA stamBanam manasIkaraNe Sukla pUrNam AByAm pawasya agratas boDi vRkza kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya tilAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt vaSyaH Bavati Kadira kIlakam azwa Sata japtAm kRtvA caturzu diSAsu niKanet sImAbanDaH kRtaH Bavati maNxala banDaH udakena ekaviMSati japtena sattvAnAm utsAraNam sarzapEH krudDasya agratas japet prasIdati aTa rAjAnam vaSIkartu kAmaH pawasya agratas rka kAzWa samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm daSa sahasrANi juhuyAt vaSaH Bavati aFguli sADanam pawasya agratas ganDa puzpa DUpam datvA dakziNa pradeSinIm aFgulIm saptaBiH aSvatTa patrEH sTApya daSa sahasrANi japet dInAra vastrAni AtmanA tRtIyasya prayacCati GRta AhutInAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt meGAvI Bavati nAgakesarANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt kanyA Bavati vEdya  jAtI puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt vastrANi laBati lakza jApena jAti smaraH Bavati sapta vyADi SatAni Bavanti lakzam ekam kzIra yAvaka AhAraH kRta puraScaraNaH Bavati Sukla azwamyAm tri rAtra uzitaH pawasya udArAm pUjAm kRtvA tAvat japet yAvat raSmiH niScarati tatas sidDaH Bavati

column1: rAjyam vidyADara tvam yat manasA cintayati tam laBate paWita mAtreNa sarva pApa mitrAH stamBitAH Bavanti sarva viGna vinAyakA hatA rakta sUtreNa parivezwya SarAva sampuwam sa DAtuke cEtye pratimAya agratas pUjAm kRtvA tAvat japet yAvat triviDA sidDiH Bavati iti UzmAyamAne pAda pracArikam paQca yojana SatAni gacCati sarve ca asya pAda pracArikAH vaSyAH Bavanti DUmAyamAne ntarDAnam catur aFgulena BUmim na spRSet varza sahasram jIvati yojana sahasram gacCati daSa puruza balaH Bavati jvalite kalpa trayam jIvati vidyADaraH Bavati aDarpaNIyaH ca Bavati pUrNa pUrNa paQcadaSyAm pozaDikaH pawasya agratas daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm padmAnAm daSa sahasrANi juhuyAt tatas gnikuNxAt divyA strI uttizWati varam dadAti mAtA vA BaginI vA grahetavyA tatas praBRti kzIra yAvaka AhAraH lakza dvayam japet ante tri rAtropitaH paQcadaSyAm sa DAtuke cEtye pratimAyA pUjAm kRtvA BagavataH grataH aSvatTa saMstare tAvat japet yAvat divya rUpA strI AgacCati tasya arGam datvA varam yAcitavyam Bakta alaFkAra vastrAm prayacCati varza sahasram jIvati candra grahe samAna vatsAyAH goH nava nItam gRhya zaz aFguli mAtrAm puttalikAm kRtvA catur Bakta uzitaH aSvatTa saMstaram kRtvA azwa sahasram parijapya grasitavyam sarva rAjAnaH vaSAH Bavanti kanaka vIcikA manaHSilA palam gRhya pUrNa paQcadaSyAm pozaDikena udArAm pUjAm kRtvA suganDa puzpANAm azwa sahasreNa hRdaye tAxayitavyA Sezam kAlam sarvam japet paQca dInAra SatAni laBate pozaDikena pUjAm kRtvA sahasram japtavyam svapne SuBa aSuBam kaTayati GRta aktAnAm juhuyAt sapta aham trisanDyam azwa sahasram japet rAjAnam vaSam Anayati madana puttalikAm sarva alaFkAra upetAm rAjavRkza kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya SalAkayA vidDA tApayet yaTA na galati azwaSatikena jApena tri sanDyam pAtAlAt api Akarzayati aSoka kAzWa mayIm zaz aFgulAm sAlaBaQjikAm kRtvA tAm gRhya parvata SiKaram Aruhya Sata sahasram japet kzIra yAvaka AhAraH lakza jApena grAmam laBate dvi lakza jApena yaTezwam karmANi karoti tri lakza jApena karma AvaraNam kzapayati catur lakza jApena AryaMmaQju SrI darSanam dadAti paQca lakza jApena budDa kzetra pariSudDiH Bavati zaz alakza jApena yatra icCati tatra lokaDAtO= upapadyate sapta lakza jApena DAraNIm pratilaBate agnim stamBayitu kAmaH pawwikA sapta vArAm parijapya muKe prakzipitavyam udake ezA eva sidDiH vivAde sUtrakam azwa Sata aBimantritam kRtvA trayaH granTayaH kAryAH uttaravAdI Bavati gavya GRta palam paQcadaSyAm BAjane kRtvA Arya maQjuSriyasya puratas gomaya maNxala kam agaru DUpam datvA azwa uttara vArAm parijapya pibe pItvA ca na svaptavyam meDAvI Bavati divasAni sapta jvara prezaNam BUta prezaNam Atma rakzA vetAxa utTApanam bila praveSam vanapraveSam rakzA sImAbanDaH diSAbanDaH cora vyjApena stamBitA Bavati iti antar DAtu kAmena SatAvari mUlam sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA baDnIyAt antarhitaH Bavati pawasya agratas lakzam vEdya  japet tatas SatapuzpAyAH vIra kraye krItvA daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm juhuyAt yAvantakena mUlyena krItAni Bavanti tat SataguNa mUlam Bavati divasAni sapta homam kAryam sumana samiDAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt divasAni sapta arTam laBati pawasya agratas mAsam japet dInAra catuzwayam laBate marIca Palam sapta vArAn aBimantrya muKe prakzipya yasya alApam dadAti sa putra vat manyate sa DAtuke cEtye budDa pratimAyAH agratas kRtvA udake kzipet kEvartAnAm matsyAH na Bavanti SePAlikA puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt aSva laNxena sapta japtena DUpaH deyaH matkuNAH na Bavanti puzpeNa Palena vA lakza japtena maSakAH na Bavanti vaSIkaraNam rAjadvArikam dantakAzWa BakzaNam Pala dAnam ganDa dAnam BUmibanDam cora banDam sarva daMzwrA stamBanam upajamBanam nigaxa sPowanam udaka stamBanam agni stamBanam vizoma arjanam viza saFkramaNam viza banDaH BUta vaSIkaraNam xAkinI graha mokzaNam nazwa vidyAyAH gorocanayA BUrja patre liKitvA BagavataH grataH sa DAtuke cEtye Sata vArAm japet praBAte pUrNA Bavati sapta japtvA sidDArTakAm grAme vA nagare vA kzipet ye tatra vasanti te mRtAH iva svapante yAvat sUrya udayam striyam puruzam vA vaSIkartu kAmaH yasya yatas BAge gRham tAm diSa aBimuKam vikAle zwa sahasram japya svapet darSanam deyam evam divasAni sapta vaSaH Bavati udake sapta japtena sarva daMzwrANAm tuNxa banDaH ozaDa banDam manasA niDAna banDam Kadira kIlakEH ekaviMSati sapta niDAna sTAnezu caturzu koNezu niKanet kalpa sTAyI sarva sidDa namaskRtaH pAtra Kaxga karaka AdayaH nena eva viDinA candra grahe BikzuNA SrAvayitavyAH sarvEH etEH kalpa sTAyI brahmacAryapratihata gatiH yaTezwam vicarati go mUtra yAvaka AhAraH lakza dvayam japet grAm azwakam laBati yam icCati tatra eva tizWati samudra tawe pawam pratizWApya lakzam japet sAgara nAga rAjA sva Bavanam anupraveSayati

column1: cintAmaNiH mRgayati tayA gRhItayA sarva karma cArI Bavati taTAgata kzetram api gacCati kalpa sTAyI apratihataH kumArIkarttita sUtreNa azwa sahasra aBimantritena granTayaH karttavyAH sarva viGna vinAyakAH hattAH Bavanti nadyAH puline BikzA AhAraH lakza trayam japet havizya ASI nadI saFgame lakzam japet antarhitaH Bavati sarva antar DAnikAnAm praBuH Bavati vinaye pramANa upetam pAtram gRhya pawasya agratas paryaFka upavizwaH dakziNa hastena pAtram gRhya tO= ajapet yAvat jvalati vidyADaraH Bavati evam yatra sTAsyati tatra vRdDiH Bavati evam aprameyAni guNAni Bavanti aTa SAntim kartu kAmaH daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm suganDi kusumAnAm vA azwa sahasram japet parama SAntiH Bavati pOzwikam tila taNxula mudga mAza praBRtInAm strINAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm kzIravRkza samidBiH agnim prajvAlya azwa sahasram juhuyAt parama puzwiH Bavati pawena vA vinA pawena pozaDikaH tri SaraNa parigRhIta boDi citaH daSa sahasrANi japet tatas pOrNamAsyAm canda grahe vA sarva kAmikAm balim datvA ahorAtra uzitaH sakalAm rAtrim japet tatas sarva karma samarTaH Bavati sarva diSezu apratihataH Bavati AkArita mAtreNa jIvApayati sapta japtam udakam prezayet AturaH pItvA svasTaH Bavati graha prapalAyanam  sarzapa homena sAhasrikena asurA vivara dvAre pawam pratizWApya niyama sTaH lakzam japet asura kanyA nirgatya praveSayati vacA muKe prakzipya tAvat japet yAvat vEdya triviDA sidDiH UzmAyamAne vaSIkaraNam DUmAyamAne ntarDAnam jvalamAnena AkASa gamanam sa DAtuke cEtye pawam pratizWApya Sukla azwamyAm AraBya padmAnAm lakzam juhuyAt rAjA Bavati raktacandana mayam zoxaSa aFgulam dvAdaSa aFgulam vA pozaDikena karmakAreNa daNxa kAzWam kArayet tatas pawasya agratas lakza trayam japet ahorAtra uzitaH pUrNamAsyAm udArAm pUjAm kRtvA daNxakAzWam dakziNena hastena gRhya tAvat japet column2: dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / gnas gtsang ma'i steng na gnas pa'i lha'i bu'i tshogs rnams dang / sems can bye ba khri phrag brgya stong du ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / grub pa dang / rig 'dzin dang / drang srong mchog dam pa du ma dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / byams pa dang / mthu chen thob dang / mthu chen gnas dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i ngo bo dang 'dra bar bzhugs pa'i sangs @448b rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams thugs rangs te /

column1: balim datvA snAna aByalaFkRtam kRtvA BasmanA maNxalakam liKya tasya maDye vEdya pUrva Siram sTApya Sukla pawa pracCAdita sADakaH Sukla vAsasa saKAyaH diSApAlAm sTApayet kRtakzasya upari upaviSya tasya muKe tila sarzapAm juhuyAt tAvat yAvat tasya muKAH maNiH nirgacCati tAm gRhya AtmanaH muKe prakzipya sarva BUtika balim upAhRtya dakziNa mUrtO sTitaH haritAla manaHSilA aQjana maQjizWA rocanAm eka trayam gRhya aSvatTa patra antaritAm kRtvA tAvat japet yAvat triviDA sidDiH iti UzmAyati DUmAyati jvalati UzmAyamAne pAda pracArikAm paQca varza sahasrAyuH Bavati sarva sattva vaSIkaraNam DUmAyamAne ntarDAnam daSa varza sahasrAyuH Bavati jvalitena sarva vidyADaraH Bavati sarva vidyADarANAm praBuH kalpa sTAyI upam upari lakzam japamAnaH paQca aBijQaH Bavati banDaH UrDvam aDas ca diSApAlAnAm ca rAja kule parama vallaBaH Bavati gRhIta vAkyaH ca Bavati kanyA kAmaH jAtI kusumAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt kanyAm laBate tarA iva vikasitEH strI lABaH sarva graha mudrayA vAcayA sandeSena rocanayA agnim stamBayati na AvAm stamBayati Akarzayati ca dazwam adazwam vA AveSayati mRtakam utTApayati vAcayA jvaram prezayati kzIra yAvaka AhAraH lakzam japet tri rAtra uzitena Suci vAsasA sADaka garBa liFge sTApya mahatIm pUjAm kRtvA aparimitam japet sarva bAla vRdDAH ca vaSyAH Bavanti BasmanA sapta aBimantritena kawakam ca kuryAt sarva sattvAm aBedya pAnIyam azwa Sata japtam gozu dApayet vyADim upaSamayati ahorAtra uzitaH Kaxgam Kadiram kRtvA kRzNa caturdaSyAm SmaSAne tAvat japet yAvat prajvalitam tena gRhItena apratihata gatiH Kaxga vid akuQcita kuNxala keSaH kalpa sTAyI sarva vidyADarANAm bahu mataH aTavA candra sUrya uparAge kRta puraScaraNaH praBAte utTAya pawasya pUjA kRtvA BikzavaH BojayitavyA sa dakziNam sidDim mRgayet tatas vA aDikezu karmasu sidDaH Bavati dUrvA pravAlAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt banDanAt mocayati paramAtmAnam ca Kaxgam azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA vivara deva kula nagara dvAreNa vA sTApayet kapAwam BaQjayitvA dvAram utpAwayati sakRt japtena Atma rakzA kzIra AhutiBiH striyaH vaSAH Bavanti manasA dvi mantrAm sTApayati sarva mudrAm stamBayati sarva mantrAm cUrNayati asura kanyAm vaSIkaroti sarva ganDa aBihuta aBiSatena kula striyaH vaSyAH Bavanti deva nirmAlya homena deva tawika pravrajitA ca vaSyAH Bavanti hRdaye hastam datvA japet sarva pApa pranASanam sarva sattva AkarzaNam ca Sirasi hastam datvA japet azwaSatam sarva sattva stamBanam pApa praNASanam ca bilvam parijapya sarva sattva AkarzaNaH SiKA sADane Sukla pratipadam AraBya tAvat japet yAvat sanDyA tatas SiKAm azwa sahasra aBimantritAm kRtvA BikzAmawet brAhmaNa gRhezu tadA BikzA dAyikA na paSyati tadA sidDaH Bavati praTama divase eka BikzA yAvat evam sapta aham ekaviMSatime divase puNyavatasya api siDyati candra grahe kzIram parijapya pibet mahArasAyanam Bavati udaka culukam ekaviMSati vArAm parijapya yasya gRhasya aBimuKam kzipati divasAni sapta sa vaSaH Bavati udaka culukam sapta aBimantritam kRtvA yasya nAmnA pibati sa vaSaH Bavati dRzwyA parijaptayA ekaviMSati vArAm yam paSyati sa vaSaH Bavati guggulu homena lakzeNa rAjyam laBati utpala kumuda puNxarIka AdiBiH nivedyamAnEH hUyamAnEH vA vEdya yam icCati tam vaSam Anayati Bagnena agni prAkAraH udake SarkarABiH vA SiKA banDaH svABAvikam aQjanam gRhItvA ekaviMSati japtena aQcayet sarva jana priyaH Bavati aQjanam tagaram kuzWam vacA padmakeSaram rocanA gajamadaH ca azwasasra aBimantritena samAlaBet sarvezAm priyaH Bavati lavaNa mayim pratikRtim kRtvA pUrvakena viDinA kiFkurvANAH Bavanti navanIta mayim ca maNim kRtvA caturBiH aSvatTa patrEH pratizWApya tAvat japet yAvat UzmAyati dantEH aspRSya graset grasita mAtre yam cintayati tat sarvam utpadyati kAmarUpI daSa puruza balaH Bavati aSIti varza sahasrANi kRta puruScaraNaH pOrNamAsyAm pawasya agratas tri rAtra uzitaH sa DAtuke cEtye ganDa puzpa AdiBiH pUjAm kRtvA kuSa mayam Kaxgam raSvarTa patre sTApya muzwi pradeSe gRhNIyAt japet yAvat sPuritam gRhItvA vidyADaraH Bavati pawasya agratas prAtihAraka pakze tris kAla snAyI tricEla parivarttI trisanDyam azwa sahasrikaH jApaH yAvat pOrNamAsI iti ante tri rAtra uzitaH saFGAwikAm sADayet sarva ganDEH pralipya azwa sahasra GRta pradIpAm prajvAlya paryaFka upavizwaH ganDEH maNxalakam Rpa lipya tasya upari saFGAwim pratizWApya vAma hastena Akramya tAvat japet yAvat utpatati sapta tAla mAtre tizWati anena eva mantreNa sarva budDa boDisattveByaH namaskRtvA grahItavyaH gRhIta mAtreNa vidyADaraH Bavati sarva deva nAga yakza garuxa kinnara mahA uraga AdayaH praNAmam kurvanti pawasya agratas viviDAH balim nivedya udArAm pUjAm kRtvA padma patre rocanAm sTApya paryaFka upavizwaH tAvat japet yAvat triviDA sidDiH UzmAyamAne sarva sattva vaSIkaraNam varza sahasram jIvati DumAyamAne varza kowI sahasrANi jIvati yojana sahasram gacCati tAm eva AgacCati aSrAntaH sarva sidDAnAm manasA antarDIyate manasA AhAram utpAdayati aTa jvalatim uadita Aditya varNataH dvis azwa varzaH AkuQcita kuQcita kuNxakeSaH kalpa sTAyI aneka vidyADara Sata sahasra parivAraH yatra icCati tatra gac kRta puraScaraNaH sragdAma calanam dIpa SiKA varDanam raSmi niScaraNam pawa prakampaH ca etAm dRzwvA yam sADayati tam siDyati pApa kzayam ca Bavati deva nAga yakza ganDarva asura garuxa kinnara mahA uragAm vaSIkartu kAmaH pawasya agratas Kadira aFgArEH agnim prajvAlya lavaNa tila sidDArTakAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tri sanDyam sapta rAtram vaSyAH Bavanti udaka Basma sarzapA anyatamam azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA caturdiSam kzipet maNxala banDaH kRtaH Bavati kzIra AhutInAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt vyADinA pramucyate anna arTI annam juhuyAt parvata SiKaram Aruhya BikzA AhAraH lakza trayam japet ante tri rAtra uzitaH aSvatTa kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya tilAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm kRtsnAm rAtrim juhuyAt rAjA Bavati tila GRta homena sarva arTAH siDyanti maDum juhuyAt sarva jana priyaH Bavati GRtam juhuyAt tejasvI Bavati kzIram juhuyAt SAntiH Bavati daDim juhuyAt puzwiH Bavati sindu vAra kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya sarva pAkasya agram juhuyAt yaTAsidDam annam akzaya Bavati yam icCati pawwabanDam laBati nimba puzpANAm lakza juhuyAt sarva jana priyaH Bavati akzata SAli tandulAnAm lakza juhuyAt grAmam laBati aSoka kAzWEH agnim prajvAlya Sata sahasram juhuyAt eka pradeSe rAjyam laBate pawasya agratas agaru DUpam dahatA lakzam ekam japet tatas tasya rAja gRham svADInam Bavati BikzA AhAraH havizya AhAraH vE ekUna paQcASa Amra patrANAm kzIra aktAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt sarva vyADiByaH mucyate sarva vrIhim ekasTa kRtvA Sata sahasram juhuyAt sarva vrI hayaH akzayAH Bavanti maDUka kAzWAnA Sata sahasram juhuyAt arTam utpadyate manaHSilA haritAlam daMSa rocanA samIkRtya pawasya agratas azwa saha asra aBimantritam kRtvA boDi vRkza kAzWa patrE sTApya japet sidDaH Bavati yasya striyA puruzasya vA dIyate sa vaSyaH Bavati GRta AhutInAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt grAma trayam laBate kowim japet Sata parivAraH vidyADaraH Bavati lakzam ekam japet mRzwa an napAna mayA Acitam laBate saptadvIpA aDipaH vaSam AgacCati arka aQjanam palam gRhya agninA sa ganDam kRtvA aQjana aparikarma SoDayitvA candra grahe udakam praviSya tO= yAvat kUzmANxaH Bavati tad kzaNAt sPuwati sPuwita mAtreNa asya varNasya tejasvI Bavati kuNxala makuwa DaraH sarva vidyADarANAm avaDyaH apratihata gatiH sa parivAraH utpatati paQca varza sahasrANi jIvati padmAnAm utpalAnAm vA lakzam juhuyAt suvarNa sahasram laBati palASa samiDAnAm Sata sahasram tad kzaNAt eva saH udgacCati sa vidyADaraH Bavati sarva deva nAga yakza apratihata divya vimala Srotra manojavaH udita Aditya varNaH sarva vidyADara bahu mataH divya gatiH vidyADaraH SataparivA pawasya agratas ganDa puzpEH udArAm pUjAm kRtvA kzIra yAvaka AhAraH Suci vastra nIvasanaH yam yam prArTayate tam laBante candra grahe boDivRkzasya aDastAt ganDa puzpa DUpEH ca pUjAm kRtvA manaHSilAm rocanAm ekaviMSati vArAm parijapya SirasyA upari mArjayet lalAwe tilakam kuryAt rAja kulam praviSet rAja vallaBaH Bavati padma bIjAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt yasya nAmam grahAya sa vaSaH Bavati brahmacArI jita indriyaH aguru turuzka homam kuryAt pUrNamAsyAm caturBiH kalaSEH udaka paripUrNEH azwa sahasra aBimantritEH rAjAnam rAjamAtram vA snApayet SrImAm Bavati asADyamAnAyAH kzIra samidBiH agnim prajvAlya vidyAnAm daDi maDu GRtAnAm Sata sahasram juhuyAt rakta utpala nIloptalAnAm vA jAtI puzpEH vA homaH pawasya agratas kzIra yAvaka AhAraH varDamAnAH pUjA kAryA BikzavaH BojayitavyA anena karmaNA asADyamAnA api siDyati arTa kAmaH apAmArga samiDABiH homam Danam laBate GRta homena SAntika pOzwikam daDi maDu GRta aktEH padmEH GRta guggulu homaH vE azwa sahasram evam arTAm dadAti sa DAtuke cEtye daSa sahasrANi juhuyAt rAjyam laBati padma lakza homena mahA BogaH Bavati sarvezAm homAnAm vEdya ganDa puzpa DUpanEH pUjAm kRtvA homam AraBet bilva samiDAnAm azwa Satena eza karma BogAn= ca dadAti kRzNa paQcamyAm pawasya agratas ahorAtra uzitena Sukla nantake gorocanAm sTApya tAvat japet yAvat triviDA sidDiH pAda pracArike sapta varza sahasrANi jIvati jvalite kalpa aDastAt boDi vRkza samiDAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt rUpaka sahasram laBate jAtI puzpANAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tri sanDyam sapta rAtram suvarNa sahasram laBate ete karma tri rAtra uzitena boDivRkzasya aDastAt kzIra samidBi agnim prajvAlya guggulu gulikAnAm karpAsa asTi pramANAnAm azwa sahasram juh dInAra sahasram laBati akzi roga jvara gulma SiraH gRDrasInAm parijapya dAtavyam vRka vyAGra mahiza dvIpa hastirikza cora sarpa piSAca BUta brahmarAkzasAnAm jala carANAm sarva Baya upadraveByaH anena eva rakzA karttavyA padma saram gatvA padmAnAm lakzam nivedayet sAmAnya rAjyam laBati kRta puraScaraNaH manaHSilAm gRhya mAnuza kzIreNa pIzayitvA sahasra sampAta Ahutim kRtvA pozaDikaH paQca gulikAm kRtvA Agaru maye samudgake prakzipya Sveta sidDArTaka sahitAnAm candra grahe sUrya grahe vA bali viDAnam kRtvA pawasya agratas samudgake sTApya tAvat japet yAvat sarzapA ciwiciwAyanti tadA sarva sattva vaSIkaraNam karoti yadi DUmAyati sarva antarDAnikAnAm rAjA Bavati ananta kalpam jIvati aTa prajvalati tadA devakumAraH udita Aditya sama praBaH mahA kalpa sTAyI vidyADara rAjA Bavati rocana haritAla AdIni etena eva viDAnena sADayitavyAni sarvezAm triviDA sidDiH SAntim kartu kAmena yAjQikEH samidBiH agnim prajvAlya paramAnnam azwa sahasram juhuyAt tri rAtram SAntiH Bavati AtmanaH parasya vA sapta rAtreNa grAmasya nagarasya anAvRzwO trimaDuram juhuyAt SaFKa Dvaja AdIni aBimantrya karmam kzapayati sapta ahena paQca AnantaryANi kzapayati sarva karma samarTaH ca Bavati vidyA banDaH sUtrakeNa ekaviMSati japtena granTiH kartavyaH sarzapEH maNxala banDaH candra grahe sUrya grahe vEdya vA candanena maNxalakam upalipya GRta maDu AmalakI rasam sama BAgAni tAmra BAjane sTApya paryaFkam badDvA tAvat japet yAvat UzmAyati tam pItvA Sruti DaraH Bavati pozaDikaH vikAle udaka culakam sapta vArAm parijapya pAtavyam yam cintayitvA karoti svapna antare kaTayati SvetavacAm sapta vArAm parijapya muKe danta antare prakzipya yam yAcati tam laBate uttaravAdI Bavati yam yam eva BAvam manasi kRtvA japati tam taTAgatasya puratas puzpa ganDa AdIn dattvA diSA balim ca caturdiSam kzipet tatas kuSa viNxaka upavizwaH azwa sahasram japet sarva ASAm paripUrayati valmIka mRttikayA siMham kRtvA kuNxala keSaH dvis azwa varza AkRti Atma zoxa SamaH utpatati sarva vidyADarANAm Agamya brahma AyuzyaH mRtaH ca devezu upapadyate dRzwvA SrutvA para sEnyam stamBayati sarva vrIhi ganDa udaka kalaSam paripUrNam kalaSam Amra pallava muKa pracCAditam kRtvA azwa sahasra aBimantritena vinAyakam snApaya kzipram muQcati gurviNIm snApayet suKena prasUyati bAlakam snApayet sarva grahEH vimuktaH Bavati anena aBizekeNa yA parimuktA Bavati sADana samaH ca Bavati mahA sAmanta vaSIkaraNe pawasya agratas arka samiDAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt sapta rAtram trisanDyam sa parivAraH vaSIBavati rAja kanyAyE priyaFgu kusumAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt saptAhAH yasya dIyate piNyAka azwa sahasram juhuyAt tri sanDyam sapta rAtram pura sTam vaSam Anayati kRta puraScaraNaH sa DAtuke cEtye lakzam japte BikzA AhAraH tatas kRzNa caturdaSyAm eka rAtra uzitaH pawasya yaTA viBavataH pUjAm kRtvA kRzNa tilAnAm daDi maDu GRta aktAnAm azwa sahasram juhuyAt tatas praBAte grAmam laBate dvAdaSa bahis sArvaBUtikAH balim nivedya paryaFka upavizwaH tAvat japet yAvat aruNaH deva putraH AgacCati tam varam dadAti vawa vRkzasya aDastAt BikzA AhAraH mAsa trayam japet tatas kRzNa caturdaSyAm go carma mAtram sTaNxilakam upalipya sarva rasikam balim nivedyam bahis sarva BUtikam balim dattvA tatas kuSa viNxaka upavizwaH nirDUma aFgArezu guggulu gulikAnAm badara asTi pramANAnAm azwa sahasram juhu tatas pawavAsinI yakziNI AgacCati tasyAH ganDa udakena arGaH deyaH sA bravIti kim karomi iti mAtA BaginI saKI ezAm ekatamam grAhyam rasa rasAyanam dadAti tam BakzayitvA kalpAyuH Bavati yakza balaH Bavati kRta puraScaraNaH sa DAtuke cEtye yaTA viBavataH pUjAm kRtvA tris kAla snAyI tRsanDyam zaz mAsAm aparimitaH jApaH BikzA AhAraH kzIra yAvaka AhAraH vA tatas sADanam samAraBe kRzNa pakze puzya nakzatre karavIrikAm manaHSilAm vIra kraya krItAm gRhya paQcagavyena saMSoDya brAhmaNa kanyAm vAma UzaDam dattvA snAna alaFkRtAm kRtvA pUrva aBimuKe praviSya tiTi karaNa muhUrtena pIzayet anAmika aFgulyA vizamAm badara asTi pramANAm gulikAm kRtvA aSvatTa samudgake prakzipya pawasya agratas sahasra sampAta aBihutam kRtvA sapta rAtra uzitam ca ante Sukla pakze udArAm pUjAm kRtvA udAratarIm balim vEdya nivedya ganDa puzpa DUpa arcitam samudgakam kRtvA caturBiH aSvatTa patrE sTApya triBiH AcCAdya hastena avazwaBya sarva budDa boDisattvAnAmnamaskAram kRtvA kuSa viNxaka upavizwaH tAvat japet yAvat rasa rasAyana AdIni dravyAni dadanti punar api nirgacCati arDam ratna traya upayogAya kAryam aTa tatra eva tizWati na vEzNava cakra Bayam Bavati Bagavantam mEtreyam paSyati praNiDim kRtvA pravezwavyam sarva vAraNam Suci sTAne pAMsu gRham sarzapasya upari kzipet sarva vAraNam kRtam Bavati atiyAtim icCati vaktavyam gacCasva iti vastrakarNake mRNmayIm mudrAm kRtvA azwa sahasra aBimantrya dazwaka upari sTApayitvA Akarzayet mRtakaH pyuttizWati dravyANAm ca manaHSilA AdInAm Kaxga cakra musuNxyAdInAm paQcagavyena SoDayitvA sahasra sampAta Ahutim kRtvA anyatamam dravyam gRhya pUrNamAsyAm sADana maNxalam liKya vastra upari dravyam sTApya paryaFka upavizwaH tAvat japet yAvat sidDiH Bavati Palake yam icCati dravyam tasya tasya nAmam liKya azwa sahasra aBimantritam kRtvA yatra nAgaH tizWati tatra hrade kzeptavyA tasya nAgaH sarvam sampAdayati sapta ahena niyatam vastum sampAdayati kUpe hrade vA aBilazitavyam nAmam liKya dravya AdInAm Palake taTA eva hrade kzeptavyam tatas puruzaH udake nimajjayitavyam sa tasmim mahAntam Sabdam SRNoti amukasmin pradeSe dravya Adikam tizWati tatas grahetavyam nadI santAraka AdO daSazu ca saBAyAm rAja kule vA vivAde vA smartavyam sarvatra aparAjitaH Bavati yam icCati vaSam kartum tasya muKe Arya maQju Sriyam DyAtvA kiQcid samBAzaNam kuryAt acirAt vaSaH Bavati udakam BAjane kRtvA AryamaQjuSriyam DyAyIta tena pAnIyena azwa sahasra aBimantritena dazwam saQcintayet nirvizaH Bavati tatra uktena viDAnena maNxalam pravizwa sampUrNasya vRzasya apatita gomayam gRhya havizya AhAraH samOnI maNxalam kRtvA tAvat japet pOAraBya yAvat tRtIyam api lakzam japet brahmacArI zaz mAsAm vratam etat caret mAsena atra sidDiH zaxBiH mAsEH kRzNam jagat pratyakzam Bavati SarIreNa api parAm sidDim avApnoti samAsena sarva mantram sADayati
